name: The Triple Belle - Sleeps 16!
description:
The perfect option for big groups.

Welcome to our vibrant 6-bed, 6-bath duplex plus carriage house in the Old Northside neighborhood of Downtown Indianapolis! Colorful decor, modern amenities, and a convenient location await. Fully equipped with 3 kitchens, comfortable bedrooms with king beds.

Please note that this is a two sided duplex and the two sides are not attached by an interior door. There is a carriage house on top of the garage that also sleeps 4 more people.

The space
You are renting two sides of a duplex and a detached carriage house. They are not connected by an interior door but the doors from the back and front are about 2 feet away from each other.
This means you have three of everything including three kitchens!

The main floor is the living space, while on the second floor we have three bedrooms on each side all with king beds. The master bedroom has an ensuite bathroom and the other two bedrooms share a bathroom. All bedrooms have their own desks for remote workers!

Other things to note
Permits: SRP-000369, SRP-000368,
SRP-000370 (3 units)

name: Artisan Oasis-Hot Tub | Fire Pit 8BD Whole House
description:
Inspired by Japandi-style and crafted by Hoosier carpenters, our newly constructed Castle Central offers the perfect blend of minimalist aesthetic, modern amenities, and traditional craftsmanship.

An expansive structure of two adjacent townhouse-style homes each offering 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths (Total 8 BRs, 6 Full BAs, 2 Half BAs, 2 Kitchens, 2 Hot Tubs, 6 Terraces & 2 Fire Pits), Castle Central is perfect for large groups and multiple families. New amenities are endless for a memorable stay.

The space
Castle Central is a grand standalone structure consists of two SEPARATE but adjacent 3-story units. It is a duplex where guests access both sides. Individual sides for smaller groups are available for booking as well.

Discover the abundant amenities spread across Castle Central:

‚Üí Two Outdoor Hot Tubs
‚Üí Two Terraces w/ Outdoor Dining & Grills
‚Üí Two Terraces w/ Fire Pits, Day Beds, & S'mores Supplies
‚Üí Two Terraces w/ Porch Swings
‚Üí Two One-Car Garages w/ Complimentary Electric Charging Stations & More Driveway Parking
‚Üí Eight TVs w/ BYO-Login Streaming

We comfortably accommodate 16 people with 8 bedrooms (queen bed in each). Each bedroom has an ensuite bathroom for utmost comfort and privacy. Between the two units, there are 6 full bathrooms and 2 half baths each equipped with LED vanity mirror and warm water bidet.

Prepare a delicious meal in the custom-designed kitchen stocked with all the essentials and gather with the whole crew at the rustic live edge dinning table (seats ten). Two units means two kitchens & dinning rooms too!

Guest access
Guests will enjoy full private access to the entire property. Please note that access between the two units are only available outdoor either through the back terrace or the front entrance. Basements will not be accessible as it's only used for storage and utilities.

Other things to note
Castle Central is designed & built with the vision of our dream home. We manage it personally with the goal of sharing that vision with you.

This place is an urban oasis that are minutes away from all the hustle and bustle of Indianapolis. It's for gazing into the starry night in the hot tub, sharing s'mores and memories by the fire pit, and for merry gatherings of family and friends. Please keep those gatherings orderly and treat the Castle with respect.

If you are here for business purposes, we provide great wifi, dedicated office, and numerous areas for meetings and inspirations.

- I accept responsibility for all persons on the Property and agree that children will be supervised at all times

- I acknowledge and assume responsibility for any injury to me or persons on the Property as a result of my stay.

- Host is not responsible for loss, theft, damage, injury or cancellation fees.

- All Guests agree to indemnify and hold the Property Owner harmless from any liability for personal injury or property damage sustained by Guest or individuals invited onto the property by Guest.

8 Min walk to Lucas Oil
Countless restaurants and entertainment
Top Floor

Free Coffee
1 Free Parking Spot in the Heart of Downtown. Incredible value usually worth $30 a night. Free Electronic Vehicle (EV) Charging Stations

The space
Note: Top floor of the building. The fourth "bedroom" is a twin bunk in the main entrance way. please make sure you review pictures clearly. Reach out if you have questions.

Bedroom 1 ‚Äì The master bedroom is right off the Dinning room. The room has a smart tv and King bed. There is an in-suit bathroom with a modern bathroom.

Bedroom 2 ‚Äì A cool bunkbed room with two queen beds on the bottom and two full beds on top. There is an in-suite bathroom. The bathroom is very spacious. The toilet and shower can be closed to allow others in the room to use the bathroom and sink to get ready.

Bedroom 3 ‚Äì Has a queen bed with a smart tv. There is no bathroom attached but the third bathroom is right outside one of the entrances.

Bedroom 4 ‚Äì This is NOT a real bedroom but two twin bunk beds right in the front entrance to the condo.
Just because we allow a certain amount of people to stay and sleep in the unit does not mean your group will find the space comfortable for that many people. Each group must decide if the layout fits their needs. Please reach out if you have questions.
Being in the heart of downtown there is the potential for noise. Thursday through Saturday tends to be louder than other days.
Parking is detached and 1 block south of the unit. You must enter the building to get your parking pass before parking. The clearance is 7 feet.
Please reach out if you have any concerns about the noise.
Large group? We have you covered with over 12 listings in the same building.

Other things to note
Note: Bedroom 4 is not a fully enclosed bedroom. Bedroom 4 consists of the 2 bunk beds at the entrance to the condo.

Note: NO PARTIES ALLOWED! IF YOU THROW A PARTY YOU WILL BE ASKED TO LEAVE AND WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.

TITLE: Amazing Spacious Luxurious Home - Sleeps Up To 16!
Listing Name: Amazing Spacious Luxurious Home - Sleeps Up To 16!
name: Amazing Spacious Luxurious Home - Sleeps Up To 16!
description:
Welcome to your dream vacation home, a luxurious and spacious 5-bedroom, 4-bathroom mega mansion that is perfect for your next getaway! Located in a quiet suburban neighborhood 20 minutes from downtown Indy, this magnificent property is the perfect haven for large families or groups of friends seeking a memorable vacation experience. Book your stay at this amazing and spacious mega mansion today and experience the ultimate in luxury and comfort on your next vacation!

The space
As you enter the home, you'll be greeted by the grand foyer and elegant staircase, which leads to the spacious living area where you can relax and unwind after a long day of exploring the city. The living room boasts plush furnishings and a large flat-screen TV, perfect for movie nights or game nights with the family.

The fully equipped gourmet kitchen provides ample space for cooking and entertaining, complete with top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a large kitchen island. With seating for ten, the dining room is the perfect place to enjoy a family dinner or holiday feast.

Each of the four bedrooms in this mega mansion have been thoughtfully designed and decorated to provide the ultimate in luxury and comfort. All bedrooms feature a king-sized bed and their own 65-inch flat-screen TV. For the kids or extra guests, we have 2 bunk beds with 2 pull-out trundles located in our fifth bonus room. The master suite boasts a lavish en-suite bathroom with a spa tub and a walk-in shower, while the other bedrooms share two additional bathrooms.

The outdoor space is just as impressive as the inside, with a large patio and outdoor seating area, perfect for enjoying your morning coffee or hosting a family barbecue. Additionally, this amazing mega mansion features its own private pool, open from Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day weekend, providing the perfect place to cool off on those hot summer days. And for those who enjoy outdoor activities, the backyard also features frisbee golf, providing hours of fun for guests of all ages. Whether you're looking to relax by the pool, enjoy a game of frisbee golf, or explore all that Indianapolis has to offer, this luxurious mega mansion is the perfect choice for your next vacation!

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire property except for the upstairs attic area and our cleaning closet located on the main level in the master bedroom. Please note that we have a secure keyless entry for all of our rentals along with blink doorbell security camera facing the front door as well as another security camera outside by the garage facing towards the driveway.

Other things to note
Located just minutes away from some of the best restaurants, shopping, and entertainment in Indianapolis, there is no shortage of things to do in the area. Some nearby points of interest include the Indiana Convention Center, Lucas Oil Stadium, the Indianapolis Zoo, the Children's Museum of Indianapolis, and Monument Circle. You can also enjoy a day of shopping at the Fashion Mall at Keystone or dine at some of the city's best restaurants, including St. Elmo Steak House, Harry & Izzy's, and The Capital Grille.

We take pride in offering our guests personal attention and hospitality. From the moment you book your stay with us, we'll be available to answer any questions you may have and ensure that your stay is comfortable and stress-free. We'll provide recommendations for local hotspots and attractions, and we'll do everything we can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

Lucas Oil Stadium: 20 minutes / 14 miles
The Indianapolis Zoo: 22 minutes / 14 miles
The Indianapolis Children's Museum: 16 minutes / 12 miles
Monument Circle: 20 minutes / 14 miles

Any evidence of a party or event, including camera footage, excessive garbage, or other evidence will result in a fine of $500.00, legal action, and possible eviction without reimbursement, plus the cost of any extra cleaning or damages that result from the event. We have ring cameras in the front and the back of the house for security purposes.

We kindly remind all guests that tampering with or unplugging Ring cameras is strictly prohibited. These cameras play a vital role in ensuring the security of our premises and protecting both you and our property. Please be aware that any unauthorized interference with the Ring cameras will be taken very seriously. In accordance with our policies and local regulations, guests found engaging in such actions may face fines of up to $500.

Whether you're in town for a convention, hospital visit, or city exploration, our Indianapolis townhome offers the perfect blend of comfort and accessibility. Enjoy modern living in a historic setting, making your short-term stay feel like home.

Wow! A huge two-car garage awaits you. Step inside to find a cozy bedroom with two comfy queen beds, a big 55-inch TV, and a warm gas fireplace - perfect for chilling out. There's also a full bathroom right there for your convenience.

The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to whip up delicious meals. There's even a patio and a half bathroom on this floor.

The master bedroom is a dream come true - a king bed, a luxurious waterfall shower, and a 55-inch TV.
The second bedroom is equally amazing with two queen beds, a private patio, and another 55-inch TV.
The third bedroom is super cute with two twin beds and a 43-inch TV - perfect for kids or extra guests.
There's also another full bathroom in the hallway for added convenience.

Every Queen/King bed has four pillows: two memory foam and two feather pillows for the best sleep ever! All mattresses are 12-inch memory foam - pure comfort!

Whether you're here for work, a convention, or to explore our vibrant city, this townhome is your perfect home away from home. Get ready for an unforgettable stay!

TITLE: Historic Lockerbie Vacation Home

description:
This home has over 6,000+ sq. ft. and 3 stories of living area. Most beds are king and queen sized beds. Throughout the home there are 10 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms. There is plenty of room to set up air mattresses for additional sleeping spaces.

The space
We have everything you need to enjoy the best of downtown Indy!
* Voted BEST DOWNTOWN (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)!!!
* Located downtown Indy in historic LOCKERBIE SQUARE
* Extraordinary home and location to host for special events. Final Four, Big Ten Championships, Colts and Pacers games, Brickyard, Indy 500 just to name a few!
* Steps away from Easley Winery and Sun King Brewery
* Museums, iconic landmarks, zoo and much more located nearby
* Mass. Ave boasts over 415 restaurants, shops, and bars!
* 6,000+ sq. ft. 3 story home with 10 bedrooms / 5 bath
* Space available for additional air mattresses
* Fully equipped and functional large gourmet kitchen
* Gaming Area - Pool table, darts, skeet ball, board games and much more!
* Fully stocked library: Hundreds of books, magazines and DVD's. Vintage record player and records.
* Private office with a desk, copier, fax machine, and computer
* Wi-fi network and 6 plasma TV‚Äôs, with DVD players and cable with over 100 channels!
* Private outside patio with gas grill and fire pit with plenty of tables and chairs

Guest access
There is a fully equipped and functional large kitchen. The kitchen includes all the necessary amenities and kitchenware to host and cook your meals.

6 Plasma TV‚Äôs with DVD players and cable with over 100 channels throughout the home. The great room hosts an in home theater with large plasma TV for your ultimate viewing pleasure. Attached to the great room is a gaming area with pool table, skeet ball, darts, and an array of board games.

There are multiple gathering areas throughout the home, which can easily seat your guests. There is a gas grill on the outside patio in the backyard along with a fire pit and seating for your party.

More than a rental !!! You actually own part of Lockerbie Square, LLC (the company that owns the property), which allows you to receive future ownership use discounts.

Why stay in a motel when you can have all of this for yourself? You can save money and enjoy privacy with plenty of amenities!

Other things to note
$600 per night price includes up to 14 guests. Any additional guests will incur a $40 per guest per night charge.

TITLE: Here Comes the Sun  *Sleeps 16*
Listing Name: Here Comes the Sun *Sleeps 16*
name: Here Comes the Sun *Sleeps 16*
description:
Stay downtown in the house painted like an ombre sunrise with city skyline views from the 3rd floor roof deck.

‚òÄÔ∏èSparkling clean
‚òÄÔ∏èNear downtown, urban setting
‚òÄÔ∏èLots of room - 2 entire townhomes
‚òÄÔ∏èFast Wi-fi on each level
‚òÄÔ∏è2 full kitchens
‚òÄÔ∏è6 bedrooms - 6 full baths
‚òÄÔ∏è2 washer & dryer sets with supplies ‚òÄÔ∏è4 parking spots
‚òÄÔ∏èTouchpad entry

The space
You'll recognize the home immediately when you arrive. It's painted like an ombre sunrise in the front with a soaring three-story black wall in back.

The home is sparkling clean. Our cleaners have certification and have trained to keep you and the house safe. They take extra precautions to wipe all surfaces and highly touched areas.

You are so close to everything going on. Minutes from downtown, Fountain Square, Fletcher Place, Garfield Park, "Mass Ave.", Eli Liliy, the Salesforce Tower and "The Circle", which is the center of the city. Here are some popular destinations:

*Bankers Life Fieldhouse - 1.5 miles, 1.5 minute drive
*Children's Museum of Indianapolis - 6.8 miles, 12 minute drive
*Indiana Convention Center - 1.5 miles, 5 minute drive
*Indianapolis Motor Speedway - 7.5 miles, 14 minute drive
*Lucas Oil Stadium - 1.3 miles - 4 minute drive

The home itself has been renovated. The home has engineered hardwood floors throughout and custom tile that is unique in each bathroom, upgraded plumbing and lighting fixtures. Everything was designed with your stay in mind. The layout has a full bathroom for every bedroom, which is convenient for large groups.

PARKING
There is a gravel parking space behind the home with 4 parking spaces. If you need more parking, on-street parking in the entire neighborhood is free.

You may park in front of the home; however, it is recommended that you park to the west of the home prior to where the street merges. All parking on Sanders Street is also free. Please do no block the alley or block neighbors parking spaces or garages. The neighboring business, Daniel's, has a grassy area that they will allow guests to PAY to park in. Please speak with Daniel's before parking on their property.

ACCESS
Entry to the upper and lower units is through the rear of the home. The black door on the back of the house leads to the upper unit and the yellow door on the back of the house leads to the main level unit. There is also entry from the street to the main level unit. There is an easy touchpad entry for these 3 entry doors..

STAIRS
There is a full flight of stairs to access the upper level. There is a second flight of stairs which lead to the third-level roof deck. To enter the first level, it is only necessary to go up 3 steps. The rear parking area is gravel, which is not smooth. There is a new sidewalk and steps when you enter the back yard that lead to each door.

Two full kitchens include French door refrigerator, oven range (gas upstairs & electric downstairs), microwave/vent, dishwasher, & garbage disposal. Small appliances are on-site for your convenience, including a traditional coffee maker, handheld blender, tea pot, & toaster. There are dishes, silverware, knives, glasses, wine glasses, cooking utensils, and pots & pans. There is an extra large island with bar stools to relax and enjoy appetizers and your favorite beverage with your group.

BATHROOMS
There are 3 full bathrooms upstairs and 3 full bathroom downstairs. All have showers with tubs and a handheld shower.

BEDROOMS
Six bedrooms with queen size mattresses. Four of the bedrooms are en-suite bedrooms, two upstairs and two downstairs.

LIVING ROOM
There is a sleeper sofa with a queen pull-out mattress on each level. There is also a queen size air mattress in the upper level. A 65" smart television is mounted in each of the 2 living areas, login to your subscription apps to watch your favorite shows. And there is separate wi-fi for the upper and lower levels.

DINING ROOM
There is dining room located in-between the living room and kitchen in an open concept area on each level. There is a vaulted ceiling on the second level. Each dining table is set to seat 6 with 6 chairs. However, there is an extra leaf in the master closet for the upstairs table which expands the table to seat 8.

EXTRAS
The washer and dryer with laundry supplies are located on the second level in the hallway closet. There is also a washer and dryer on the main level in the utility closet off the kitchen. Sometimes, due to time constraints, the cleaning crew will leave some linens drying in the dryer. If there are some linens there and you would like to use the washer and dryer, please just move them aside into the basket. Thank you.

There is a pack n' play and a high chair in the master closet upstairs and downstairs.

FIRST AID
There is a first aid kit in the bathroom on each level that opens to the main living area. It is a blue pouch inside the common bath vanity.

If there is an emergency, call 911. Also, the security keypad has emergency buttons to dispatch police, medical or fire assistance The local non-emergency police number is 311 from a mobile phone.

ANYTHING ELSE?
If there is anything else you need for a more enjoyable stay, let me know! I'd be glad to have that available and it might be an amenity that others would enjoy in the future too.

Guest access
You'll have access to the entire home (2 attached townhomes) and the third floor roof deck.

TITLE: Stylish Downtown Urban Escape
Listing Name: Stylish Downtown Urban Escape
name: Stylish Downtown Urban Escape
description:
Indulge in urban style at Naptown Escape, our downtown Indy retreat. This meticulously renovated, 5 BD, 4 BA haven seamlessly blends history with modern elegance.

Unwind in the open-plan living area, leading to a serene screened porch and a gourmet, fully-stocked kitchen.

Entertainment thrives with a game room, while five plush bedrooms promise restful nights. Enjoy the privacy of a fenced yard and a 2-car garage.

2 blocks from Mass Ave and Bottleworks. Your stylish urban escape awaits!

The space
Step into our captivating 5-bedroom residence nestled in the heart of downtown Indianapolis' historic Chatham Arch neighborhood. Meticulously refurbished in 2023, this property radiates sophistication and spaciousness, seamlessly marrying modern indulgence with the allure of nostalgia.

An open floor plan greets you, adorned with a fully-equipped kitchen featuring top-tier Bosch appliances, a convenient walk-in pantry, and two coffee makers. The main floor effortlessly extends to a charming screened-in porch, where an oversized swing, ambient ceiling heaters, and an assortment of games invite you to savor the perfect blend of indoor-outdoor living.

Entertainment flourishes within our abode. A dedicated game room for all ages boasts:

* Wall arcade with thousands of classic games
* Playstation 4 with two controllers and games
* Smart Roku 65" TV with a DVD player
* All-in-one record player with CD and Bluetooth for streaming
* A media library of records, CDs, DVDs and BlueRays
* An array of wall games, board games and card games

Each of our five bedrooms is meticulously appointed, offering plush beds, expansive TVs, USB chargers, portable fans, air purifiers and more for your utmost comfort. Need to catch up on work? Our main floor home office bedroom provides the ideal sanctuary, furnished with a queen-size Murphy bed, versatile sit-down/stand-up desk, an additional monitor, a charging station and all essential office supplies. The primary bedroom and 2 additional bedrooms are on the upper floor.

Beyond the opulent interiors, our property extends to a private, fully fenced yard graced with lush turf, crafting a tranquil oasis amidst the city's vibrant bustle. Enjoy the added convenience of a 2-car detached garage and a laundry room equipped with a washer and dryer, ensuring your stay is both seamless and indulgent.

Location-wise, you're ensconced in the lively heart of the Chatham Arch neighborhood, mere steps away from the lively Mass Ave and the trendy Bottleworks district. Immerse yourself in the cultural tapestry of downtown Indianapolis, a city renowned for its artistic exhibits, the enchanting Cultural Trail, thrilling sports events, lively festivals, and an array of unique dining experiences. Within 5 blocks, you can:

* Dine at the award-winning Food Garage with a dozen restaurants and bars
* Visit Pins Mechanical for pin bowling, pinball, foosball, full bar and more
* Sip and stroll at various wine bars
* Indulge at Woodhouse Spa or Drybar
* Shop at many of the locally owned, unique stores

Whether your visit is motivated by business or leisure, our home promises an unparalleled fusion of sophistication, comfort, and convenience. Indulge in an unforgettable stay amidst the dynamic energy of this city, where every moment is crafted for an experience that lingers in your memory.

We want to take great care of you on your vacation and have proven it by:

* Achieving SuperHost status
* Beating similar listings in the area in quality rating by almost 15%
* Averaging 4.99 Star Rating across all properties
* Perfecting guest communication with 5.0 rating on 100% of stays over the past year

Please contact us if you have any questions!

Best,
Hilda and KC

Guest access
Guests can access all of the rooms of the home, garage, front and backyard.

Other things to note
This home is located in a residential neighborhood where quiet hours are strictly enforced from 10pm to 7am.

Cameras have been added to the front door and garage entry for safety purposes and to prevent parties and unregistered guests in the home. Cameras are motion detecting and will record the front door and vehicle entry to the garage at all times. Parties will be shut down immediately.

There are two sound and smoke detectors in the main level and basement of the home. These sensors will alert the owners if there are either very loud noises or smoke from cigarettes, vape pens or other smoking devices.

Absolutely no smoking of any kind inside. Smoking in the home will result in a minimum fee of $500 for deodorization.

name: Spacious Duplex for 14 in Indianapolis
description:
Welcome to this spacious duplex in downtown Indianapolis, perfect for groups up to 14.
- Two kitchens and stocked coffee bars
- Smart TVs and fast WiFi
- Fenced backyard for privacy
- Clean bathrooms with toiletries
- Pet-friendly for two dogs under 50 pounds
- Close to Fountain Square, Lucas Oil, and top museums
This home has your essentials for your getaway in Indianapolis and we look forward to hosting you.

The space
Welcome to this spacious duplex home located in the desirable Bates-Hendricks neighborhood of downtown Indianapolis. Perfect for large groups of up to 14 guests, this property offers a cozy and comfortable setting for your stay in one of the best cities in the Midwest. Enjoy easy access to popular destinations such as Fountain Square, Lucas Oil Stadium, and the Indiana Convention Center, all just minutes away.

This well-appointed duplex features two separate living spaces within one property, providing ample room and privacy for everyone. Wake up to a stocked coffee bar, unwind with a smart TV in the living area, and take advantage of fast WiFi throughout. Whether you're here for a family outing or a group getaway, this home has all the essentials you need for a pleasant stay in Indianapolis.

Comfortable Accommodation:
- Entire duplex home accommodating up to 14 guests across two sides
- Each side features a comfortable living room with seating for six, perfect for group gatherings
- Primary bedrooms have spacious king beds with TVs, located on the second level
- Two additional bedrooms per side with queen beds and high-quality linens
- Both sides include two bathrooms, one on the main level and one upstairs, stocked with shampoo, body wash, and conditioner
- One king-size bed on each side adds comfort for guests

Interior Feeling:
- Cozy ambiance designed for relaxation and group comfort
- Fully equipped kitchens on both sides with essentials for cooking needs
- Stocked coffee bars on each side to start your day right
- Smart TVs in living areas for entertainment
- Clean, well-maintained bathrooms for convenience
- Digital locks for secure and easy entry
- Comfortable living and dining areas to accommodate your entire group

Outdoor Bliss:
- Spacious, fenced backyard ideal for outdoor activities and privacy
- Additional parking available behind the garage for one extra vehicle
- Street parking accessible for guests

Delightful Dining:
- Kitchens equipped with necessary cooking essentials
- Seating for the whole group to dine comfortably in each kitchen area
- Note: One side of the duplex does not have a dishwasher

Professional Cleaning:
- Clean linens provided for all bedrooms
- Bathrooms maintained with necessary toiletries for guest use

Pet Policy:
- Welcomes up to two dogs under 50 pounds
- Guests are requested to inform owners about bringing pets when booking

Location Highlights:
- Within walking distance to Ringgold Park, Nine Lives Cat Cafe, Indy All Night, and Fountain Square Brewing Co
- Short driving distances to Fountain Square, Lucas Oil Stadium, Indiana Convention Center, Massachusetts Avenue, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, Indianapolis Zoo, The Children's Museum of Indianapolis, Newfields, Indiana State Fairgrounds, Indianapolis Motor Speedway, and the airport

Indianapolis offers diverse attractions including the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, home to the famous Indy 500 and racing museum; The Children's Museum of Indianapolis, the largest in the world featuring interactive exhibits; and the Indiana State Museum with cultural and natural history displays. Enjoy scenic strolls and events at White River State Park or explore the rich arts collections at the Eiteljorg Museum. Downtown landmarks like the Soldiers and Sailors Monument add historic charm, while Newfields offers art and landscaped gardens for a relaxing visit.

This home has your essentials for your getaway in Indianapolis and we look forward to hosting you.

Your downtown adventure starts here!

The space
Spacious 5-Bedroom, 3-Story Home Near Downtown Indianapolis

Welcome to this newly updated 3,200 sq ft home designed especially for large groups and Airbnb stays. Located just about 1 mile from the Convention Center, Lucas Oil Stadium, Bankers Life Fieldhouse, and Eli Lilly, you‚Äôll enjoy easy access to downtown‚Äôs top attractions.

The Space
Relax on the comfy front porch before stepping inside to a cozy living area with two couches (one a fold-out memory foam sleeper), a reclining chair, and a 65‚Äù TV‚Äîperfect for hanging out after a day exploring Indy.

Next, head to the social ping pong room, followed by the dining room and fully equipped kitchen. The first floor also includes a laundry area with two washers and a dryer, plus a full bathroom. (Note: No bedrooms are on the first floor.)

Upstairs on the second floor, you‚Äôll find four spacious bedrooms:

Bedroom 1: 2 queen beds, a futon, and an attached full bathroom
Bedroom 2: King bed, located across from a full bathroom
Bedroom 3: 2 queen beds, connected by a curtain to Bedroom 4
Bedroom 4: Full bed, sharing space with Bedroom 3
The third floor features a unique studio-style fifth bedroom with a queen and twin bed, plus a living area with two couches, a TV, and a poker table.

Step out the back dining room door to a large driveway with parking for 2+ cars. The house also includes a brand-new ping pong table and a poker table in the third-floor studio, making it perfect for fun and relaxation.

Please note: This is an older home that has been thoughtfully remodeled to combine classic charm with modern comfort.

Whether you‚Äôre visiting for business, family, or a reunion, this spacious home offers everything you need for a memorable stay in Indianapolis!

As a reminder there are NO bedrooms on the first floor. Only a fold out couch. 4 of the bedrooms are on the second floor. Keep in mind Bedrooms 3 and 4 are connected and separated by a curtain (these are the rooms with 2 queens and 1 full bed). The 5th bedroom is on the 3rd floor.

Guest access
Access is by smart lock and guests will be provided a code.

Other things to note
2 Washers and 2 Dryers in the house. Stocked Kitchen. Ironing board and iron, hair dryers in each bathroom, ceiling or table top fans in all bedrooms for your comfort. Plenty of areas with mirrors for getting ready. Large tv's in Great room and 4 of the bedrooms. YouTube TV and Netflix. Note the third and fourth bedrooms connect to each other. Also please note this is a large house designed for accommodating bigger groups. If you are looking for a luxurious rental this may not be the place for you. It is an older home that has been remodeled for purposes of hosting larger groups who want to stay together.

description:
Experience cozy, comfort, and convenience in this 4BR, 3BA, 2200+ sf family friendly Misty Lake House. Our home was designed with family and group getaways in mind. With a private backyard, multiple living spaces, and modern amenities, it's the perfect getaway while still being accessible to downtown Indianapolis.

‚úî Spacious Dog Friendly
‚úî Smart Home Technology
‚úî Relaxing Fully Fenced Outdoor Private Space
‚úî Fully Equipped Kitchen + Separate Dining Room
‚úî Free Parking

Learn more below!

The space
Welcome to "The Misty Lake House". Scan the QR code located on the photo with the front view of the house to explore this two-story oasis.

‚òÖ‚òÖ KEY FEATURES‚òÖ‚òÖ
*5 bedrooms: 1 king, 3 queens, bunk bed (2 full, and a twin trundle), daybed with trundle (2 twin)
*3 bathrooms: separate tub and walk-in shower in the master bedroom, and tubs + shower combo
*Spacious kitchen area w/stainless steel appliances
*Bright, airy living spaces with modern furniture & smart TVs
*Big, fenced-in backyard and access to Misty Lake
*Outdoor spaces with BBQ grill
*Dogs welcome
*Plenty of parking

‚òÖ‚òÖ THE SPACE‚òÖ‚òÖ

The first living area on the left side of this spacious two-story oasis features a daybed with a trundle and a TV. Please note: The first living area can be converted into a 5th bedroom.

The dining room, with seating for up to 8 (more if rearranged slightly), leads to the fully equipped kitchen. The second living area, complete with a 50" Fire TV and a cozy sectional, is perfect for relaxation.

Upstairs, you'll find four bedrooms. The master bedroom features an en-suite bathroom with a separate tub and shower. For younger guests, there's a bunk bed bedroom with a trundle. We cannot control the weather and no refunds will be given due to trip cancellations, interruptions, or inconveniences caused due to unforeseeable weather conditions; therefore, we recommend the purchase of travel insurance for all planned vacations. We kindly ask that you respect the home and its belongings for future guests and your return visits. Unauthorized guests and/or extra guests staying overnight at the property may result in immediate eviction/dismissal without any refunds.

‚òÖ FREE CLEANING DURING THE EXTENDED STAY ‚òÖ
Cleaning is once per month (e.g., for a 2 month stay, cleaning at midway and upon checkout will be free). Free cleaning following your stay. 30+ days rental will require additional information, approval and sign a rental agreement.

‚òÖ NO ICE OR FILTERED WATER ‚òÖ
We do not guarantee ice or filtered water for drinking.

Thank you very much for your understanding.

For parking, the house includes a one-car garage and an additional driveway spot. There is also ample street parking available in front of the house.

This house is designed to provide a premium experience, combining comfort, convenience, and luxury. Whether you're visiting for business, a sports event, or a city getaway, our home offers the perfect base for your Indianapolis adventures. ‚ù§ ENTRANCE & SURROUNDING AREA

TITLE: Spacious Downtown Indy Home ‚Äì Perfect for Groups

description:
Welcome to our charming home in the heart of Indianapolis! Just minutes from the Convention Center, Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, Bottleworks District, and Mass Ave, our location is perfect for exploring. Enjoy modern comforts in a historic setting with a cozy living area, a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable bedrooms, a modern bathroom, street parking, free coffee, and fast wifi. Book now for an unforgettable experience

The space
Welcome to our spacious and charming house, a unique and comfortable retreat in the heart of Indianapolis! Built in 2024, our home combines modern amenities with the character of traditional homes, offering the perfect place for groups and families to relax and enjoy downtown Indy. A busy road behind the house brings the sounds of city life, adding to the vibrant atmosphere.

Property Features:

Master Bedroom (First Floor):
The master suite is located on the first floor and features a king-sized bed, an en-suite master bathroom with a walk-in closet, and a TV for your convenience.

Second Bedroom (Second Floor):
This spacious room comes with two queen beds and a large private bathroom, as well as a TV for entertainment.

Third Bedroom (Second Floor):
A fun and functional room with a bunk bed setup, featuring two queen-sized beds and a TV.

Fourth Bedroom (Second Floor):
This cozy room has a single queen bed and its own TV.

Fifth Bedroom (Second Floor):
Located near the upstairs patio, this room is perfect for single sleepers and comes with two twin beds. Games are affixed to the wall, offering a fun and interactive space.

Bathrooms:

Master Bathroom: Attached to the master bedroom, with a walk-in closet and all the essentials.
In Suite Bath: Located in the Queens room, this bath is stocked with everything you would need to get ready for the day, or unwind.
Upstairs Full Bath: A full bathroom is conveniently located near the washer and dryer on the second floor.
Half Bath: A convenient half bath is located on the first floor in the hallway.

Living Area:
Entering through the back patio, you will be introduced to the lovely large Living room.

Kitchen:
The fully stocked kitchen has everything you need to prepare meals, and we‚Äôve provided complimentary coffee to help you start your mornings right.

Games:
Enjoy games throughout the house, perfect for family fun or relaxing downtime between exploring the city.

Parking:
Parking is available behind the house in an open lot, or you can find street parking in the front for your convenience.

Laundry:
For your convenience, the house includes a full-size washer and dryer located near the bathrooms.

Our newly built house is ideally located near top attractions, including the Indianapolis Convention Center, Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, the $300M Bottleworks District, and the vibrant Mass Ave. Whether you're in town for an event or simply looking to explore, this home offers the perfect blend of comfort, modern amenities, and a prime downtown location. Book your stay today and experience the best of Indianapolis!

Guest access
Guests will have full access to the main house.

Other things to note
While we allow up to 16 guests, it is up to the group to decide if their group size will fit comfortably. Please read and understand the layout of the house.

PLEASE PROVIDE AN AFFIRMATIVE RESPONSE TO THE FOLLOWING:

‚Ä¢ Underage teenagers trying to throw a party is not allowed. I will show up with the police and press charges. ($500 fine)
‚Ä¢ NO smoking inside the house or garage. Smoking outside is completely ok. ($500 fine)
‚Ä¢ NO use of firearms or fireworks on the premises. ($500 fine)
‚Ä¢ All damage will be considered intentional/reckless if not reported via email/messenger or phone.
‚Ä¢ No pets on the furniture please. Please make sure to clean up after your pets. Owners are responsible for pet damage.
‚Ä¢A determination will be made as to whether any damage was intentional/reckless or accidental. Guests will accept responsibility for any non-accidental issues and will be charged for compensation. Shit happens and we are not here to nickel and dime you. This is meant for reckless activity.
‚Ä¢ No bookings for guest under the age of 25
‚Ä¢ You are limited to the number of guests on the reservation plus 2. If you would like more just confirm first.
‚Ä¢ Unless receiving prior approval, check-in , and check-out must be followed for cleaning, maintenance, and other bookings. ($40/hour fine)


Check out instructions:

1. Beds - Please strip all used beds or leave them unmade. If you choose to strip the bed, place the sheets on the mattress or in the laundry basket (if provided).
2. Dishes - Ensure all dishes are washed. Running the dishwasher is perfectly acceptable; just make sure to remove any food from the dishes before starting it.
3. Trash - Gather and throw away all trash. Extra trash bags are located at the bottom of the trash can or under the sink.
4. Refrigerator - Dispose of any leftover food in the refrigerator. Our cleaners will take any unopened food, beer, or water.
5. Towels (Optional but Appreciated) - If possible, please start a load of used towels in the washer. Use bleach on white loads only and use laundry detergent, and run the washer on hot.
6. Early Checkout - If you check out early, please send us a message so we can send our cleaners over. We will also send a message tomorrow; if you will be there until checkout time, feel free to ignore it.

TITLE: Pop Culture Container Home - rooftop & greenhouse
Listing Name: Pop Culture Container Home - rooftop & greenhouse
name: Pop Culture Container Home - rooftop & greenhouse
description:
‚ÄúThe Shadowbox" pop culture container home in downtown Indianapolis is one of three container homes located on the lot. The home is comprised of 7 shipping containers with an added greenhouse & rooftop deck overlooking the city skyline. The floor to ceiling windows on the first & second floor both face & provide a unique perspective of Fall Creek River. The home has a large back yard. Plenty of comics, action figures & games to keep you entertained throughout your stay.

The space
The first floor is an open layout which houses the kitchen, dining room & living room. As you walk in, you will notice the mellow greyscale paint scheme, black lighting fixtures, dark grey cabinetry & stunning black granite counters. The whites & greys flowing through the granite counters resembles a glimpse into the cosmos. The floor to ceiling windows on the first floor bring a ton of natural light into this bat cave like area. You will notice two skateboard decks by renowned artists, Takashi Murakami & Felipe Pantone. The pop culture art helps to bring some pops of color to this home. You are being watched by the Joker in the living room... so behave. The living room sofa, surrounding sofa chairs & 65" TV all help to create a perfect movie spot for the group.

The slatted woodwork is the highlight of the custom staircase as you head up to the second floor. There are two bedrooms, a greenhouse & a shared full bathroom on the second floor. Each bedroom is fitted with a 14" memory foam mattress & floating headboard. The bedrooms in The Gotham all feature pop culture art. Try to point out every movie, show & game that you recognize. Can you get them all?! Also, don't forget to take advantage of the lava lamps during your nighttime reading.

My favorite feature of this container home is the greenhouse overlooking Fall Creek. The greenhouse is stocked with plenty of tropical plants which makes for the perfect urban jungle. The 40 ft, 8 ft wide greenhouse provides seating for 6, a yoga mat, a record player, record collection as well as action figures, nerf guns & plenty of comic books. Grab a record & a comic book and truly relax as you enjoy Fall Creek & this natural green escape in downtown Indy. Fall Creek is home to many bird species & animals in general. I am extremely fond of the blue herons, hawks & occasional bald eagle. I've also seen deer, groundhogs, turtles & one coyote. Let me know what you see.

Take your time heading up the diagonal spiral staircase as you enter the entertainment space on the 3rd floor right outside of the master bedroom. This entertainment space is decked out with 2 digital pinball machines, a Nintendo 64 & a stellar BluRay collection if I do say so myself (my old collection) to enjoy on the mounted 50" TV. Have fun playing in the arcade & please let me know if you are able to crack my high score on Spiderman... it'll be tough.

Lastly, head on up to the 480 sq. ft. rooftop deck with seating for 9 and 360 degree views of downtown Indianapolis. It is truly an incredible vantage point of the city skyline, nearby neighborhoods & of course, Fall Creek. The rooftop is fitted with grass turf which makes it comfortable to walk on, do some yoga or hit an early morning workout.

Ruoff Music Center -> 19 miles

Guest access
You have access to the entire home & you will be given 3 designated parking spots.

Other things to note
NO PARTIES. Zero tolerance.

TITLE: Stunning luxury home in lively Fountain Square
Listing Name: Stunning luxury home in lively Fountain Square
name: Stunning luxury home in lively Fountain Square
description:
Experience Indy as a local in this beautiful luxury family home located in the Fountain Square neighborhood of downtown Indianapolis. The home is 1.5 miles from Lucas Oil Stadium and the Indiana Convention Center (8 minute drive).

The space
Walk up the front steps from the street and onto the large inviting porch of this beautiful home. Inside guests will be greeted by the bright and modern open-concept living area with a large Samsung Frame smart TV, Marshall Bluetooth speaker and plenty of space for guests to relax and hang out. The stunning kitchen and dining area is perfect for guests to prepare anything from a small bite to a large family meal and features a large dining table which has seating for 6. Don't forget to make time to prepare a coffee at the coffee bar using the Nespresso Vertuoline coffee machine. And please feel free to utilize the separate wine fridge ready for unwinding in the evening.

Just off of the living area is the convenient downstairs king bedroom which has private access to the full downstairs bathroom as well as its own access to the back porch and yard. A separate laundry room with a new Samsung washer & dryer set is also located on the main floor.

Heading upstairs, the second floor has a queen bedroom and a king bedroom, both with smart TV's and dedicated closets. The stylish full family bathroom is located at the top of the stairs. Additionally, the show-stopping, huge master suite is located towards the front of the house on the second floor and boasts a comfortable king bed, smart TV, large California closet, and a double vanity, separate toilet room and large walk-in double shower in the en-suite bathroom.

Heading upstairs again to the third floor, guests will find themselves in a magnificent second living area with another large smart TV and a huge, comfortable sofa for the whole crew to get comfy and watch a movie. There is also a dedicated workspace with a comfortable chair, desk and modern monitor with HDMI for guests to use.

The front porch sitting area and back porches and patio are all available for guests to enjoy as well as making use of the large fenced in back yard. Guests also have access to the oversized double garage to the rear of the property which can be accessed through the pedestrian door from the back yard, or via the overhead garage door from the alleyway behind. Guests with a Tesla (EV) are welcome to use the Tesla Wall Connector charger located in the double garage.

Guest access
Guests will have the entire home to themselves. Access is via a smart keypad lock and guests can park on the street right out front (it's a quiet street so there's normally ample parking) or in the double garage to the rear.

Other things to note
1. Please be aware that the stairs to the second floor are original to the home (early 1900‚Äôs) and are slightly steeper than your average staircase so please be careful.

2. Please be respectful of the neighbors, especially when using outdoor spaces.

3. Please note that the outdoor furniture and amenities are seasonal and will be stored away during the cold winter months (please contact us if you have any questions).

4. Please familiarize yourself with our Cancellation Policy prior to booking. We strictly adhere to our policies and always encourage guests to purchase optional travel insurance to cover unanticipated changes in travel plans. Hosts are not be responsible for issuing refunds due to changes made outside of the cancellation policy.

TITLE: Boho Container Home - rooftop deck & greenhouse
Listing Name: Boho Container Home - rooftop deck & greenhouse
name: Boho Container Home - rooftop deck & greenhouse
description:
"The Zion" is a modern boho themed container home featuring earthy tones, wordly decor & animal art. It is one of three container homes located on the lot. The home is comprised of 7 shipping containers with an added greenhouse & rooftop deck. The floor to ceiling windows on the first & second floor both face & provide a unique perspective of Fall Creek River. The rooftop deck provides a view of the city skyline as well as scenic views of the river, nearby bridges & green canopy.

The space
The first floor is an open layout which houses the kitchen, dining room & living room. As you walk into The Marley, you will immediately feel the earthy tones. From the light green walls to the grey speckled granite & natural wood grain cabinets, you will feel a deeper connection to the natural elements of this space. The floor to ceiling windows help to illuminate the earthy & positive vibrations. The dining room features two standout art pieces. First, the red orb, which I view as the 'heartbeat of the home', was completed by local Indy artist, Stuart Alter. Second, the 5 skateboard decks featuring Andy Warhol's famous skull. Both help to add some color & soul to the space. The living room seats 7 comfortably & includes a mounted 65" TV. If you get too comfortable here, that's okay. The green sofa converts to sleeper sofa.

The slatted woodwork is the highlight of the custom staircase as you head up to the second floor. There are two bedrooms, a greenhouse & a shared full bathroom on the second floor. You will notice plenty of animal art spread out between the hallways & bedrooms. The canvas' were captured by myself back in 2012 & the vibrant framed prints are from renowned Pittsburgh artist, Baron Batch. Each bedroom is fitted with a medium firm memory foam mattress & floating headboard.

My favorite feature of this container home is the greenhouse overlooking Fall Creek. The greenhouse is stocked with plenty of tropical plants which makes for the perfect urban jungle. The 40 ft long, 8 foot wide greenhouse provides seating for 6, a yoga mat, a record player & other fun touches. You will notice all the trinkets from my trips to Africa. Those trips definitely helped to inspire the vibe of this home. Grab the Bob Marley record & enjoy this pocket of nature & greenery in downtown Indy. Fall Creek is home to many bird species & animals in general. I am extremely fond of the blue herons, hawks & occasional bald eagle. I've also seen deer, groundhogs, turtles & one coyote. Let me know what you see.

Take your time heading up the diagonal spiral staircase as you enter the entertainment space on the 3rd floor right outside of the master bedroom. Chill out in the sofa chairs & watch some TV on the 50" flatscreen or play some shuffleboard if you're feeling competitive. The master bedroom includes a 14" memory foam Queen mattress as well as a fully tiled shower & bathroom.

Lastly, head on up to the 480 sq. ft. rooftop deck with seating for 9 and 360 degree views of downtown Indianapolis. It is truly an incredible vantage point of the city skyline, nearby neighborhoods & of course, Fall Creek. The rooftop is fitted with grass turf which makes it comfortable to walk on, do some yoga or hit an early morning workout.

Proximity to popular destinations:

Convention Center -> 3.8 miles
Bottleworks District -> 1.9 miles
Lucas Oil Stadium -> 4.1 miles
Gainbridge Fieldhouse -> 3.4 miles
Old National/Egyptian Room -> 2.5 miles
Fairgrounds -> 1.8 miles
Indianapolis Motor Speedway -> 5.9 miles
Broad Ripple -> 4.4 miles
TCU Amphitheater -> 4.3 miles
Fountain Square -> 4 miles
Ruoff Music Center -> 19 miles

Please ask about any venue & I will let you know the proximity.

Guest access
You have access to the entire home & you will be given 3 designated parking spots.

Other things to note
NO PARTIES. 0 tolerance.

Guest access

Other things to note
House Rules & Guidelines

We want you to have a great stay while respecting our home and neighborhood. Please review the guidelines below to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience. By confirming your booking, you acknowledge that you are aware of the house rules and guidelines and agree to adhere to them.

Check-In:

- Check-in is available anytime after 4:00 PM.

- Early check-in may be available if cleaning is completed‚Äîplease reach out in advance.

- Keyless entry details will be sent before arrival. If arriving late, please be mindful of noise levels.

During Your Stay:

-The person making the reservation be one of the guests staying & must be at least 25 years old.

- One car can be parked directly in front of the house in the available street parking. Additional fenced private parking is available in the backyard, accommodating up to three cars.

- To respect our neighbors, please limit street parking to one car directly in front of the house and avoid parking multiple vehicles.

- Quiet hours: 10:00 PM - 7:00 AM‚Äî All outdoor activities must end by 10 PM, and loud talking, music, or any other noise should be kept to a minimum between 10 PM and 7 AM out of respect for our neighbors.

- No parties or large gatherings are allowed beyond the maximum guest limit. The number of guests must match what was specified during the booking, any additional guest will incur a fee of 50$ per guest.

- No smoking indoors or on the wooden deck outdoors‚Äîuse designated outdoor areas by the eggshell pergola. Cigarette butts must be disposed of in garbage cans and not left on the ground. Any additional cleaning involving cigarette butts left in the gravel or outdoors will result in a 500$ fee.

- Pets require prior approval and a $35 per pet per night fee. We welcome friendly, house-trained dogs (maximum of 2).

- Please ensure you clean up after your dogs, including picking up pet waste outside. Any extra cleaning from this will result in a 500$ fee.

- No cats allowed on the premises due to potential allergy concerns.

-For security purposes, there are exterior cameras on the property. There are cameras that cover the entire backyard, and additional cameras are positioned at the front of the house. These cameras are monitored and store recordings. There are no cameras inside the house. Any tampering with these security devices will result in a 1000$ fee.

- Do not tamper with safety equipment (smoke detectors, security cameras etc.). Will result in a 1000$ fee.

- There is a noise monitoring system inside the house that records noise levels but does not record conversations or specific sounds. Any tampering with the device will result in a 500$ fee.

- Swimwear is required when using the hot tub. Please ensure proper attire for hygiene and comfort. Not using the proper attire will result in a 500$ fee.

- No glitter or confetti is allowed in the house, as it is extremely difficult to clean. Additionally, nothing may be nailed or taped to the walls.

-Guests are responsible for logging out of their streaming accounts on the TV before checkout, as the cleaners will not do this. Please note that the TV does not have cable or an antenna‚Äîonly streaming services like Netflix, Hulu, etc.

- The guest who booked is responsible for any damage to the house caused by themselves, their guests, or any dogs brought. This includes the cost of repairing or replacing items such as appliances, furniture, bedding, d√©cor, and more. Additionally, guests will be responsible for replacing any items that are missing after their stay.

- If extra cleaning is required beyond a standard cleaning‚Äîsuch as excessive trash, furniture moved, or an unusually large number of dishes to be washed‚Äîan additional $100 deep cleaning fee will apply.

- Check-out by 10:00 AM; late check-out must be requested by 9 PM the night before.

- $40 per hour fee for late check-out (if available), plus - $99 charge for late requests. Failure to follow check-out rules may result in an extra night‚Äôs charge.

-It is the booking guest‚Äôs responsibility to share these rules with their group, and it is ultimately their responsibility to make sure they are followed.

- The host is not responsible for situations out of their control such as internet or power going out and it will not incur a refund given for such uncontrollable events.

- Traveling incurs a natural risk no matter what. If your travel plans require a cancellation due to sickness (COVID, etc) or weather delay (cancelled flights, etc), a refund cannot be given so we highly suggest you book CFAR (Cancel For Any Reason) insurance.

- The property only provides what is listed on Airbnb. Any additional items needed should be brought by the guest, as they will not be provided during your stay.

- The kitchen is equipped with cooking utensils, cookware, a toaster, kettle, baking pan, knives, a cutting board, and spices. Plates, glasses, and cups are also provided. If you need anything that is not listed or specific cookware for certain dishes, please bring these items with you.

Check-Out:

- Check-out is by 10:00 AM. If you need extra time, we may be able to accommodate based on prior bookings, but you must provide advance notice by 9 PM the night before to coordinate with our housekeepers.

Late Check-Out Fees:

- A $40 per hour fee applies, provided there is no same-day check-in.

- If we do not receive timely notice, an additional $99 charge will be applied on top of the hourly rate.

- All late check-outs must be approved by the Host.

- Failure to comply with property guidelines, resulting in delays in preparing the home for the next guest, will incur a charge equivalent to an additional day‚Äôs rate. Rates may vary.

Before You Leave, We Kindly Ask That You:

- Load and run the dishwasher.
- Leave used towels in the bathroom.
- Dispose of trash in the provided bins.
- Ensure all doors and windows are locked.
- Put any moved items back in their original spot.

Disclosures

- The hot tub sits next to a wooden pergola. Do not use the pergola to support your weight while getting in or out of the hot tub, as it is not designed to hold body weight. Mind your head while getting in the hot tub if you are tall. Do not hang on any pergolas in the backyard‚Äîany damages will be addressed and incur a 1000$ fee.

description:
Indulge a little with this huge private backyard, tankless water heater for long showers in the waterfall shower head, modern tiled bathrooms, lofted ceilings, all king sized beds, TVs in every bedroom, master suite with blackout curtains and separate HVAC for deep sleep, and well stocked supplies throughout.

Centrally located on the north side of Indianapolis with convenient access to everything Indy has to offer. You'll be less than 1 mile to US 31 and 465 for an easy in and easy out drive.

The space
Location:
The house is located right inside the major highway loop, 465, just off of Meridian & 96th street. This quaint little neighborhood in the far north side of Indianapolis will have everything you need. The popular Monon Trail is less than a mile away and is great for walking & biking. All of the essentials are within a mile or two as well - Target, Kroger, Aldi, Whole Foods & Total Wine. The city of Carmel is just up the road, Broad Ripple is a short 10 minute drive down College Ave, & just 10 miles south is the center of downtown Indianapolis.

Grand Park - 11 miles / 15 minutes
Ruoff Music Center - 20 miles / 24 minutes
Lucas Oil Stadium - 12 miles / 28 minutes
Gainbridge Fieldhouse - 12 miles / 28 minutes
Indianapolis International Airport - 26 miles / 27 minutes
Broad Ripple - 4 miles / 12 minutes

The House:
You'll enter the house through a private front door along a large front deck.

Inside you'll find a large living space open to a grand dining space and the kitchen with a large breakfast bar and ample counter space. The living and dining space is filled with large windows & dual sliding glass doors that open up to your own private patio and backyard with full privacy fence.

The bedrooms branch off from the dining room allowing for a quiet space while others might still be up. Each bedroom is equipped with its own TV (not pictured). The master bedroom connects to a private full master bathroom with a walk in tile shower and plenty of natural, yet private, light. Each of the two full bathrooms are well equipped with towels and soaps.

Some of the other amenities you'll find include a washer and dryer equipped with detergent and dryer sheets, a generous amount of coffee, snacks, and sparkling water, a large couch for you to relax on, and a TV equipped with Roku for all your streaming needs.

Access:
After booking, you will receive a personalized access code to the smart lock on the front door. This allows for seamless access during your stay.

Guest access
You'll have access to private parking in the driveway, a large front yard, the main house itself, and the huge backyard with a private patio during your stay.

Entry into the house will be via a unique entry code for the smart lock on the front door. This will be available in your Airbnb reservation before your check in date.

Other things to note
This property has a detached guest house that is completely separated from the main house with a large privacy fence and separate parking. The guest house is also rented out but does not interfere with the privacy or seclusion of the main house!

We have a strict no party or event policy. We will charge a $500 fee if a party or event is hosted at the property.

The space
Discover a truly unique property nestled on the rolling hills of our expansive 60-acre estate in Indianapolis. Well water supplied with softener for drinking quality

Multiple Airbnb rentals on the property, each with its own backyard, fire pit, and grill

-IMPORTANT: Parties and events are strictly prohibited.

-Pets are allowed for $150 fee plus $50 for each additional pet., please keep leashed in common areas.

-For your safety and security reasons, our homes (not all) have motion detectors and a security system, including exterior cameras.

-As mandated by the City, we have installed noise detection equipment in both the backyard and the living room. These devices specifically only captures and records decibel levels.

-Please note the check-in and check-out times. We can typically accommodate requests for early check-ins / late check-outs, but we can only confirm such requests 48 hours before the date requested. The reason is we potentially have other guests coming in or leaving the same day, and cleaners typically need around 5 hours.

‚Äî IMPORTANT: please read and agree to all house rules.

‚Äî No smoking of any kind is allowed on our property. Marijuana is illegal in Indiana. If our cleaners smell smoke, you will be charged a fine starting at $300.00. We care deeply about the health and wellbeing of our guests and smoke of any kind leaves a smell for the guests after you.

‚Äî If you want early check-in or late check-out, please reach out 48 hours prior to your arrival date. Availability is dependent on whether there is another same day check-in/check-out and may be subject to a $75 fee. Unapproved late checkout will result in a $100 charge.

‚Äî Pets 30 lbs. or less are allowed for an additional $150 fee, plus $50 per additional pet

Parties and Events - Parties and events are strictly prohibited. Quiet hours, which start at 10 pm, are strictly observed. To ensure that our guests do not exceed a certain volume level and disturb our neighbors, we use a NoiseAware decibel level monitoring device. They are located in the home's common area. Any evidence of a party or event, including camera footage, excessive garbage, or other evidence will result in a fine of $500.00, legal action, and possible eviction without reimbursement, plus the cost of any extra cleaning or damages that result from the event. We have ring cameras in the front and the back of the house for security purposes.

We kindly remind all guests that tampering with or unplugging Ring cameras is strictly prohibited. These cameras play a vital role in ensuring the security of our premises and protecting both you and our property. Please be aware that any unauthorized interference with the Ring cameras will be taken very seriously. In accordance with our policies and local regulations, guests found engaging in such actions may face fines of up to $500.

description:
Located in a prime spot with easy access to downtown Indy and the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, this home offers quick access to major interstates, with everything you need within a 20-minute drive. After a busy day, unwind in the peaceful outdoor space, perfect for relaxing or enjoying the fresh air. Whether you're here for a race, business, or a city getaway, this home provides a quiet, comfortable spot to recharge and make the most of your time in Indianapolis.

The space
The spacious kitchen opens into the dining area and living room. The kitchen features a breakfast bar that seats three, and the dining table comfortably seats eight. The large living room includes a cozy fireplace and a curved smart TV with access to streaming services. Every bedroom is equipped with a smart TV and streaming options for your convenience.

As we live in this home, it is fully stocked with everything you‚Äôll need during your stay. We‚Äôll lock up our personal belongings and will not be present while you enjoy the space.

Bedroom Layout:
The master bedroom (Bedroom 1) and ensuite bathroom (Bathroom 1) is the only bedroom located on the first floor, offering added privacy.

House Rules & Additional Notes:
The washer and dryer are not available for guest use.
This home is not suitable for young children.
No parties or events allowed.
No parking or driving on the lawn.

Whether you're in town for a race, a work trip, or a city getaway, this home offers a comfortable and peaceful retreat.

Guest access
Keyless Entry:
You‚Äôll receive a code for keyless entry upon booking and have access to the entire home until checkout.

Parking:
The driveway can accommodate up to four cars. Please refrain from parking or driving on the lawn. Additional parking is available in the lot across the street if needed.

Access Restrictions:
Please note that there are a few locked doors within the home that are off-limits to guests. Additionally, the basement and the washer and dryer are not accessible during your stay.

Let us know if you have any questions or need further assistance!

Other things to note
House Rules & Important Information:

No Parties or Events:
A $1,000 fee will be charged if a party or event is held without written consent from the hosts.

Guest List:
All guests staying at the property must be listed on the reservation. A $200 fee will be charged for any unregistered guests found in the home.

Dishwashing & Trash:
Please place all dirty dishes in the dishwasher (do not leave them in the sink) and take out all trash, placing it in the outdoor bin. A $100 cleaning fee will be charged if dishes are left outside the dishwasher or trash is left in the home.

Master Closet:
The Master Closet is off-limits to guests, but alternative storage space will be provided for your clothes and personal items.

Strict No-Smoking Policy:
There is a strict no-smoking policy. A $150 room recovery fee will be charged for smoking in the home or garage to cover the cost of restoring the space to a smoke-free condition.

Parking:
Please do not park or drive on the lawn. A $500 damage fee will be charged for any damage caused to the yard from cars parking or driving on it.

Hot Tub:
The hot tub is a short walk in the back yard and is not attached to the deck. The home owner is not responsible for any injuries to guests or their items from the use of the hot tub.

description:
Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a peaceful escape from the city, this tree house offers an unforgettable experience.

Private hot tub for relaxing evenings

High-speed internet for work or streaming

Private fire pit for cozy nights outdoors

Convenient location near downtown Indianapolis

Charcoal Grill

Don't miss the opportunity to stay in this extraordinary cabin where elegance meets nature.

The space
Hand-crafted treehouse perfect for romantic getaways, family vacations, or peaceful retreats

Nestled in nature with surrounding trails, a pond for fishing, and serene outdoor spaces

Fully equipped kitchen and cozy living area for a comfortable stay

Private hot tub with scenic views ‚Äî ideal for relaxing under the stars

Gather around the fire pit to roast marshmallows and share stories

Comfortable bedrooms offer a restful retreat with nature‚Äôs sounds

Enjoy mornings on the porch with breathtaking views and fresh coffee

Modern amenities paired with a tranquil, immersive nature experience

Short drive to downtown Indianapolis, combining convenience with seclusion

Create lasting memories in this unique and unforgettable treehouse getaway

Guest access
Check out our other listings on this property at https://www.airbnb.com/h/brickfarmhouse.

There are multiple air bnbs on this property, a great opportunity to take advantage of a beautiful place to gather with friends and family.

This is the only ‚ÄúSolar Farm‚Äù in the city of Indianapolis! You‚Äôll notice the solar panels between the bunkhouse and the horse pasture.

This is a One of a kind property in Indianapolis on rolling hills of our 60 acre property. You are free to roam the trail behind the grey metal pole barn down to the pond *when the gate is open. * From the house you can see our horses in the pasture.


This cabin was hand crafted. The ceilings are milled walnut from northern Indiana. The pallet wood is untreated from Kentucky. The cabinets and shelves were custom built for this cabin and the stair rail was built from trees from this very property.

Watch the sunset as the property comes to life at night with all of the sounds of nature.

It‚Äôs not Uncommon to see deer in the field, turtles sunbathing on the lake, our resident blue Herron, ‚ÄúHarold‚Äù, wild turkey, or the families of ducklings who live here in the spring!

There are multiple air bnbs on the property if you want to take advantage of the opportunity to gather with friends and family in this beautiful space.

Close to the interstate and downtown yet it feels like you are deep in the country in a nature preserve.

There are not many properties like this! Listen to crickets chirp, watch fireflies dance, and roast marshmallows over a fire.

We are on a main road and The home is at the front of the property so easily accessible and easy to find. You will hear cars passing when up at the front of the property. The home does have well water but we have a softener.

Please refrain from entering any gated pastures, barns, or outbuildings for your own safety and the safety of our animals.

There are other air bnbs on the property, each with its own yard and fire pit / grill area, great for either a quiet getaway for your family or an opportunity to meet other nature lovers and travelers :)

TITLE: Entire house in Speedway! ~Big Yard~King Beds
Listing Name: Entire house in Speedway! ~Big Yard~King Beds
name: Entire house in Speedway! ~Big Yard~King Beds
description:
Welcome to your Speedway sanctuary! This entire house, nestled in the heart of Speedway, offers an ideal retreat for families, friends, and racing enthusiasts seeking a spacious and comfortable stay. With five beds, multiple living areas, and extensive outdoor space, this property promises an unforgettable experience.

There are two separate entrances to the property and the house can be separated into two units (Unit A and Unit B) - perfect for multiple families to gather under one roof!

The space
Main Floor Features:

- Living Room: Relax in a cozy space with plush seating and tasteful decor
- Dining Room: Enjoy meals together in our inviting dining area.
- Full Kitchen: Cook to your heart's content with new stainless-steel appliances, including all the essential cookware and utensils you may need.
- Bedrooms: Sleep soundly in two beautifully furnished bedrooms; one with a king-size bed and desk setup and another with a comfy queen-size bed.
- Newly Renovated Bathroom: Features double vanities and includes brand new washer/dryer for your convenience.
- Sunroom: The perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee or unwind with a good book in natural light.

Top Floor Retreat:

- Private Living Area: A serene place with its own living room and workspace.
- Bedroom: Offers a luxurious king-sized bed, ensuring a restful night's sleep.

Basement level:

- Newly Renovated Space: This level has been transformed into a stunning area with modern amenities and stylish decor.
- Bedrooms: Two cozy, curtain-separated sleeping areas each featuring queen-sized beds, perfect for extra guests.
- Living Area: A comfortable space with a smart TV, ideal for entertainment and relaxation.
- Kitchenette with Dining Area: Equipped with the essentials such as mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and toaster etc.
- Brand New Bathroom: Also includes double vanities, a spacious shower, and all the essentials.
- Laundry Room: Features brand new washer and dryer.

Smart TVs, streaming boxes, books, and board games are available for your enjoyment.

Pets are welcomed with additional fees. Please pick up after your pets and no pets are allowed on furniture.

There is an unheated above ground pool that will be open during the months of June through September.

Nearby:
IMS: 15min walk, 2min drive
Speedway Main Street: 15min walk, 2min drive
Speedway Super Center: 15min walk, 2 min drive
Gainbridge Fieldhouse: 15min drive
Lucas Oil Stadium: 15min drive
Convention Center: 15min drive
IND Airport: 15min drive

Guest access
Full House Access:

- Entire home: Enjoy the privacy of having the entire house to yourself. All three floors are yours.

Outdoor Features:

- Parking: No need to worry about parking; we provide a spacious driveway in front of the garage, plus an additional driveway on the other side of the house, ensuring ample space for your vehicles.

- Front Yard: Experience privacy and security with a fenced-in front yard, perfect for enjoying the outdoors worry-free.

- Backyard: Our expansive backyard with picnic tables is ideal for relaxation or play.

- Pool: Dive into summer with our onsite above-ground pool, open during the summer months (June-Sept), weather permitting. It's a perfect spot to cool off and enjoy sunny days. Please note, there is no lifeguard on duty, children must be monitored at all times, swimming and access to the pool area is at your own risk, no glass or sharp objects are allowed in the pool area, and you must lock the pool gate when not in use.

- Garage Access: Make the most of recreational fun in the garage where you'll find a grill for a perfect BBQ and a ping-pong table for some friendly competition.

Other things to note
Speedway Town Hall and Police Station is across the street. Please be mindful of local laws and ordinances.

Please note the following:
- No parties are allowed - $200 fee + additional cleaning costs $100-$200 if there are any party confetti or trash found on the property
- No smoking - $500 fee

If you have any special requests, please reach out to us.

Whether you're planning your bachelor fun or tasked with finding the family a group getaway, we've got you covered. With 4 spacious bedrooms and 2.5 full bathrooms, there's plenty of room here for everyone. Take advantage of a fully stocked kitchen and cook up a crowd-pleaser, or chill in the spacious living area and tune into the big game, then head to your bedroom for a great night's sleep in our comfortable beds complete with high thread count linens - you'll need the extra sleep for a full day of fun ahead. Rise and shine with Keurig coffee, then it's off to the races (quite literally) - our home is conveniently located within a mile or two of Indy's hot spots, and just minutes away from countless attractions and restaurants. This will be one for the books!

-IMPORTANT: Parties and events are strictly prohibited.

-Pets are allowed for a $150 fee plus $50 for each additional pet, please keep leashed in common areas.

-For your safety and security reasons, our homes (not all) have motion detectors and a security system, including exterior cameras.

-As mandated by the City, we have installed noise detection equipment in both the backyard and the living room. These devices specifically only captures and records decibel levels.

-Please note the check-in and check-out times. We can typically accommodate requests for early check-ins / late check-outs, but we can only confirm such requests 48 hours before the date requested. These cameras play a vital role in ensuring the security of our premises and protecting both you and our property. Please be aware that any unauthorized interference with the Ring cameras will be taken very seriously. The home is only 350 yards from the Lucas Oil Stadium and 500 yards from the Indiana Convention Center (5-10 minute walk). The best bars and restaurants that downtown Indy has to offer are just a few blocks away.

The space
Enjoy your stay in downtown Indy in this welcoming home!

Located on a secluded section of South Meridian St, you will have your own designated off-street parking to the rear of the house. You are welcome to park 2 vehicles in the garage as well as up to 3 vehicles behind the garage.

When entering from the street, you‚Äôll walk up the charming path and in through the front door into an inviting and comfortable living room which features a Samsung Frame smart TV and sleek Marshall Bluetooth Speaker. Connected to the living room is a spacious dining room which can seat 6 guests.

To the rear of the house is a newly renovated kitchen featuring quartz counter tops and stainless steel appliances. It is fully equipped for all of your needs including a dishwasher and coffee machine. Guests are welcome to use the washer and dryer in the separate laundry room just off the kitchen. The powder bathroom is also on the main floor, located in the entrance hallway.

Upstairs you will find the shared bathroom (shower/tub combo) with a full set of towels for each guest and complimentary body wash & shampoo/conditioner.

The two equally sized large queen bedrooms to the rear of the house have an excellent view of Lucas Oil Stadium.

Taking up the front of the house is the large master bedroom which features an inviting king bed and very spacious master closet. The ensuite bathroom has a similar layout as the neighboring shared bathroom for optimal privacy and includes the same convenient amenities.

All three bedrooms feature smart TV's and memory foam mattresses to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

There is a fully fenced in back yard with a grill, patio table & chairs for guests to enjoy as well as a covered front porch with two handcrafted Adirondack chairs which are perfect for sitting back and watching the world go by...

description:
Welcome to Indianapolis! This gorgeous 6-bedroom 2-bathroom home is accessible to major attractions such as Lucas Oil Stadium, Circle Centre Mall and nationally ranked restaurants! Make yourself at home and enjoy a gourmet kitchen, beautifully decorated with brand-new decor. This home is perfect for larger groups or small - we can comfortably sleep up to 16!!

The space
Let our home be your launchpad to all the fun Indianapolis has to offer! This super spacious 4,040 sq ft. home features 6 bedrooms, brand new cushy beds with high-end linens, and 2 bathrooms. Immersive social spaces link our fully loaded open kitchen, making this the perfect place for your group - large or small! We're located near many electrifying options of professional sports and vibrant restaurants of blends of cuisines..

**KEY FEATURES**
- There are TVs in the living room, game room, and bedroom 6.

- Fully loaded kitchen with new top of the line appliances

... and so much more!

**THINGS TO DO NEARBY**
Shopping:

- Lucas Oil Stadium home of the NFL Colts (2.9 miles)
- Indianapolis Motor Speedway (10.6 miles)
