With the additions of college basketball, minor league baseball and soccer & much more!

Breweries:
- Chilly Water Brewing, an industrial-chic brewpub offering house made ales & lagers, sandwiches & live music (1.7 miles)

Restaurants:
- Kuma's, famous heavy metal burger bar (1.2 miles)

- 3 Carrots City Market, locally sourced vegan & vegetarian takes on American & Midwestern eats at a counter in City Market (1.4 miles)
- Red Lion Grog House, sleek bar serving upscale British food & burgers with an array of craft & import beers (1.3 miles)

Guest access
Your check-in and check-out process is key less which allows you to drive up at any hour.

Other things to note
Please read and agree to all house rules.

-A professional cleaning crew comes before your visit to make sure the home is immaculate upon your arrival. Your check-in and check-out process is completely keyless which allows you to easily check-in for your stay!

-IMPORTANT: Parties and events are strictly prohibited and may result ineviction.

-For your safety and security reasons, our homes (not all) have motion detectors and a security system, including exterior cameras.

- No smoking of any kind is allowed on our property. Marijuana is illegal in Indiana. If our cleaners smell smoke, you will be charged a fine starting at $300.00. We care deeply about the health and wellbeing of our guests and smoke of any kind leaves a smell for the guests after you.

Parties and Events - Parties and events are strictly prohibited. Quiet hours, which start at 10 pm, are strictly observed. To ensure that our guests do not exceed a certain volume level and disturb our neighbors, we use a NoiseAware decibel level monitoring device. They are located in the home's common area. Any evidence of a party or event, including camera footage, excessive garbage, or other evidence will result in a fine of $500.00, legal action, and possible eviction without reimbursement, plus the cost of any extra cleaning or damages that result from the event. We have ring cameras in the front and the back of the house for security purposes.

We kindly remind all guests that tampering with or unplugging Ring cameras is strictly prohibited. These cameras play a vital role in ensuring the security of our premises and protecting both you and our property. Please be aware that any unauthorized interference with the Ring cameras will be taken very seriously. In accordance with our policies and local regulations, guests found engaging in such actions may face fines of up to $500.

-If you want early check-in or late check-out, please reach out 48 hours prior to your arrival date. Availability is dependent on whether there is another same day check-in/check-out and may be subject to a $75 fee. Unapproved late checkout will result in a $100 charge.

-The trash and recycling day is Tuesday.

Have any questions about our home or location? Please don't hesitate to reach out! We hope to host you soon!

TITLE: Luxurious 3,000 Square Foot House Downtown
Listing Name: Luxurious 3,000 Square Foot House Downtown
name: Luxurious 3,000 Square Foot House Downtown
description:
Experience Indy in this incredible 3 bedroom family home located in the revitalized Bates Hendricks neighborhood of Downtown Indianapolis. This house is the definition of Luxury with custom designs and furnishings. Relax in this spacious downtown comfort pad. The home is 1.5 miles from Lucas Oil Stadium and the Indiana Convention Center (5 minute drive). The house is 1 mile from Eli Lilly and Gainbridge Fieldhouse. Only 2 miles from Monument Circle. It is a spacious 3,000 square foot home.

The space
Walk up the quaint red-brick path into the front entrance of the home and be greeted by the bright and modern kitchen and dining area which is perfect for guests to prepare a bite and hangout. Just off of the kitchen area is the main living room where guests can listen to music through the Bluetooth stereo system or watch their favorite movie on the 50 inch smart TV.

The master suite is located on the main level which boasts a comfortable queen bed, smart TV, large walk-in shower and spacious closet. Towards the back of the house guests are welcome to use the washer and dryer located in the dedicated laundry room as well as the adjacent powder bathroom.

Heading upstairs, guests will find themselves in a bedroom nook with a bright and modern open design, this room has limited privacy. This space includes a twin bed and a comfortable chaise lounge. The upper floor also has two large bedrooms, one bedroom features a queen bed and smart TV, the other has two queen beds. Both bedrooms have dedicated closets for all of your storage/hanging needs and share a large, modern full family bathroom. There is also a twin XL in the upstairs common area.

The outdoor space between the house and the garage is also available for guests to enjoy.

Guest access
Guests will have the entire home to themselves. Access is via a smart keypad lock and guests can park on the street out front (it's a quiet street so there's usually ample parking)

Other things to note
Please note that the garage is temporarily unavailable for guest use. There should be sufficient street parking in front of the house as parking is permitted on both sides of the street.

Thermostat ‚Äì The owner has full control of the thermostat. Just let us know what temperature you would like. The Max heat and cool is 70. We do have a window AC unit upstairs during warmer months.

TITLE: INDY Big House - 6 bedrooms w/Fenced Big Backyard
Listing Name: INDY Big House - 6 bedrooms w/Fenced Big Backyard
name: INDY Big House - 6 bedrooms w/Fenced Big Backyard
description:
***This listing is for the Entire home***

6 bedrooms, 2.5 baths - 4500-5000 sq ft space. There is also a conjoining door that attaches both sides.

Weekend getaway, a party with the friends, a family gathering or working on the road. Whatever your need is, this place has you covered!

Large, open rooms with high ceilings, original built-ins and enough space to find a quiet corner no matter how many people are visiting or staying with you.

The space
The space

**There are 7 descriptions below with descriptions for each side**

1) Parking: Street Parking is the free and easy, right in front of the house

2) Exterior: This is the ENTIRE duplex with 2-good sized, covered front porch with plenty of room to hang out no matter what the weather is.

There is also a back porch that leads to a shared patio and newly planted backyard, with a fully enclosed privacy fence.

Feel free to use the propane grill located in the backyard as well.

3) Access: There are electronic locks on both the rear and front doors. Codes are erased after every visit and a new one will be provided upon check-in, that is customized to your liking.

4) Security: There are keypads for a "SimpliSafe" security system, that are located just inside both the rear and front doors. This code is also erased after every visit and a new one matching your "Access" code for the doors, will be provided upon check-in.

There are also Ring Video Doorbells located at the front and rear of the Airbnb. Feel free to either message me on here or simply hit the doorbell button and I can communicate with you through the Ring.

5.1 ) Left Side - First Floor: This is the bottom half of a ~2,500 sq ft large space with high ceilings and plenty of room for you and your guests. There are 2 separate living rooms, that can be sectioned off with beautiful wood & glass French Doors.

The first living room has a large couch and oversized armchair with matching ottoman.

The second living room has a matching large couch, modern arm chair and large flat screen TV with Netflix provided. It is a Smart TV, so you can sign-in and access all of your favorite TV apps.

There is also a large dining room with a table that fits 8, but can be extended to fit 12 or more. The wing of the table is located once you pull out the side closest to the kitchen entrance. There is also a desk big enough for any work that needs to be accomplished while you're staying with us.

The Kitchen has a stove, refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster, blender and wine cooler. You will find the Kitchen equipped with coffee, sugar, basic condiments, spices, baking tools, cutting boards, Chef's knives and enough counter space to do whatever your heart desires.

5.2) Right Side - Hardwood Floors throughout this side.

Each room is equipped with Smart TVs that include Netflix, but also provide you with the opportunity to access any of your favorite TV apps with your login credentials. The Largest bedroom is located at the end of the hallway with a King-sized bed. There is plenty of room for pack and plays, or just to spread out. TITLE: House in a Quiet Neighborhood Downtown!
Listing Name: House in a Quiet Neighborhood Downtown!
name: House in a Quiet Neighborhood Downtown!
description:
Experience Indy in this incredible 3 bedroom family home located in the revitalized Bates Hendricks neighborhood of Downtown Indianapolis. This house is the definition of Luxury with custom designs and furnishings. Relax in this spacious downtown comfort pad. The home is 1 miles from Lucas Oil Stadium and the Indiana Convention Center (5 minute drive). The house is .5 miles from Eli Lilly and Gainbridge Fieldhouse. Only 2 miles from Monument Circle. It is a spacious 3,000 square foot home.

The space
Walk up to the front entrance of the home and be greeted by the bright and modern kitchen and dining area which is perfect for guests to prepare a bite and hangout. Just off of the kitchen area is the main living room where guests can listen to music or watch their favorite movie on the 50 inch smart TV.

The master suite is located on the main level which boasts a comfortable king bed, smart TV, walk-in shower and 2 spacious closets. There is also a half bathroom off the living room next to the stairs. Towards the back of the house, guests are welcome to use the washer and dryer located in the dedicated laundry room down stairs. The basement also incudes a great game room with a second living room, ping pong table, and an electric dart board.

Heading upstairs, guest will find two large bedrooms, one bedroom features a queen bed and a full bed, the other has one queen bed and a desk for work. Both bedrooms have dedicated closets for all of your storage/hanging needs and share a large, modern full family bathroom.

The outdoor space include a deck with a fire space, large yard with a picnic table, and fenced in gravel driveway.

Guest access
Guests will have the entire home to themselves. Access is via a smart keypad lock and guests can park on the street out front, in the driveway, or in the garage.

TITLE: Craftsman Bungalow - 2 blocks to Broadripple Ave
Listing Name: Craftsman Bungalow - 2 blocks to Broadripple Ave
name: Craftsman Bungalow - 2 blocks to Broadripple Ave
description:
Easy walk to Broad Ripple Ave & a 10 min drive to the Fairgrounds. Impeccably renovated with all new kitchen & master suite. Enjoy your morning coffee on the back deck & gather 'round the fire pit each evening. Fantastic, fenced-in, private backyard with ample shade trees & string lights. Bikes provided for your afternoon ride on the Monon Trail. Walk to dinner or cook at home and relax by the fireplace. We delight to welcome you to this beautiful home!

The space
The main level includes two classic queen bedrooms and one full bath.

The living room has a 55" ROKU Smart TV with local channels, remote operated electric fireplace, and designated workspace and desk.

The kitchen is fully equipped with all new stainless steel appliances and cookware. You‚Äôll also have your choice of Keurig (Jesse‚Äôs favorite) or regular Drip Coffee (Susannah‚Äôs favorite) each morning from the dual option coffee maker. No need to compromise in this house! :)

On the lower level you'll find a master suite with a full bathroom and walk-in shower, Smart TV and laundry room for your convenience. We finally went all-in on a tropical feature wall. Let us know what you think!

The spacious backyard is surrounded by a privacy fence and includes a large deck and fire pit. We offer two adult and two children's bikes. The Monon Trail is just a block from the house. You are welcome to use the charcoal grill. String lights? You bet!

TRAVELERS INSURANCE
We encourage guests to purchase the low cost travelers insurance offered from either Airbnb or VRBO. Refunds will not be issued for health or weather related issues.

Guest access
Guests may line 2-3 cars up in the driveway. Restaurants and attractions are a short walk. We also provide walks which you are welcome to use during your stay.

TITLE: Coastal Container Home - rooftop deck & greenhouse
Listing Name: Coastal Container Home - rooftop deck & greenhouse
name: Coastal Container Home - rooftop deck & greenhouse
description:
"The Sycamore" is one of three container homes located on the same lot along Fall Creek in downtown Indianapolis. Coastal contemporary theme with plenty of vintage touches. The home is comprised of 7 shipping containers with an added greenhouse & rooftop deck. There is plenty of yard space as well. The floor to ceiling windows on the first two floors provide beautiful views of the river. The rooftop deck provides a 360 degree view of downtown Indy.

The space
The first floor is an open layout which houses the kitchen, dining room & living room spaces. As you walk in, you will notice the rich contrast between the walnut flooring & stark quartzite counters partnered with custom white cabinets. The seashell dining room lights, boathouse bar lights & yarn lighting will make you feel cozy in this coastal escape. The floor to ceiling windows on the first floor help to illuminate this bright & cozy space. You will notice trinkets from worldly travels above the cabinetry as well as a Takashi Murakami art piece overlooking the dining room. The living room sofa chairs & sofa make for an extremely comfortable movie spot on the 65" mounted TV.

The slatted woodwork is the highlight of the custom stairs as you head up to the second floor. There are two bedrooms, a greenhouse & a shared full bathroom on the second floor. You can't miss the stunning custom art piece by Indy native, Stuart Alter, overlooking the stairs & second floor. This triptych piece captures everything from the Florida sunset to the pink flamingos to the deep ocean blues. At least thats how I interpret it... You will have to tell me how it makes you feel. Each bedroom is fitted with a medium firm memory foam 14" mattress & floating headboard. Every bedroom in the Sycamore features artwork by world renowned artist, Shepard Fairey. The simple color schemes, blues & wooden framed blended perfectly with the coastal theme. I hope you enjoy them.

My favorite feature of this container home is the greenhouse overlooking Fall Creek. The greenhouse is stocked with plenty of tropical plants which makes for the perfect urban jungle. The 40 foot long greenhouse is about 8 feet wide & provides seating for 6, a yoga mat, a record player, record collection, reading lights, trinkets from worldly travels & a couple other fun old school touches. Dive into the record collection & truly kick back & enjoy a pocket of nature & greenery in downtown Indy. Fall Creek is home to many bird species & animals in general. I am extremely fond of the blue herons, hawks & occasional bald eagles that visit. I've also seen some friendly groundhogs, snapping turtles & deer. Let me know what you see.

Take your time heading up the diagonal spiral staircase as you enter the entertainment space on the third floor right outside of the master bedroom. Take it easy & watch the 50" TV or use the card table & dive into some classic board games I have to offer. The third floor features more Murakami & Fairey artwork. The master bedroom includes a 14" Queen size memory foam mattress as well as a fully tiled shower & bathroom.

Lastly, head on up to the 480 sq. ft. rooftop deck with seating for 9 and 360 degree views of downtown Indianapolis. It is truly an incredible vantage point of the city skyline, nearby neighborhoods & of course, Fall Creek. The rooftop is fitted with grass turf which makes it comfortable to walk on, do some yoga or hit an early morning workout.

Proximity to popular destinations:

Convention Center -> 3.8 miles
Bottleworks District -> 1.9 miles
Lucas Oil Stadium -> 4.1 miles
Gainbridge Fieldhouse -> 3.4 miles
Old National/Egyptian Room -> 2.5 miles
Fairgrounds -> 1.8 miles
Indianapolis Motor Speedway -> 5.9 miles
Broad Ripple -> 4.4 miles
TCU Amphitheater -> 4.3 miles
Fountain Square -> 4 miles
Ruoff Music Center -> 19 miles

Please ask about any venue & I will let you know the proximity.

Guest access
You have access to the entire home & you will be given 3 designated parking spots.

Other things to note
NO PARTIES. 0 tolerance.

TITLE: Designer Chic Indy 4 Bd w/ Pool Table!
White River Retreat
Listing Name: White River Retreat
name: White River Retreat
description:
Escape to a private retreat on the White River in Indianapolis! This custom-built home offers a peaceful, open-concept space with a stone fireplace, pool table, and jetted tub. Enjoy 12 acres of shared grounds with river access, kayaks, and fire pits. Perfect for a unique getaway, feeling worlds away yet close to everything. Ideal for couples or small groups seeking tranquility and adventure.

The space
Welcome to your personal paradise on the White River! I personally designed and built this home, and it was the setting for some of the best years of my life. You'll find a profound sense of peace here, feeling like you're in another world while still being in the heart of Indianapolis.

The entire top floor is your private retreat, featuring an open-concept living space with vaulted ceilings, dark wood floors, and a cozy stone fireplace. After a day of exploring, you can unwind with a variety of indoor amenities.

* Challenge friends to a game on the full-sized pool table.
* Prepare delicious meals in the modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
* Soak your cares away in the spacious bathroom's jetted tub.

Step outside to explore the shared grounds, which include 2 acres of mowed yards, 10 acres of woods, and 230 feet of direct river frontage. Your body and mind will thank you for staying here!

Guest access
Guests have exclusive access to the entire top floor of the house. You are also welcome to enjoy all shared outdoor areas, including the dock, basketball court, fire pits, and kayaks available for river exploration. The garage below is used for storage by our cleaning staff and is not accessible to guests.

Other things to note
* Shared Property: Please be aware that there are 2 other Airbnb units on the property. All outdoor areas, including the yards, dock, basketball court, fire pits, and kayaks, are shared spaces.

* Early Check-in: An early check-in at 12:00 PM (instead of 3:00 PM) can be accommodated if available for a $45 fee.

* Late Check-out: A late check-out at 12:00 PM (instead of 10:00 AM) can be accommodated if available for a $45 fee.

Welcome to our beautifully redecorated home, located in historic Bates Hendricks, just minutes away from heartbeat of downtown Indianapolis. It has everything needed to feel right at home in Indy! It‚Äôs a perfect ‚Äúhome base‚Äù for your entire group.
BONUSES include‚Äî a HOME GYM in the basement, a large BACKYARD with all the room you need for outdoor fun and a HUGE GARAGE with ample space for parking plus indoor GRILLing and a net PING-PONG table.
Don‚Äôt miss out on staying in this gorgeous home!

The space
Experience comfort, relaxation, and fun in one unforgettable stay!
This recently renovated home offers a perfect blend of vintage charm and modern comfort. Located in a peaceful residential neighborhood, this spacious retreat is ideal for families, friends, and group gatherings.

Inside, you‚Äôll find five comfortable bedrooms and plenty of room to relax and unwind. Gather in the cozy fireplace room for a quiet evening or mix drinks for your friends in the bar room, challenge yourself with an early morning workout in the home gym, enjoy a friendly game of poker with your friends or spend quality time playing family games with the kids.
There‚Äôs something for everyone!

Outside, you will find some classic yard games or enjoy hanging out in the garage with activities designed to entertain all ages. Grill out and chill out under the large, covered back patio with a picnic table.
The home‚Äôs generous layout ensures everyone has space to spread out. Plus with two family room spaces and a dining table for 12, you can also enjoy time together as well as a family meal.

Whether you‚Äôre planning a family reunion, a weekend getaway, or a special celebration, this home provides the perfect backdrop for making memories.

TITLE: Spacious Town Home near ICC
Listing Name: Spacious Town Home near ICC
name: Spacious Town Home near ICC
description:
Welcome to our charming town home in the heart of Indianapolis! Just minutes from Methodist and IU Hospitals, Convention Center, Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, Bottleworks District, and Mass Ave. Enjoy modern comforts in a historic setting with a cozy living area, a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable bedrooms, a modern bathroom, one garage space, free coffee, fast wifi, and high-quality furniture for a comfortable stay. Book now for an unforgettable experience

The space
Welcome to our stunning three-story townhome, perfect for your stay in the heart of Indianapolis! Here‚Äôs a detailed layout of our property:

First Floor:
On the first floor, you'll find a cozy gas fire pit, ideal for relaxing evenings. The living room offers ample seating and entertainment options, featuring a 65-inch smart TV for your enjoyment. Additionally, there is a full bathroom conveniently located on this floor.

Second Floor:
The second floor features a stylish and spacious dining room, perfect for enjoying your meals. Adjacent to the dining room is a second living room, offering another comfortable space for gatherings and relaxation. The fully equipped kitchen includes all your basic cooking needs, and we provide free coffee to start your day right.

Third Floor:
The third floor houses the master bedroom, a spacious sanctuary with a king bed, a 55-inch TV, and an attached full bathroom. The second bedroom features two queen beds and 2 Full Beds via bunkbed, an attached full bathroom, and a 55-inch TV. The third bedroom is a cozy room with a twin XL bunk bed and a 43-inch TV, perfect for additional guests or children.

Each bedroom is equipped with four pillows: two memory foam and two feather pillows, ensuring a restful night's sleep. All mattresses are 12-inch memory foam, providing ultimate comfort for our guests.

Whether you're in town for business, a convention, or just to explore the vibrant city, our townhome offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Enjoy your stay!

TITLE: Hot Tub, fully fenced, and dog friendly!
Listing Name: Hot Tub, fully fenced, and dog friendly!
name: Hot Tub, fully fenced, and dog friendly!
description:
- Central location, close to all Indy attractions!
- Recently renovated!
- Memory foam mattresses in all bedrooms!
- Cozy space for working professionals (desk in every room)!
- Family-friendly (board games & craft supplies provided)
- Pet-friendly (**up to 2 dogs with fee**, bed & bowls provided)

Perfect for both work & play!
White River House is ready to welcome you!

The space
LIVING ROOM: couch, ottoman, large smart TV (No cable but you can log in to your streaming accounts!)

KING BEDROOM: Right off the living room, you'll find the largest bedroom in the house with a King Bed that features a Nectar mattress. There is a large desk and plenty of space to put suitcases, etc.

QUEEN BEDROOM: Also off the living room, and another large bedroom, this bedroom features a quiet sitting area as well as a comfortable bed with memory foam mattress and a desk area.

TWIN TRUNDLE BEDROOM: This room is in the back of the house off the kitchen and is perfect for kids! It features 2 twin beds (as a trundle). Adults can certainly use them too but they are not XL Twins - aka dorm beds - so keep that in mind. There is another desk area here for work or homework.

KITCHEN: As with all of Habitude's properties, this is a FULLY STOCKED kitchen with everything you would need to cook. Pots, pans, spices, etc. etc. We also provide a coffee machine with coffee (& filters) as well as tea, sugar, etc. etc.

BATHROOM: The bathroom is very spacious and has a bath/shower combo. Towels and Hand Towels are provided, as well as Shampoo, Conditioner, & Body Wash.

LAUNDRY ROOM: The laundry room has a washer and dryer + ironing board and iron for guests to utilize

EXTERIOR AREAS: The back yard is fully enclosed with a wooden privacy fence! There is a hot tub, bistro lighting, a covered lounge seating area plus an outdoor dining table/eating area in the back yard along with a bbq. Private parking space by the gate in the rear plus street parking in the front. There is a front porch which is a perfect relaxation spot in the summer! The porch is well lit with bistro lights.

Guest access
Guests access the property through the front door using a digital lock that is programmed with a code specifically for them. The lock will not work until the house rules/disclosures are signed by the booking guest.

Other things to note
**PLEASE READ ALL OF THE HOUSE RULES/DISCLOSURES BEFORE BOOKING:**

HOUSE RULES:
The following rules will be sent via a form link 2 days before your stay and must be signed off on to ensure understanding. The digital lock will not work until this document is signed. These rules are in place to attract the best guests who treat our house just like their home! Thanks for understanding!

‚Ä¢ The person making the reservation be one of the guests staying & must be at least 25 years old

‚Ä¢ The government issued ID of the person making the reservation must be uploaded in the form mentioned above

‚Ä¢ There are NO GATHERINGS allowed on the property.

‚Ä¢ The definition of "GATHERINGS" is as follows: No person past the guest count in the reservation may stay on property (inside or outside) for more than 10 minutes.

‚Ä¢ Friendly, house trained, dogs (max of 2) are allowed with a $20 per dog per night fee.

‚Ä¢ Guest is responsible for picking up dogs poop outside (whether on property or not), and any messes made by dogs.

‚Ä¢ There are 2 cameras on the exterior of the cameras and the guests must understand that these are monitored and store recordings. There are no cameras inside the house.

‚Ä¢ There is absolutely NO SMOKING OR VAPING allowed on the property (inside or outside within the property lines) and if the cleaners smell cigarette/weed smell or there is evidence of smoking, a $250 fine will incur

‚Ä¢ Check-in is at 4pm and check-out is at 11am. A $50/hour fee will be assessed for early check-in/check-out when not approved in advance (this includes asking the cleaners to enter if they are still cleaning if you happen to arrive early)

‚Ä¢ All outdoor activity must end at 10pm and all loud talking/music, etc. must not happen between 10pm and 8am out of respect for the neighbors

‚Ä¢ There is a private parking spot at the rear of the premises and plenty of free street parking. There is no parking in the lot next door (it does not belong to us and you may be towed)

‚Ä¢ The guest who booked is responsible for any/all damage done to the house by them, their guests, or any dogs brought. They will be responsible for replacing or fixing any items such as appliances, furniture, sheets/bedding, decor items, etc.

‚Ä¢ The guest will be responsible for replacing any items that are missing after the stay.

‚Ä¢ No glitter or confetti may be used in the house (impossible to clean!) and nothing may be nailed or taped to the walls.

‚Ä¢ If extra cleaning is required beyond a typical clean (loads of trash everywhere, furniture moved, excessive amount of dishes, etc to be washed) There will be an extra fee of $100 for deep cleaning

‚Ä¢ It's the guest responsibility to log-out of their streaming accounts on the TV (the cleaners will not do it). The TV does not have cable/antenna... only streaming services like netflix, hulu, etc.

‚Ä¢ lights should be turned off when leaving rooms/the house to save energy

‚Ä¢ A/C must be turned off when the windows are open.

‚Ä¢ Guests need to communicate with the host right away if there are any concerns/needs during their stay so we can intervene immediately if needed.

‚Ä¢ It is the booking guest‚Äôs responsibility to share these rules with their group and it is ultimately their responsibility to make sure they are followed.

OTHER INFO/DISCLOSURES:

‚Ä¢ The front porch steps are different heights and guests need to be careful when entering the porch area

‚Ä¢ The porch is about 3 feet above the ground in places and does not have a fence so take extra care in that area

‚Ä¢ There is a lip (height difference) between the living room and kitchen floors. Please take extra care and make sure to look down and step up/down.

‚Ä¢ Indiana winters are wet and cold. The porch/stairs may be slippery & icy. There is a snow shovel available and salt to spread to help melt the ice.

‚Ä¢ There may be sharp icicles hanging from the roof over the porch steps so, look up!

‚Ä¢ There are extra trash bags available under the kitchen sink and trash cans are located in the back by the alley

‚Ä¢ Access to the basement is only granted if cover is needed in a severe storm.

‚Ä¢ The host is not responsible for situations out of their control such as internet or power going out and it will not incur a refund given for such uncontrollable events.

‚Ä¢ Traveling incurs a natural risk no matter what. If your travel plans require a cancellation due to sickness (COVID, etc) or weather delay (cancelled flights, etc), a refund cannot be given so we highly suggest you book CFAR (Cancel For Any Reason) insurance.

YOUR HOST:
Read about me! I run several airbnbs in both Birmingham, Denver, & Indianapolis and have 20+ years of luxury hospitality experience. My goal is to create the absolute best experiences for our guests!

TITLE: Lakefront Haven with Hot Tub + Fishing
Listing Name: Lakefront Haven with Hot Tub + Fishing
name: Lakefront Haven with Hot Tub + Fishing
description:
This lakefront gem is nestled in the middle of Indianapolis on a peaceful, 75-acre lake.

Enjoy serene views to match a unique and relaxing Airbnb experience with all Indy has to offer.

The space
‚ÄúThe Lakeside Landing‚Äù is completely renovated, with over 1,800 square feet of space to relax. This walk-out basement also boasts a full kitchen, in-unit laundry, and two social areas.

Enjoy the Scandinavian design flair and Boho decor, as you make memories and enjoy what Indianapolis has to offer.

About the Unit You‚Äôre Renting:
You are renting an entire walk-out basement duplex unit. You will have a dedicated entrance and the entire basement unit is blocked off for your use.

The Experience:
‚òÖ Soak up time in the hot tub overlooking the peaceful 75-acre lake and starry sky.
‚òÖSit by the water or fireplace and read your favorite book or take time to journal.
‚òÖ Eat dinner in the waterfront gazebo at sunset.
‚òÖ Enjoy lake activities like swimming, paddle Boarding, or canoeing.
‚òÖ Build a fire and share late-night convos with your loved ones.
‚òÖ Huddle in the screened-in porch regardless of the weather.
‚òÖ Fishing is off the charts with tons of bass, crappie, catfish, and walleye in the lake.

The Space Includes:
‚ûú Fully Stocked Kitchen: Utensils, Knife Set, Appliances, and Cookware
‚ûú Fully Stocked Laundry Unit: Detergent + Supplies, Iron Board, Iron
‚ûú Coffee Bar: Coffee Maker + Condiments
‚ûú Comfy robes in each bedroom

‚ûú 50‚Äù+ Big Screen TV
‚ûú Sit-Stand Desk with Dual Monitor if you need to do some work

Guest access
You will have a dedicated entrance and the entire basement unit is blocked off for your use, similar to a duplex. We live onsite on the upper level and rent out the basement as a completely separate unit. We may or may not be home during any given booking, but we will not be in your way whatsoever.

You will also have access to the entire backyard, the hot tub, the outdoor gazebo, the beach area, and the screened-in porch.

You will not have access to the upstairs unit or the upper deck, as that is where our family resides. We rent out the walkout basement unit separately as a duplex Airbnb but live upstairs ‚ò∫

Other things to note
Lake activities are at your own liability, the lake has some established rules ‚Äì such as any fishing being "catch and release".

You will want to bring your own life jackets and fishing gear, as they are not provided. The pontoon is not included in the rental.

description:
Welcome to The Dawg House, the premier Indianapolis pop art airbnb celebrating Bulldogs. Just a short walk from Butler University campus, this 3 bedroom house features over-the-top amenities and luxury comforts to make your stay memorable.

Play in our arcade featuring 600+ classic arcade games, pop-a-shot & more. Or sample our house vinyl collection on the turntable with new & vintage records from artists across decades Or relax by the fire on our spacious front patio. The choice is yours.

The space
Come play in our arcade featuring over 200 classic arcade games, pop-a-shot and more. Or sample our house vinyl collection on the turntable with a selection of new and vintage records from artists spanning the decades. Or sit and relax outdoors by the fire on our spacious front patio. We provide plenty of firewood and EZ Fire Starters for the firepit.

Our newly renovated three bedroom, two full bath house easily sleeps six and can can accommodate additional guests with our 21 inch queen size inflatable air mattress.

Each bedroom comes with a 14-inch memory foam mattress featuring orthopedic pressure relief and cool gel tech for a great night's sleep.

The rooms are tech-forward and host plenty of bedside charging ports for your electronics, remote controlled ceiling fan lighting and ample room for your wardrobe along with blackout window shades to make them the prefect space for you to rest, unwind and recharge.

Our bathrooms feature a rain shower to relax and wash away the worries of the day. The anti-fog heated mirrors come with built-in adjustable lighting for daytime or evening makeup applications. The LED faucets light up to indicate the water temp. Ample, ultrasoft hotel quality towels are always provided.

The living room boasts a new Samusun Utlra HD tv and electronic fireplace that can give off heat or no heat to just offer visual ambiance for a beautiful evening in.
The decor within the Dawg House is a mix curated from known artists, pop art and history brought together to make your stay fun and enjoyable.

We offer straightforward pricing with zero additional fees.

Conveniently located within a short uber ride to many Indianapolis landmarks, downtown businesses and tourist attractions.

Also a perfect space for visiting Butler University alumni, professors, family and traveling professionals. Has great proximity to the interstates, Indianapolis hospitals and Universities.

We are also just 5 minutes away from the locally owned cafes, shops and nightlife of Illinois St and Broad Ripple.

Other things to note
By booking, you agree to all house rules:

If you want early check-in or late check-out, please reach out 48 hours prior to your arrival date. Availability is dependent on whether there is another same day check-in/check-out and may be subject to a $75 fee. Unapproved late checkout will result in a $100 charge.

Unapproved pets (with the exception of licensed service animals) will result in a $500 fee and may result in an immediate eviction.

Smoking - No smoking of any kind is allowed on our property. Marijuana is illegal in Indiana. If our cleaners smell smoke, you will be charged a fine starting at $300.00. We care deeply about the health and wellbeing of our guests and smoke of any kind leaves a smell for the guests after you.

Parties and Events - Parties and events are strictly prohibited. Quiet hours, which start at 10 pm, are strictly observed. To ensure that our guests do not exceed a certain volume level and disturb our neighbors, we use a NoiseAware decibel level monitoring device. They are located in the home's common area. Any evidence of a party or event, including camera footage, excessive garbage, or other evidence will result in a fine of $500.00, legal action, and possible eviction without reimbursement, plus the cost of any extra cleaning or damages that result from the event. We have ring cameras in the front and the back of the house for security purposes.

We kindly remind all guests that tampering with or unplugging Ring cameras is strictly prohibited. These cameras play a vital role in ensuring the security of our premises and protecting both you and our property. Please be aware that any unauthorized interference with the Ring cameras will be taken very seriously. In accordance with our policies and local regulations, guests found engaging in such actions may face fines of up to $500.

Missing or damaged items - Any evidence of willful or negligent loss or damage to the property, furnishings, decoration, landscaping, towels, linens or other items will be charged at direct replacement cost plus a fine of up to $250.00.

Towels and linens - Guests are required to keep towels and linens in good condition. Towels and washcloths should not be used to remove makeup or for cleaning purposes. Any permanent stains on towels or linens will fall into the category of negligent damage. Guests should NOT wash comforters or duvet comforters themselves as this can cause damage to those items and the washing machine.

House Rules - Any evidence of a guest breaking posted house rules, including exceeding the occupancy listed by the guest on the reservation, parking restrictions, pool rules, illegal substances or use of the property can result in a fine of up to $1000.00 and / or eviction from the property.

The space
This one-story historic home has an open floor plan designed to maximize every space of this 912 sq/foot gem off Mass Ave!

TITLE: Families! | Mural | Firepit | Oversized Parking
Listing Name: Families! | Mural | Firepit | Oversized Parking
name: Families! | Mural | Firepit | Oversized Parking
description:
Book your getaway at this completely remodeled 1920's farmhouse - conveniently located on the line Indianapolis and Brownsburg/Hendricks County. Easy access to I-74, I-65, and I-465 and 16 miles from the airport (IND).

Race fan? This house is 2.5 miles from Lucas Oil Indianapolis Raceway Park and 7 miles from Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Enjoy the outdoors? Spend a day at nearby Eagle Creek where you can hike, swim, fish, and boat. Enjoy the lake views and fresh seafood at Rick's Cafe Boatyard.

The space
Contact host for pricing for Monthly Specials between January 2024-March 2024!

Get ready to cozy up in this charming farmhouse that's just calling your name. Step inside and you'll find an open layout that connects the chill living room, dining area, and a updated kitchen ‚Äì it's all about good vibes and relaxation. And if you're bringing your work along, don't worry, we've got a dedicated laptop-friendly zone set up.

When it's time to catch some Z's, you've got two bedrooms on the main level, both with queen-sized beds that are just waiting for you to dive into. No need to wait for the bathroom either ‚Äì there are two on the same level. One comes with a tub/shower combo for those soak-worthy moments, and the other keeps it sleek with a shower.

Upstairs, there's another bedroom that's got three twin beds, and let's not forget about that huge walk-in closet. This is a great room for kids!

Got some laundry to do? No sweat, we've got a washer and dryer ready to roll. And for all your entertainment needs, we've hooked you up with Smart TVs so you can stream to your heart's content. Plus, the WIFI is totally on point.

Now, let's talk about the great outdoors. This farmhouse sits pretty on an entire acre, surrounded by peaceful horse pastures. The front porch is perfect for just chilling, and if you're in the mood for some outdoor fun, there's a firepit and picnic area that's totally yours to enjoy. You'll love the one of a kind mural of Indiana to use as a backdrop for insta-worthy shots of your group.

Parking? No problem at all ‚Äì the circular driveway has got you covered, and there's even space for those bigger vehicles. If you're rolling in with an RV or a boat, just shoot a message to the host and they'll give you more information.

Long story short ‚Äì this farmhouse is all about good times and feeling right at home. Don't wait too long, book your spot now and get ready for some serious relaxation.

Guest access
Guests have acces to the entire home and acre property. No access to garage and barn. No street parking but there is plenty of parking in the large driveway.

Guests can access the house with a smart lock - code provided before checkin.

Other things to note
Exterior security cameras at front door, back door, and driveway. Please remember that you're staying in a house, not a hotel. Please treat the space with respect and be mindful of neighbors. If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP, but there is no one living on site 24/7.

Please note our properties are privately owned homes, and therefore sometimes appliances or household systems (HVAC, Plumbing, etc) may unexpectedly malfunction. While we will do everything in our power to address any functionality issues as quickly as possible, we cannot offer refunds- full or partial, cancellations, or alternate accommodations unless the property is deemed uninhabitable. Thank you for understanding!

TITLE: Sleeps 16‚Ä¢Spacious‚Ä¢King Beds‚Ä¢Kid-Friendly‚Ä¢Walkable
Listing Name: Sleeps 16‚Ä¢Spacious‚Ä¢King Beds‚Ä¢Kid-Friendly‚Ä¢Walkable
name: Sleeps 16‚Ä¢Spacious‚Ä¢King Beds‚Ä¢Kid-Friendly‚Ä¢Walkable
description:
Welcome! This house can do it all from family gatherings with kids to large friendly getaways. Our home is incredibly spacious & has endless seating arrangements to keep everyone comfortable. Each bedroom offers a king bed, and the master has an additional queen bed, crib, & infant amenities. There are two spacious full bathrooms upstairs & an additional washer/dryer. The attic is complete and boasts multiple sleeping options. Our kitchen is a great gathering area & is fully stocked.

The space
You know you have arrived as soon as you lay eyes on our newly renovated big blue home located under a canopy from our front yard tree. You will immediately see our covered front porch which is such a fun space to kick back and relax on. Once you enter your personal code on our electronic keypad you will be greeted with the perfect entryway to set your belongings. You will instantly view the majority of the first floor due to the open concept design.

You will find the inside of our home to be extremely spacious and comfortable. The main floor is complete with two living rooms, a dining area, full kitchen, and a half bath. Our favorite area is the kitchen; the adults can chat and sip beverages while watching the littles in the living room all while enjoying your favorite sports game or entertaining your kids with their favorite show. TVs come equipped with YouTubeTV, Disney+, PrimeTV, & Netflix. Additional apps can be added with your discretion. Our full kitchen has a gas stove, refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, drip coffee maker, blender, mixer and basic kitchen utensils. There are French doors from the kitchen that lead you out to our fully fenced-in yard that also includes a deck with a grill and additional seating. We recommend sitting on the deck at night with the string lights on. The dining room table is located just behind the second common space and to the side of the kitchen. A table leaf is located in the closet if additional seating is needed. We recently added a pop-a-shot for older kids (and adults!) to enjoy too.

The house sleeps up to 16 guests. All beds are located upstairs; 4 beds and a crib on the second floor and 4 beds on the third floor. We take comfort seriously, therefore you will find king beds in each bedroom and an additional king bed on the third floor/attic space. There is comfortable down-bedding and plenty of pillows. The attic offers an additional area that is perfect for an air mattress. It also includes an additional air conditioning unit for the summer months and a space heater for the winter. Although heat/air does flow to the attic, we want to ensure it stays comfortable for you as attics can be tricky.

Families with small kids can appreciate that we keep a crib, highchair, bumbo, double stroller, sound machine, pack-n-play, infant tub seat, infant swing, infant play mat, and kids toys to help keep traveling light. There are additional kids' kitchen items such as bottle warmer, silverware, plates, bibs, and sippy cups. Additional items can be brought to the home upon request. If you would also like to bring your family dog, please request via message and this could be arranged for an additional fee.

If you need early check-in or late check-out, please message me via Airbnb messaging to see if this option is available. I am generally pretty flexible, but also need to ensure I have enough turn-around time.

Guest access
Access through keypad entry with your own personal code through the front door. You will receive your code within 24 hours of your arrival date or sooner as well as detailed instructions to help navigate the house.

There is plenty of free parking available across the street as street parking is not allowed on the side of the street closest to the house.

Other things to note
Before check-out, all trash must be placed inside a bag and discarded in the trash bin located in the front of the house near the large tree. Trash pick-up is on Thursday mornings. The trash bins can remain on the curb in the front of the house.

TITLE: Jungle Bungalow
Listing Name: Jungle Bungalow
name: Jungle Bungalow
description:
Welcome to Jungle Bungalow, your ultimate home away from home in the heart of downtown Indianapolis! Prepare for an unforgettable stay in our stylish and renovated haven, tailored to accommodate groups with up to 8 guests. Located just a short car ride away from the city's vibrant attractions, this peaceful oasis offers the best of both worlds.

The space
Hey there! We're so excited to share with you our charming historic home that has been beautifully renovated and reconfigured in 2021 to give you the perfect home away from home. We've made sure that all the mechanicals are modern and brand new to make your stay comfortable and worry-free. With tons of large windows, the home is filled with natural light, but don't worry, we've got you covered with black-out shades in the bedrooms for a peaceful sleep.

Let's talk about the living space! The main living area is open and perfect for spending time with loved ones. The living room has a TV and a cozy seating area. Plus, we've added an inflatable queen air mattress to accommodate two more guests. There's also a convenient half bath with access to the main living area.

The kitchen, living room, and dining room all open up to each other, making it easy to hang out together. The kitchen has everything you need to prepare meals for your family, including an oversized peninsula that comfortably seats 5 at the counter. If you need anything essential in the kitchen that's not there, just give us a shout, and we'll have it to the home within a day. We've installed GE appliances, including a gas oven range, refrigerator/freezer, dishwasher, microwave, and garbage disposal. We typically stock the kitchen with chips, oatmeal, ground coffee, tea, sweeteners, and sparkling water. And there's even a spout for filtered water at the sink. Just so you know, the pump at the kitchen sink is filled with hand soap, and the button by the sink is the garbage disposal.

The dining area has a long dining table that seats 8, perfect for family dinners and gatherings.

Now, let's talk about the beds and baths. There are three bedrooms, three full bathrooms, and a half bathroom. Bedroom 1 is located on the first floor and features a queen-sized bed and an ensuite bathroom with a shower that has a low curb, making it easy to enter. If a guest stays in this room, they would be able to enter the home and room completely step-free by using the ramp on the back of the house. There's also a walk-in closet with plenty of built-in storage.

Bedroom 2 is upstairs and located at the back of the house. This room features a vaulted ceiling, a king-sized bed, and an en suite bathroom with a tub/shower and a large walk-in closet with built-ins.

Bedroom 3 is located upstairs in the front of the home and is a converted attic space. The ceiling in this room is sloped on the sides. There's a full bathroom with a shower directly outside of this third bedroom.

There's also a large open area on the second floor with a couple of chairs, perfect for some quiet time. Plus, there's plenty of room to put the queen-sized air mattress in this loft area for extra guests. The air mattress is kept inside the closet in the 2nd bedroom.

The home has high ceilings throughout (except the 3rd bedroom).

Lastly, the laundry room is on the main level, and there's a washer and dryer available for your use. We provide fragrance-free detergent and bleach for your convenience. The cleaning crew washes the linens on-site between guests, and sometimes, there might be laundry left in the dryer. If you'd like to use the washer and dryer, please just move the laundry aside.

We hope you love our home as much as we do and have a fantastic stay! If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Guest access
You'll have the entire house to yourself and can access everything except the unfinished basement. There is a back deck with a table and chairs. There is a ramp for entering through the back of the house, which is perfect for rolling up luggage and for those who don't like to use stairs. There is backyard space with a grassy area. The yard is not fenced.

There is a covered front porch with a ceiling fan with 2 chairs to sit and sip your lemonade and watch the world go by.

Other things to note
PARKING
Street parking in the neighborhood is free. You can also park long ways in front of the garage behind the house if you like. The space to park in front of the garage is large enough for a van or small bus. The garage is not available for use.

ACCESS
You can easily enter from the front or back of the home. There is a touchpad on both doors. To enter the front, you will need to go up 3 steps to get to the front door. They are not steep.

There is a ramp going up to the deck in the back of the house. So, it is possible to enter the home without using steps & it's great for rolling luggage up.

The space
The home has lots or windows and plenty of natural light. Everything has been updated, including all modern mechanicals, clever finishes, and matte white GE Cafe appliances. The space includes the following:

* main level suite with a king-sized bed, a full bath that has a low-curb walk-in shower & a double vanity
*2nd level suite with a king-sized bed, a full bath with a low-curb walk-in shower & a single vanity
*2nd level suite with king-sized bed, full bath with bath tub, & a single vanity
*2nd level bedroom with a queen-sized bed, there is a full bath at the end of the hall with a double vanity & walk-in shower available for occupants of this bedroom
*a half bath opens into the living area on the main level for convenience
*living room on main level
*dining room on main level
*chef's kitchen with GE Cafe appliances including a gas oven range, French door refrigerator, microwave vent, dishwasher, garbage disposal, drinking water tap
*plenty of kitchen cabinetry stocked with plates, bowls, utensils, coffee mugs, & wine glasses with an island and ample counter space for meal preparation and gathering
*laundry room on main level with 2 sets of stackable washers and dryers

Guest access
You will have the entire home to yourself.

(The basement and attic are unfinished areas for the mechanicals and are not available to guests.)

There is an open back yard, it is not fenced. The green house next door is also available for rent if you need a lot of space, please ask!

Other things to note
PARKING -
There is a gravel parking pad directly behind the home that has parking for 4 cars. There is also free street parking in the neighborhood so, you can also park directly in front of the house.

ENTRANCE -
There is a touchpad on the front door and the rear door. You can enter through either door.

CHECK-IN & CHECK-OUT TIMES -
The check-in time is 4pm EST and the check-out time is at 10:00 am EST. Currently, all the linens are washed and dried on-site between guests and the house needs to be cleaned and sanitized as well. The cleaners use the time between guests to make sure the home is ready for your arrival.
WINDOW COVERS -
The bedrooms have black out window shades. The main living area has window shades that allow light to enter the home.

HVAC -
There are 2 separate HVAC systems at the house, one for the main level and one for the 2nd level. So, you don't have to worry about the upstairs being hotter than downstairs.

STAIRS -
There are some stairs to go up to the front of the house to reach the front porch and door. Inside the home, there are 2 staircases, one in the front of the house and one in the back. The back staircase has been redone with new treads and a handrail. However, it is the original back staircase and is narrow with tall steps.

This stylish & luxurious home has four bedrooms, all furnished to provide a comfortable & luxury feel that makes falling asleep easy, during the day or night. The second bedroom downstairs boasts a Queen bed and is complete with a closet, a relaxing corner chair and a flat-screen TV for your comfort.

‚òÜ‚òÜ KITCHEN ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Just a stone's throw from downtown and the dynamic Fishers District, our location is a gateway to premium Nickel Plate dining, shopping, entertainment, the Yard District, and the Ruoff Music Center. With Indianapolis a brief 20-30 minute drive away, your exploration possibilities are endless.

This home, with its three bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, offers a spacious and elegant retreat for families or groups seeking solace. Situated in a tranquil neighborhood, it serves as a peaceful haven away from daily commotion, allowing guests to relax and rejuvenate.

Tailored for convenience, our property is ideally suited for 1-6 month stays, with both monthly and weekly options available. Enhancements include a 65-inch Smart TV for endless entertainment, a fully equipped kitchen for home-cooked meals, and an EV charger for eco-friendly travel.

Beyond the basics, the home boasts a versatile loft space, perfect as an office, gym, or play area, alongside a generous master suite with a luxury bath, and two additional bedrooms with queen beds. All rooms feature memory foam mattresses for ultimate comfort. The loft, equipped with work essentials, caters to remote work needs. There is also a queen sofa bed in the loft with a mattress topper and another futon which can sleep and additional person. EV charger is a Level 2 charger, 40A which can charge around 28-30 m/hr.

Conveniently located 5 minutes from Fishers Yard, Ikea, Top Golf, and numerous dining and shopping venues, everything you need is at your fingertips. The property includes a double car garage, keyless entry, and a spacious fenced backyard, visible in our listing photos.

Rates (excluding taxes, Airbnb fee, and cleaning) are around:
Weekly: $1,250
2 Weeks: $2,400
Monthly: $4,200/month
Special rates may apply during major events or for long stays; please contact us for details.
Ideal for professionals, medical personnel, relocating families, corporate, and insurance stays, our home promises a seamless and enriching living experience.

Guest access
Experience seamless and secure access to your home away from home with our convenient keyless entry system. Upon your arrival, you'll be provided with a unique access code, ensuring your check-in process is as smooth and hassle-free as possible. This personalized code also enhances your security, as the code is changed with each new guest. Enjoy the freedom to come and go as you please, with the peace of mind that comes from knowing your temporary residence is both accessible and secure. Welcome to a stay defined by ease and tranquility.

TITLE: Pop Art Clubhouse | Play Pool, Shuffleboard, Games
Listing Name: Pop Art Clubhouse | Play Pool, Shuffleboard, Games
name: Pop Art Clubhouse | Play Pool, Shuffleboard, Games
description:
Welcome to your fun & modern Pop Art inspired clubhouse! Whether you're traveling alone or with friends, this beautifully renovated home has everything for a great stay
- Fully stocked kitchen
- Smart TVs in every room w/ cable
- WFH w/ high-speed wifi (500 mbps) & working spaces
- In-unit washer/dryer
- Board games
- Easy checkout, no todo list
- Dog friendly

Drive to attractions
- 4 min: Children's Museum
- 10 min: DT Convention Centers
- 12 min: Bottleworks District & Mass Ave

The space
After a day of exploring vibrant Indianapolis, unwind in this Pop Art inspired home. The Clubhouse sleeps up to 10 guests with 5 beds (2 queen, 2 double, 1 queen pull-out), 3 bedrooms , 2.5 bathrooms.

-- INSIDE LIVING --
On the 1st floor, you will find a spacious open concept layout with the living room, dining room, kitchen, half-bathroom, and entryway. The pool table, shuffleboard table, TV, and board games can also be found on this floor. The JoyBird couch can comfortably fit your entire group and boasts a queen size pull-out memory foam mattress.

On the 2nd floor, you will find all the living spaces, laundry area, and full bathrooms. The master bedroom has a queen bed and attached ensuite bathroom. The second bedroom has 2 full beds and the final bedroom has 1 queen bed. All of the beds are comfortable memory foam mattresses.

All bedrooms have a closet with hangers and a luggage rack. They also all have a desk if you would prefer to work-from-home in private.

-- TV ENTERTAINMENT --
No need to squabble over the remote, our home comes equipped with smart TVs! Every bedroom has a TV so everyone can watch their favorite channel without judgement from friends and family.

-- KITCHEN --
The kitchen is fully equipped with all basic appliances and utensils needed for cooking your own meals. We also have a drip coffee pot and Keurig machine - coffee included! For a full list of appliances, please see the listing images.

There is a dedicated indoor dining room and a more casual breakfast bar.

-- OUTDOOR LIVING --
Start your morning by enjoying a fresh coffee on the front porch. Or let the kids and dogs out in the fenced backyard while you supervise from the back deck.

Please note: During the spring, summer and fall seasons, we have a bi-weekly mowing crew come out to clean up the yard. There's no set time as they fit the visit into their schedule, this usually takes up to 30 minutes. You are welcome to continue sharing the space during this time!

During the winter, our landscaping crew will shovel snow depending on the weather and amount of snowfall.

-- EXTRAS --
- We provide shampoo, conditioner and body wash for your use while you are here. Linens and towels are also provided.
- High speed internet (500 mbps)
- 65" smart QHD TV with Cable TV. Smart TVs in every room!
- In-unit washer & dryer (laundry supplies included)
- Additional amenities are provided, please check the list of amenities on the listing or reach out to us directly.

-- PARKING --
2 private parking spots are provided in the back of the home. There is also ample free street parking in the front.

-- DOG FRIENDLY --
We allow up to 2 dogs! The house is dog-friendly and the back yard and deck are completely enclosed. Dog bowls, furniture covers and towels are also provided! When booking, please provide information on the number of dogs as well as breed. We have the following dog specific rules:
- No dogs on uncovered furniture. Please use the provided furniture covers
- Dogs must be crated when left home alone. Leave dogs unattended at your own risk.
- Pick up after your dog and dispose of dog bags in our trash can
- Unregistered dogs are subject to a minimum $150 fine
- Breed restrictions may apply

We charge a one-time non-refundable $50 pet fee. The fee goes toward additional cleaning effort and is passed directly to our cleaners.

-- EASY NO-WORK CHECKOUT --
We are proud to offer an easy and stress-free checkout experience. As frequent travelers ourselves, we wouldn‚Äôt want to end our vacation doing chores.

For checkout, just leave like it‚Äôs your own home. Turn off the lights, check the appliances and lock the door. It‚Äôs that easy!

Guest access
No keys to lose or return! This property provides secure, keyless entry with an August Smart Lock. You can lock and unlock the door with your smartphone, a unique virtual key, or personal entry code issued to you for the duration of your stay.

Guests have access to the entire house, private backyard and deck.

Other things to note
Please note the following -- if these are deal breakers, we may not be the best fit. If you have any questions, let us know. We are happy to help!

1. Our neighborhood, Highland Vicinity, is a diverse neighborhood on the North-side of downtown Indianapolis. While the neighborhood has a mix of new construction and active renovations, our street is comprised of mostly older homes.
2. While neither we, or any of our guests, have had issues with safety in the neighborhood, we understand that everyone has different expectations. The home is equipped with security cameras on the front and back door. Once booked, guests should use G-Maps Street View to see if they have any concerns with the location. If so, guests are welcome to cancel their booking before their stay.
3. This property requires a $250 security deposit. It will be collected separately by the property prior to check-in.
4. The staircase to the 2nd floor has a low clearance at the turn. It is 5'10" height. The spots are marked with high-visibility caution signs.
5. The private parking is located in the alley road. The alley is gravel and has some dips. Please drive carefully and slowly once you turn in.

---

Life can be unpredictable, and situations may arise that prevent you from traveling on your reserved dates. We recommend purchasing travel insurance to assist you with a refund due to unforeseen circumstances. Please note, general travel insurance does not always cover all situations, including Covid-19. You may wish to consider a ‚ÄúCFAR‚Äù policy (cancel for any reason).

description:

We welcome you with a bottle of wine‚Äîdrink or gift! üç∑ Plus, earn a $20 Cleaning Incentive üßΩ for going above and beyond at checkout.

The space
Key Features of Our Property

1. Infrared Sauna & Relaxation Room: Enjoy our private relaxation and meditation room, complete with an infrared sauna and a half bath. Perfect for unwinding during your stay.

2. Entire House Access: Have the entire home to yourself for a private and comfortable stay.

3. 2 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bathrooms: Spacious accommodations that sleeps up to 4 guests comfortably with BONUS office and spa room futons that can sleep 2 additional guests.

‚Ä¢ Minutes from Castleton and Keystone Malls, IKEA, and top shopping experiences.
‚Ä¢ Close to restaurants, Top Golf, and many other attractions.
‚Ä¢ Conveniently located near 3 major hospitals.

9. Safe Neighborhood: Feel secure with 24/7 camera surveillance covering all entrances and the garage (no interior or screened deck cameras‚Äîwe value your privacy!).

10. No Smoking / No Pets Policy: Smoke and pet-free property with monitors, cameras, and a high fee for any violations to ensure cleanliness and comfort for all guests.

Guest access
‚Ä¢ Guest Limit: Only guests included in the reservation are permitted on the property. The maximum occupancy is 6 individuals and 3 vehicles.

‚Ä¢ Sauna Spa Room Access: Guests now have access to our relaxing sauna spa room, featuring a sauna, futon, and hanging chairs. This space is available for use and will continue to be enhanced over the coming months. Please follow all posted guidelines to ensure safety and cleanliness.

‚Ä¢ Off-Limits Area: The supply closet on the bottom floor is locked and not accessible to guests.

‚Ä¢ Quiet Hours: Quiet hours are from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM to maintain a peaceful and relaxing environment.

‚Ä¢ Security: Please ensure all doors (except interior garage door) and windows are securely locked when leaving the property.

Other things to note
Our property features a sauna spa room, complete with a relaxing sauna, futon, and ivory hanging chairs suspended from the ceiling. This serene space is perfect for unwinding after a long day and is designed with both comfort and cleanliness in mind. Please note that children under 12 are not allowed in this sauna spa room, and water is the only beverage permitted to maintain its pristine condition.

As a business catering to solo traveling professionals, nurses, and patients we prioritize security and cleanliness. Smoking, pets, and large gatherings/parties are strictly prohibited. We monitor noise levels and smoking through discreet noise and smoke meters, and the property is surrounded by recording cameras that provide 24/7 surveillance of entrances and surroundings.

Guests who violate house rules may be removed from the premises or charged for disturbances and/or property damage.

Laundry Room

We would suggest using the washer on the ‚Äúquick wash‚Äù cycle only. This is an older washer so the ‚Äúquick wash‚Äù is really a standard wash when compared to a more modern washer model. All other cycles are ‚Äúforever‚Äù washes with a delayed spin cycle.

Beds

Beds are on platform frames so they may sit low for those with joint, arthritis, or mobility issues.

Hypoallergenic Guests

We use scented plugins throughout the property. If you are hypoallergenic, please inform us when reserving the property. We will make a note to remove plugins prior to your visit.

Cleaning Incentive

We appreciate guests who keep our property clean and follow our checkout guidelines. To thank you, we offer a $20 cleaning incentive if you:
‚Ä¢ Wash all dishes and store them in cabinets.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the bathrooms and kitchen are mostly clean. Includes wiping down counters and making sure floor is swept and/or free of dirt, food, and crumbs.
‚Ä¢ Place garbage in the bin in the garage (not on the floor or spilling out of the kitchen trash).
‚Ä¢ Strip bed sheets and duvet covers (except mattress covers) and place them, along with dirty towels, in the laundry basket on the lower level laundry room.
‚Ä¢. This incentive does not apply to special offers or stays that have been discounted by 50% or more.

MUST BE REQUESTED WITHIN 24 HOURS OF CHECK OUT.

Most guests already follow these guidelines. If this is you, simply send us a message through this app within 24 hours of checkout requesting the incentive. After we verify that our standards were exceeded, we‚Äôll refund $20 of your cleaning fee.

We hope you enjoy your stay and make the most of our unique features! If you have any questions or need assistance, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.

Warm Regards,
Anitra

BRICKS ON 15TH | Speedway, IN
Enjoy the charm of this remodeled 1930s home, just a 5-minute walk to the Indianapolis Motor Speedway (IMS). Perfect for families and groups, this spacious home sleeps 8 and offers parking for 4 cars. Conveniently located 5 miles from downtown Indianapolis and 15 minutes from the airport, you're close to top attractions. With a fully equipped kitchen, cozy living spaces, and modern comforts, Bricks on 15th is your ideal Indy getaway for any occasion.

The space
Discover Speedway‚Äôs Hidden Gem: Bricks on 15th

Welcome to Bricks on 15th, a charming 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom home nestled in the heart of Speedway, Indiana‚Äîjust steps from the iconic Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Perfect for families, groups, and race fans, this private home combines modern comforts with a prime location, making it your ideal home base for exploring everything Indy has to offer.

What You‚Äôll Love:

**Prime Location: Situated in a quiet, friendly neighborhood, Bricks on 15th is just a 5-minute walk from the legendary IMS and a quick drive to downtown Indianapolis. Whether you're here for the races or to experience the vibrant city life, you‚Äôll have easy access to it all.

**Ample Parking: Enjoy the convenience of free parking with options for both driveway and street parking, accommodating up to 4 vehicles.

**Modern Comforts: The home was fully renovated in February 2023, ensuring that everything is brand new‚Äîfrom the appliances to the stylish furnishings. The fully equipped kitchen is perfect for cooking up a feast, while the living room‚Äôs 65‚Äù smart 4K TV and 40‚Äù smart TVs in each bedroom provide endless entertainment options, including Netflix and Hulu.

**Space for Everyone: With 3 spacious bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms, Bricks on 15th comfortably sleeps up to 8 guests. Whether you‚Äôre relaxing in the cozy living room or unwinding on the front porch, you‚Äôll find plenty of space to spread out and enjoy your stay.

**Local Attractions: Explore Speedway‚Äôs vibrant local scene with a 5-minute walk to some of the area‚Äôs best restaurants, breweries, and shops. Savor local flavors at O‚ÄôReilly‚Äôs, Tacos and Tequila, or Barbecue and Bourbon, and sip on a glass of wine at A.J. Foyt‚Äôs Wine Vault. Discover unique finds at B. Erin Designs or Three Sisters and a Trunk.

**Outdoor Adventure: Just a few blocks away, the B&O Trail offers 2.5 miles of scenic, paved paths perfect for a morning jog or a leisurely bike ride. After a day of exploring, relax on the front porch and soak in the peaceful sounds of nature.

**Stay Connected: High-speed Wi-Fi is included, ensuring you can easily stay connected or work remotely during your stay.

At Bricks on 15th, we‚Äôre dedicated to making your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible. If there‚Äôs anything you need, just let us know‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help!

Guest access

This space is exclusively used for Airbnb guests: You will have access to the entire home, but NOT inside the garage or beyond the privacy fence in the backyard (northside of property).

Parking is available in the private driveway adjacent to the house or on the street.

**NOTE** For any race weekends, guests will only have access to park their vehicles in the driveway. Guests will not be allowed to park in the front lawn. The owners of the property will be parking cars for race weekends on the northside of the property behind the privacy fence.

Other things to note
Please remember that you're staying in a house, not a hotel. Please treat the space with respect. If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP, but there is no one living on site 24/7. We respond to all inquiries and communication promptly during working hours: 8am - 8pm EST. Thank you!

TITLE: 2019 Build! Trendy 4 BR w/ Pool Table!
Listing Name: 2019 Build! Trendy 4 BR w/ Pool Table!
name: 2019 Build! Trendy 4 BR w/ Pool Table!
description:
Welcome to our gorgeous, brand new, Indy getaway! Our immaculate 4 bedroom, 2 bath home in an amazing location makes for the perfect escape - we're just minutes from all the excitement Indianapolis has to offer! Unpack your bags, make yourself at home, and enjoy a gourmet kitchen, HDTVs, outdoor patio seating and so much more! Our stunning home design and proximity to restaurants and attractions will be the cherry on top of your stay!

The space
*** We take your health and the safety of our team very seriously and have put in extra processes to ensure our homes are thoroughly disinfected before each visit. Your safety and enjoyment in our home are our #1 priority! ***

Indianapolis fun awaits you in our 2,000 sq. ft newly built home! Featuring a spacious 4 bedrooms and 2 baths, a fully-loaded top-of-the-line gourmet kitchen, brand new beds with super comfortable new mattresses, a backyard patio area for enjoying the beautiful outdoor weather, and so much more! There is multiple fun living spaces for your group to enjoy, and the indoor/outdoor areas allow for effortless dining and entertaining. Our home also features a super fun hangout area in the garage.

**KEY FEATURES**
-50" HDTV with Netflix!
-Wifi connectivity (super very fast and reliable)
-Washer and dryer
-Fresh linens, towels, soaps & shampoos are provided for you (hotel-style amenities)
-A/C & heat
-Fully loaded kitchen with brand new, top-of-the-line appliances
-BBQ grill (Please use an aluminum foil when using the small and medium grill)
..and much more!

**BED CONFIGURATION**
Downstairs/1st floor:
Bedroom One: Queen Bed
Bedroom Two: Queen Bed
Common Spaces: Sofa Bed
Upstairs/2nd floor:
Loft: Sleeper Sofa
Bedroom Three: 2 Queen Beds
Bedroom Four: Twin over Full Bunk Bed
Common Spaces: Air Mattress + lots of extra pillows, blankets, towels to make your stay extra comfortable.

**OUTSIDE SPACE**
Our backyard patio is the perfect spot to enjoy time together outdoors. We have patio seating and a BBQ grill. Enjoy a glass of wine while keeping the grill master of your group company while you're taking a break from an intense game at our private garage game room!

**MY FAVORITE THINGS TO DO NEARBY**
Check out some of our favorites places while you're in town and experience the best of Indianapolis!

Attractions:
-Old World Gondoliers (2.1 miles)
-White River State Park (1.8 miles)
-Indianapolis Canal Walk (1.8 miles)
-Soldiers & Sailors Monument (1.5 miles)
-Indiana State Museum (1.9 miles)
-Indianapolis City Market (1.4 miles)
-Col. Eli Lilly Civil War Museum (1.8 miles)
-Newfields: A Place for Nature and The Arts (5.9 miles)
-The Children's Museum of Indianapolis (4.3 miles)
-Indianapolis Motor and Speedway Museum (5.5 miles)

Cafes & Restaurants:
- Goose the Market: (5.2 miles away) The best deli around
- Cafe Patachou: (2.1 miles away) Go for brunch
- Livery: (2.3 miles away) Get the empanadas
- Bluebeard: (1.0 miles away) Farm to table deliciousness & creative cocktails
- Union 50: (2.3 miles away) Amazing small plates & atmosphere
- Shoefly Public House: (4.8 miles away) Rustic, cozy, great food
- Napolese: (1.8 miles away) Fantastic pizza, drinks, and service
- Amelia's: (1.0 miles away) Best bakery in Indy
- Milktooth (1.0 miles away) Old auto repair shop converted to an amazing cafe

Bars & Brews:
- Sun King Brewing Company: (1.7 miles away) Great beer + charcuterie
- Tappers Arcade Bar: (1.1 miles away) Drinks & games, such a fun place
- MashCraft on Delaware: (4.1 miles away) Great variety of beer
- Aj's Lounge: (1.0 mile away) Hidden gem with great food and drinks (must be 21 to enter)

Shopping:
- Mass Ave Arts District: (2.0 miles away) Art galleries, food, eclectic boutiques
- Circle Centre Mall: (1.7 miles away) 100+ stores
- Fountain Square: (0.9 miles away) Antique shops, music stores, art galleries

** DETAILS TO NOTE **
-The house is 100% yours just like a hotel with a professional cleaning crew that comes in right before your visit. The whole check-in/check-out process is keyless so you can drive up at any hour, press a combination on the door lock and you're in :)
-IMPORTANT: Parties and events are strictly prohibited.
-For your safety and security reasons many (but not all) of our homes have motion detectors and a security system, as well as exterior cameras.
-As mandated by the City, we have installed noise detection equipment in both the backyard and the living room. These devices specifically only captures and records decibel levels.

Have any questions about our home or location? Please don't hesitate to reach out! We hope to host you soon!

Guest access
Keyless check-in / check-out makes it super easy!

Other things to note
‚Äî IMPORTANT: Please read and agree to all house rules.

‚Äî No smoking of any kind is allowed on our property. Marijuana is illegal in Indiana. If our cleaners smell smoke, you will be charged a fine starting at $300.00. We care deeply about the health and wellbeing of our guests and smoke of any kind leaves a smell for the guests after you.

‚Äî Please keep in mind the check-in and check-out times. If you need an early check-in or late check-out, feel free to reach out and confirm your request 48 hours before the date requested. That way, we can ensure that the cleaners have the time between guests to make the space spotless. There will be a $75 charge for each check-in/out adjustment.

-- Parties and Events - Parties and events are strictly prohibited. Quiet hours, which start at 10 pm, are strictly observed. To ensure that our guests do not exceed a certain volume level and disturb our neighbors, we use a NoiseAware decibel level monitoring device. They are located in the home's common area. Any evidence of a party or event, including camera footage, excessive garbage, or other evidence will result in a fine of $500.00, legal action, and possible eviction without reimbursement, plus the cost of any extra cleaning or damages that result from the event. We have ring cameras in the front and the back of the house for security purposes.

We kindly remind all guests that tampering with or unplugging Ring cameras is strictly prohibited. These cameras play a vital role in ensuring the security of our premises and protecting both you and our property. Please be aware that any unauthorized interference with the Ring cameras will be taken very seriously. In accordance with our policies and local regulations, guests found engaging in such actions may face fines of up to $500.
