name: Prime Downtown Location+Garage | Walk to Mass Ave
description:
Newly renovated, pet friendly townhome in Downtown Indianapolis. Walking distance to Bottleworks and all the best bars/restaurants. A short ride to Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, & the Convention Center. Perfect location to call home as you explore Indy. The townhome is great for single travelers or a large group with the capability to sleep 8 guests. Also, there is a private one car garage to keep your car nice + warm as well as free parking just outside the home.

The space
The newly renovated townhome has a primetime location and is close to all of the action in Indianapolis. Below is a list of some popular destinations near our location:

*Gainbridge Fieldhouse - 1.4 miles
*Lucas Oil Stadium - 2.0 miles
*Indiana Convention Center - 1.9 mile
*Indianapolis Motor Speedway - 4.9 miles
*Bottleworks Hotel & "The Garage" Food Hall- 0.8 miles
*Indianapolis Zoo- 3.2 miles
*Fountain Square Neighborhood- 2.6 miles
*Victory Field- 2.2 miles
*Eli Lilly- 2.3 miles
*The Canal- 1.2 miles
*Children's Museum of Indianapolis - 2.9 miles
*Whole Foods- 1.3 miles

BEDROOMS
Two bedrooms on the second floor:
- 1 large owner's suite w/ a king mattress, private bathroom.
QUEEN PULLOUT COUCH LOCATED IN OWNER'S SUITE. KEEP THIS IN MIND WHEN BOOKING FOR A LARGER GROUP.

- 1 guest bedroom with queen size mattress.

- 1 pullout, sleeper couch on the first floor living room (queen)


BATHROOMS
There are 2.5 bathrooms in the home.
- half bath on the first floor
- two full bathrooms on the 2nd floor

LIVING ROOM
First floor living room with a 65" Smart TV. You must provide logins for streaming services. There is a sleeper sofa with a queen pull-out mattress.

KITCHEN
Full kitchen includes dishes, silverware, knives, glasses, wine glasses, cooking utensils, and pots & pans. Fridge and freezer for storing food and beverages. Oven range and microwave for food preparation and dishwasher/garbage disposal for cleanup. Keurig coffee maker and toaster to enjoy a tasty breakfast.

PARKING
There is an attached one car garage. Key-code for garage will be given day before check in. There is also free parking in the parking lot next to the townhome.

STAIRS
When entering the home, there is a one step up to the porch and a small step to enter the home. There is a full flight of stairs to access the second floor.

Washer and dryer are located on the second floor.

Please remember that you will be staying in a privately owned home. I ask that you treat the space with the same respect you would show your own home.

For the safety and security of our guests and neighbors, the exterior of the building is monitored 24/7 by a recording security camera covering the front entrance.

The maximum house capacity is 8 people. Unauthorized guests, parties and events are house rule violations and will result in fines / fees and immediate cancellation of booking without refund. I value the safety and security of all our guests.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire home.

description:
Welcome to your stylish home away from home in the heart of Indianapolis! Nestled in a prime location, our short-term rental is designed for those seeking a blend of modern luxury and urban convenience.

Our property is strategically situated near the bustling downtown area, putting you in close proximity to renowned restaurants, entertainment venues, and cultural hotspots.

Enjoy a hassle-free experience with easy check-in and responsive support throughout your stay.

PLUS - a hot tub!

The space
**Chic Interiors:** Immerse yourself in the trendy and thoughtfully curated design of our 1902 remodeled custom home. We have unique furniture & art, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration or the perfect place to pre-game. Tall inviting ceilings, a built-in dry bar, and gas fireplace make this floor a conversation piece.
**Gourmet Kitchen:** Unleash your inner chef in our fully equipped kitchen, complete with top-of-the-line appliances and sleek granite countertops that truly sparkle.
**Secret Basement Bookcase Door - Play Zone:** Kick back in the cozy living area undergrounds, featuring a smart TV, giant comfy couch, and space for playing games.

**Dream-Worthy Beds:** Enjoy a restful night's sleep on our luxurious mattresses and high-quality linens.
**Spa-Like Bathrooms:** Pamper yourself in our stylish bathrooms.
**High-Tech Comfort:** Stay connected with high-speed Wi-Fi and indulge in the latest entertainment with our Smart TVs.

Guest access

Tall ceilings welcome you as you enter the home, a spacious gathering area and the well stocked kitchen provide a great space for your small group. The upstairs is designed for sleeping comfort with 3 new beds. The primary room has a California King and private bathroom. The 2 bedrooms off the jack-and-jill bathroom have private balconies and new Queen size mattresses. The basement can be closed off using our 'secret bookcase door' or it can remain open. A comfy couch and new smart TV await you along with a huge comfy couch. You can also play games in the basement! (We also have an air mattress for two that can be used in the basement.) Our entire home is available for your enjoyment, bar the utility closets and attic space.

Other things to note
Elevate your Indianapolis experience by booking our short-term rental. Unwind in comfort, explore with ease, and make memories that will last a lifetime. Your urban retreat awaits ‚Äì reserve your dates now!

There are tons of food and entertainment options within walking distance and even more just minutes away on public transportation or vehicle.

Close to White River Park, Monument Circle, Lucas Oil Stadium, Georgia Steet, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, Circle Center Mall, Mass Avenue, Bottleworks District & The Garage Foodhall, Indiana Convention Center, and more!

Walking Distance to many restaurants and bars, including local legends like Kountry Kitchen, West Fork Whiskey, Bocca, Baby's, and more!

Heated tile floor, massive walk-in tile shower, toilet with built in bidet, modern kitchen with butcher block countertops, and a large private backyard are just some of the amenities you'll enjoy during your stay at The Nora Nook.

Centrally located on the north side of Indianapolis with convenient access to everything Indy has to offer. You'll be less than 1 mile to US 31 and 465 for an easy in and easy out drive.

The space
Location:
The guest house is located right inside the major highway loop, 465, just off of Meridian & 96th street Nora. This quaint little neighborhood in the far north side of Indianapolis will have everything you need. The popular Monon Trail is less than a mile away and is great for walking & biking. All of the essentials are within a mile or two as well - Target, Kroger, Aldi, Whole Foods & Total Wine. The city of Carmel is just up the road, Broad Ripple is a short 10 minute drive down College Ave, & just 10 miles south is the center of downtown Indianapolis.

The Guest House:
You'll enter the guest house through a separate entrance. The home is surrounded by a large privacy fence, giving you your own drive & backyard to enjoy during your stay.

Inside you'll find a large living space open to a modern kitchen with butcher block countertops, a large breakfast bar, and sliding barn doors. The living space is filled with large windows & a sliding glass door that opens up into your own private backyard.

The bedroom is separate from the living space allowing for a quiet space while others might still be up. The bedroom is equipped with its own TV (not pictured). Connected to the bedroom is a private bathroom with heated tile floors and a huge walk-in shower. The bathroom is well equipped with towels and soaps.

Some of the other amenities you'll find include a washer and dryer equipped with detergent and dryer sheets, a generous amount of coffee, a large couch for you to relax on, and a TV equipped with Roku for all your streaming needs.

Access:
After booking, you will receive a personalized access code to the smart lock on the front door. This allows for seamless access during your stay.

Guest access
You'll have access to everything behind the guest house inside the privacy fence. This includes a paved driveway & private backyard with a deck!

Entry into the guest house will be via a unique entry code for the smart lock on the front door. This will be available in your Airbnb reservation before your check in date.

Other things to note
We have a strict no party or event policy. We will charge a $500 fee if a party or event is hosted at the property.

Welcome to your luxurious retreat! This spacious 4-bedroom home comfortably accommodates up to 10 guests. The open floor plan connects the living room, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen, creating a welcoming space for everyone to come together. The kitchen is outfitted with all essentials for home-cooked meals. Relax and unwind in the theater room, complete with a wet bar. Step outside to enjoy the private patio‚Äîideal for morning coffee or evening relaxation under the stars!

The space
**Main Floor Highlights**
Step into the welcoming main floor, where the bright and airy open floor plan brings together the living room, dining area, and a modern kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with all essentials, including high-end appliances and plenty of counter space, making it ideal for cooking or enjoying a group brunch. The large dining table comfortably seats six for shared meals, and the cozy living room is perfect for relaxed evenings. This floor also features a convenient half bath, a laundry room for quick clean-ups, and a dedicated office for anyone who needs a quiet workspace.

**Second Floor Comfort**
Upstairs, you‚Äôll find three beautifully appointed bedrooms, each with its own TV. The spacious primary bedroom offers a king-sized bed, ample closet space, and a private ensuite bathroom with dual sinks and a walk-in shower. Down the hall, two equally sized bedrooms provide cozy accommodations with full-size beds and share a full bathroom with a bathtub‚Äîideal for families or friends traveling together.

The basement also includes a fourth bedroom with a TV, featuring bunk beds with a full-size bed on the bottom and two twin beds on top, making it a great spot for kids or additional guests. A full bathroom with a walk-in shower is conveniently located here as well.

**Outdoor Oasis and Parking**

This secluded outdoor area provides a quiet retreat for conversation or simply unwinding after a day of adventure. While the garage is not accessible for guest use at this time, the private driveway is available for convenient parking.

description:
Experience ‚ÄòLa Casa Negra‚Äô, a 1930 gem in So Bro, reimagined for modern comfort.
La Casa Negra merges historical allure with contemporary flair.
In the heart of SoBro Village, it‚Äôs steps from the Monon Trail and Red Line. Enjoy local favorites like Root & Bone, Delicia, and Gallery Pastry Shop. Relish BBQ at Half Liter, breakfast at Good Morning Mama‚Äôs, and diverse dining at Caf√© Patachou, The Garden Table, and more. La Casa Negra: Your gateway to SoBro‚Äôs vibrant culture and cuisine.

The space
Welcome to La Casa Negra, a fully renovated home in the vibrant SoBro (South Broadripple) area of the Meridian Kessler Neighborhood, celebrated for its diverse restaurants, shoppes, and lively nightspots. Drawing fun Spanish influences, La Casa Negra is a haven of comfort.

We‚Äôve equipped the entire structure with spray foam insulation and a state-of-the-art HVAC system, ensuring year-round comfort. On the ground floor, cozy bedrooms accommodate multiple guests, complemented by a bathroom offering privacy, natural light, and both shower and bath options.

TITLE: *Home away from home, 15 min. to Indy downtown
Listing Name: *Home away from home, 15 min. to Indy downtown
name: *Home away from home, 15 min. to Indy downtown
description:
Enjoy your home away from home in a quiet neighborhood just minutes from all the attractions of downtown Indy. 5 minutes from the highway with lots of restaurants and stores nearby. 15 minutes to the Lucas Oil Stadium, 20 minutes to the Convention Center, Indianapolis Zoo, and White River State Park. 25 minutes to the Motor Speedway. Home is fresh, comfortable, and stylish. Stocked kitchen, fully fenced backyard with a fire pit and a picnic table.

The space
Beautiful southwestern feel. 4 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Master suite has a queen with an en suite bathroom. Kids room has a twin bed and a trundle bed that can sleep 2 (each sleeps 1). The trundle bed stays low to the ground. There is a full bed in the third room with a desk. The fourth room is an extra large space with a couch, table, and desk. There are extra chairs to add to the dining table and stools are behind the island. Box fan available. Laundry is in the kitchen. Enjoy the large backyard and use the wood we have outside for your bonfire.

We provide luxurious bath towels and hand towels for you, also:

Hand soap
3 toilet paper rolls in each bathroom
Dishwasher tablets
1 paper towel roll
Trash bags
Small container of dish soap
Cleaning supplies for spills or general clean up if desired

Please plan on bringing your personal toiletries as we do not provide body soap, shampoo, or conditioner.

For children there is a high chair, a non-slip bath mat, plates, cups, silverware, and bowls in the kitchen, and books, games, puzzles, and a night light in the kids room.

Your furry friends will enjoy the fully fenced backyard and walking in the neighborhood on the sidewalks. There is a pet fee of $75. When booking, please add your pet. NO cats.

Guest access
The entire home and yard are yours to enjoy. Access code will be given before arrival.

Other things to note
We are one street away from the train tracks. The train comes every day about 4PM and 11PM and goes by quickly.

We are happy to host you and your furry friend! We do have a pet fee of $75 per pet, per stay. Please add them when you are booking. No more than 2 pets. NO cats.

Your hosts live in the main house on the property, while your carriage house AirBnB sits atop of the detached 3-car garage. You'll have your own private entrance that is completely separate from the main home.

‚òÜ‚òÜ THE SPACE ‚òÜ‚òÜ

SLEEPING ARRANGEMENT

KITCHEN AND DINING
‚úî Make yourself at home and please utilize all the kitchen appliances (stove with oven, microwave, dishwasher, fridge) to fix yourself a hearty meal.

AMENITIES AND ENTERTAINMENT
‚úî Keep your packing light as we provide a starter pack of paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher pods, trash bags, toilet paper, hand soap, laundry pods, and many more essential toiletries.
‚úî Staying for a couple of days and need to keep your clothes fresh? Help yourself to our in-unit washer and dryer as well as the iron and ironing board, all available for your convenience.

Super fast WIFI internet speeds also allow you to work comfortably without interruption.
‚úî Outdoor Living: Gas grill, well lit patio w/ chairs, big yard (not fully fenced).
‚úî Parking: Driveway (2 vehicles), free street parking (no garage access).

- Kid friendly: Got kids? We do too! Child-friendly items (toys, books, board games, pack and play, high-chair, plastic plates and utensils, etc.) have been provided. Note that while the property is kid friendly it is not necessarily child-proof.

- Pet friendly: Dogs are subject to host approval and require a $100 pet fee to cover additional cleaning costs. We have a big, backyard that your dogs will love. - FAQ: Keyless access, 1 doorbell camera (facing front entry), pet fee (paid pre-trip), quiet hours (10:00 PM - 8:00 AM)

Guest access

The entire house is available for your use, except the garage and areas behind locked doors (such as owner's closets). Please do not park in the garage. You can park two cars in the driveway, along with plenty of additional street parking.

Other things to note
We cannot control the weather and no refunds will be given due to trip cancellations, interruptions, or inconveniences caused due to unforeseeable weather conditions; therefore, we recommend the purchase of Travel Insurance for all planned vacations. Travel Insurance will protect your Investment in the event of weather events that would make roads impassable to vehicles or the property uninhabitable due to damages caused by natural disasters.

Our home is located in a quiet residential neighborhood and is not suitable for parties and large, loud gatherings. Smoking is strictly prohibited on the property.

Please note: We do not provide ice or filtered water for drinking. We ask that you do not use the garage. We have security surveillance cameras on the exterior of the property. Any moving, removing, and/or tampering with the security cameras will result in a fee of $500.

Only dogs are allowed in our pet friendly home. Dogs are not allowed on the beds or on other furniture and must be crated if left alone in the house. An additional fee will be charged to repair/replace any items that are damaged or cleaning complications that may arise due to the pets. No other pets are allowed unless previously agreed to by the host. Each dog, up to 3 dogs, will be $100 each.

COVID Cleaning: Our home is professionally cleaned. All doorknobs, light switches, drawer pulls, remote controls, faucet handles etc. are sanitized. Where possible, we allot a 24-hour buffer between guests.

NOTE:
Please be aware that while we ensure that all furniture is well-maintained, it's important to use it responsibly and carefully to prevent any accidents. We advise you to take a moment upon arrival to familiarize yourself with the space and use all items as intended.

Please note that as per our house rules and VRBO's policy, the host is not responsible for any injuries incurred at the property. Your safety is important to us, so if you notice any potential safety issues upon check-in, please inform us immediately so we can address them.

10 years ago, we thought we were just visiting Indianapolis... but probably like you will experience, we fell in love with the house, the neighborhood, and all the things we could experience within a 3-8 minute drive.

Welcome to our 3 bedroom, 2 full bath downtown home in a quiet St. Clair neighborhood. The property is a new build and tastefully decorated. Perfect for gathering with friends, family, or co~workers. Approved pets allowed with a pet fee.

The space
We have thought of everything you could need for a great stay in Indianapolis. From beautiful decor to highly rated mattresses, you will be staying in comfort while visiting our great city!

Our spacious kitchen is equipped with all the cooking essentials including basic cooking oils and spices. Our bathrooms have towels and other essentials. All bedrooms are located on the main and only floor of our ranch style (1 story) home.

We have a NO smoking/vaping and no party policy. We are pet friendly for approved pets that are well~behaved and house broken. We have a pet fee of $50. We charge $100 for specialized cleaning or if any of these policies are disregarded

EXTERIOR AREAS: the back yard is fully enclosed with a wooden fence with gate access in the front and rear. Private parking in our 2 car garage or street parking is available. There is a front porch with a porch swing and chairs!

Guest access

Other things to note
HOUSE RULES:

-Guests will be responsible for replacing any items that are missing after the stay

-No glitter or confetti may be used in the house (impossible to clean!) and nothing may be nailed or taped to the walls.

-If extra cleaning is required beyond a typical clean (loads of trash, furniture moves, excessive amount of dishes) There will be an extra fee of $100 for deep cleaning

-It's the guest responsibility to log out of their streaming accounts on the TV (cleaners will not do it)

-The host is not responsible for situations out of their control such as internet or power outreaches and it will not incur a refund given for such uncontrollable events.

- Traveling incurs a natural risk no matter what. If your travel plans require a cancellation due to sickness (COVID etc) or weather delay (cancelled flights etc) , a refund cannot be given so we highly suggest you book CAR (Cancel for Any Reason) Insurance.

YOUR HOST:
Read about me! I love hospitality and I love our guests. I am here to make your stay great!!

TITLE: Charming Broad Ripple Farmhouse
Listing Name: Charming Broad Ripple Farmhouse
name: Charming Broad Ripple Farmhouse
description:
The Charming Farmhouse located in the heart of the Broad Ripple Village in Indianapolis is an ideal haven for anyone looking for a comfortable and worry-free stay to enjoy all the city has to offer! It is a pet friendly, 2-bed, 2-bath that sleeps 6 with a fully equipped kitchen, laundry room and modern amenities. A quick walk to the Broad Ripple Restaurant District and 20min drive downtown or the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, the Charming Farmhouse is your perfect home base.

The space
The Farmhouse comfortably sleeps six people with the two-bedroom, one-bathroom main story floor plan. The master bedroom has a king bed and the second upstairs bedroom and bonus room in the basement both have queen beds. And beds are equipped with high-end, luxurious bedding and linens as well as the most recent mattress technologies to ensure a comfortable stay. We also have a bonus futon room, full bathroom and laundry room in the finished basement downstairs that comfortably sleeps two more!

In the spacious living room there is ample seating, blankets to curl up with on the couch, a flat screen TV, and games and books for an easy night in. The living room also leads right out to the quaint screened in front porch. The perfect place to enjoy coffee you brewed in the kitchen or that you picked up from one of our local favorites just down Broad Ripple Avenue.

The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, a full complement of dinnerware, flatware, glassware, wine glasses, serving pieces, cooking utensils and baking dishes in the cabinets. The fridge includes filtered water and ice in the door. You also have access to a coffee bar, we have coffee pods and tea bags in the canisters next to the coffee pot to ensure you have your caffeine fix!

In the back room, you will find a quiet and equipped home office. If it is work that brings you to Indy, you have found the perfect space! The office includes a large wooden desk, a comfortable and stylish desk chair and easy plug access on the left-hand side of the desk just under the drawers. The Farmhouse is equipped with WiFi so you will not miss a beat while working from our home.

The basement is fully finished to include a large, comfortable sectional, second TV and Boccer Ball table for your enjoyment. There is also a bonus room with a queen bed. Finally, the basement also houses the second full bathroom and laundry should you need it.

The yard is fully fenced in to protect your furry friends or children from the street and includes a secluded outdoor dining area on a spacious deck.

Lastly, being so close to the Broad Ripple strip, I want you to be aware that the noise and fun will sometimes spill into the surrounding neighborhoods (including ours). We do not want this to be a surprise. Please let us know of any major disturbances, but we also appreciate your understanding with some level of noise that may come from the street.

Guest access
We have two parking spaces for you to utilize that can be accessed via an alley behind the house. Please park right behind the garage and in front of the stairs to the back deck.

There is a garage on-site, but it will remain locked during your stay, we appreciate your understanding!

The Farmhouse is equipped with self check-in for your stay. To enter the house, the front and back doors are equipped with keyless locks. The entry code will be messaged to you prior to your arrival. The entry codes will be how you access and lock the house during your entire stay.

We do have security cameras around the perimeter of the property for your safety and protection, and ours!

Other things to note
The Farmhouse is centrally located within walking distance of the lively Broad Ripple Restaurant, Bar and Shopping district, Broad Ripple Park and the Monon hike and bike trail.

The Farmhouse is also a close 20-minute drive to the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, Lucas Oil Stadium, and the Indianapolis Convention Center downtown. It is a 15-minute drive to the Massachusetts Avenue Shopping and Restaurant District and the Children‚Äôs Museum of Indianapolis. Lastly, it is a quick 10-minute drive to Butler University.

TITLE: Cottage on Columbia ! *Hot Tub* Downtown Indy!
Listing Name: Cottage on Columbia ! *Hot Tub* Downtown Indy!
name: Cottage on Columbia ! *Hot Tub* Downtown Indy!
description:
Cozy Cottage in the heart of downtown Indianapolis. We just added the deck and hot tub, it is available year round. : ) Quiet and secluded, located in a rapidly transitioning neighborhood with rich history. Our Cottage is conveniently located within walking distance of highly acclaimed restaurants, coffee shops, a brewery and distillery. Situated just two blocks from the Monon Trail offering walking and biking access to more restaurants and shopping on Indy's famous Mass Avenue!

The space
We just finished a complete rehab on our Cottage and we are excited for you to enjoy it as much as we do! You will feel right at home in the open concept floor plan with high ceilings. It's a tiny but mighty home that is packed full of charm! During your stay, participate in #porching, one of Indy's favorite pastimes, on your own private front porch. We are located directly across from the highly acclaimed Oaks Academy Middle School. There is free street parking available but keep in mind that the school dismissal is at 4:00. The pickup line gets pretty busy between 3:30 and 4:00. The Interstate is nearby, which means that at times you can hear it. It's slightly noticeable but not an annoyance. The street the cottage sits on, however, is delightfully quiet, aside from weekdays during school dismissal time. NOTE-there is a lot of development going on in the neighborhood. Lot's of new homes and condos being built all around the Cottage. Just wanted to make sure you know.

If our schedule allows, we do offer an optional early check in for $25 per hour for up to 2 hours.

Guest access
Entire space is included in this rental. Please, make yourself at home! Parking is on the street in front of the house. We do have a camper that we park out back. It's on the road a lot but sometimes we host travelers in the backyard. It's in a different fenced in area from the cottage so you do have complete privacy.
If our schedule allows, we do offer an optional early check in for $25 per hour for up to 2 hours.

Other things to note
We are so happy to host you and our goal is for you to have a 5 Star experience in beautiful Indianapolis! Please remember that you are staying in a house, not a hotel. Please treat our home with respect and if any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP. If our schedule allows, we do offer an optional early check in for $25 per hour for up to 2 hours.

We have partnered with an amazing cleaning company that has a great mission!

Renewal Cleaning Services is more than just cleaning. We provide a safe space for women to rebuild their lives through work, service, and relationships. We achieve this through meticulous training, consistent check-ins, flexibility in schedule, and a focus on building genuine relationships in and with the communities we serve. The women on our team who have shared their journey through severe childhood abuse, also have an opportunity to participate in a support group run by one of our partner organizations. We believe that providing this space to heal while also creating economic opportunities is the best way to help women make positive strides in their lives and begin to thrive.

If our schedule allows, we do offer an optional early check in for $25 per hour for up to 2 hours. We do love well behaved pets, they must be approved

Please familiarize yourself with our Cancellation Policy prior to booking. We recommend opting in for the Travelers Insurance. We strictly adhere to our policies and always encourage guests to purchase optional travel insurance to cover unanticipated changes in travel plans. Hosts are not be responsible for issuing refunds due to changes made outside of the cancellation policy.

description:
Sleek, modern house in Downtown Indianapolis in the neighborhood of Bates-Hendricks (south of city center). Minutes from Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, & the Convention Center. Great bars & restaurants are nearby in Bates-Hendricks & Fountain Square. Perfect for a sports filled weekend, business trip, or a relaxing home base while exploring. W/ room for 8 guests, you can take advantage of all the fun w/ friends, fam, & pets in our spacious 3 bdrm, 3.5 bath, newly constructed home.

The space
The home is close to all of the action in Indianapolis. Below is a list of some popular destinations near our location:

*Gainbridge Fieldhouse - 1 mile
*Lucas Oil Stadium - 1.3 miles
*Indiana Convention Center - 1.5 miles
*Indianapolis Motor Speedway - 7.5 miles
*Mass Ave- 0.8 miles
*Bottleworks Hotel & "The Garage" Food Hall- 1.1 miles
*Indianapolis Zoo- 1.7 miles
*Fountain Square Neighborhood- 0.6 miles
*Victory Field- 1.3 miles
*Eli Lilly- 0.7 miles
*The Canal- 1.7 miles
*Children's Museum of Indianapolis - 6.8 miles
*Two Chicks and a Hammer Store-1.2 miles
*Whole Foods- 0.6 miles

The house is new construction in Bates-Hendricks. Bates-Hendricks is just south of the city and is adjacent to Fountain Square & Fletcher Place (other neighborhoods).

BEDROOMS
Three bedrooms:
- 1 large owner's suite w/ a king mattress, walk-in shower & double vanity sink.
- 2 guest bedrooms with queen size mattresses.
- 1 pullout, sleeper couch on the main level (queen)

BATHROOMS
There are 3.5 bathrooms in the home.
- half bath on the first floor
- three full bathrooms on the 2nd/3rd floors.

LIVING ROOM
First floor living room with a 65" Smart TV. You must provide logins for streaming services. There is a sleeper sofa with a queen pull-out mattress.

KITCHEN
Full kitchen includes dishes, silverware, knives, glasses, wine glasses, cooking utensils, and pots & pans. Fridge and freezer for storing food and beverages. Oven range and microwave for food preparation and dishwasher/garbage disposal for cleanup. Keurig coffee maker and toaster to enjoy a tasty breakfast and an island with bar stools for you to gather around. You also have a dining room table.

PARKING
There is a detached two car garage behind the house which you can access through the alley off of New Jersey St. The garage door opener will be on the counter in the kitchen if you choose to use it. You may also park in front of the home which is free. This looks like a main road, but you may park there.

STAIRS
When entering the home, you must walk up three steps to reach the front door. There is a full flight of stairs to access the second floor and another flight of stairs which lead to the third-level and rooftop deck.

Washer and dryer are located on the third floor.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole house.

TITLE: Modern Carriage House Indianapolis
Listing Name: Modern Carriage House Indianapolis
name: Modern Carriage House Indianapolis
description:
Welcome to our charming carriage house in the heart of Indianapolis! Just minutes from the Convention Center, Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, Bottleworks District, and Mass Ave, our location is perfect for exploring. Enjoy modern comforts in a historic setting with a cozy living area, a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable bedrooms, a modern bathroom, one garage space, free coffee, fast wifi, and high-quality furniture for a comfortable stay. Book now for an unforgettable experience

The space
Welcome to our charming carriage house, a unique and comfortable retreat in the heart of Indianapolis! A carriage house, traditionally, is a secondary dwelling located on the same property as a main house. Originally designed to store horse-drawn carriages, these historic structures have been beautifully repurposed for modern living. Our carriage house, built in 2024, offers all the modern comforts while retaining the historical charm and character of traditional carriage houses.

Property Features:

Parking: You'll have access to two parking spots‚Äîone in the attached garage and one in the driveway.

Living Area: Ascend the stairs to the second floor, where you'll find a spacious living room featuring a cozy leather pull-out sofa and a 55-inch TV for your entertainment.

Kitchen: The fully stocked kitchen is equipped with everything you need to prepare meals, including complimentary coffee to start your mornings right.

Bedroom: The bedroom boasts two queen beds with luxurious 12-inch thick mattresses. Each bed is adorned with four pillows‚Äîtwo memory foam and two goose feather pillows‚Äîto ensure a restful night's sleep.

Walk-In Closet: Connected to the bedroom is a walk-in closet that includes a full set washer and dryer, providing added convenience during your stay.

Bathroom: Off the living room, you'll find a full bathroom stocked with all the essentials and oversized bath towels for your comfort.

Our new-build carriage house, constructed in 2024, is ideally situated near the Indianapolis convention center, Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, the $300M Bottleworks District, and the vibrant Mass Ave. Enjoy the perfect blend of historic charm and modern amenities in a prime location. Book your stay today and experience the best of Indianapolis!

Guest access
Guest will have full access to the private carriage house.

Other things to note
We allow up to 6 guests, but it's up to you to decide if the space is comfortable for your group.

Their is potential for normal traffic noise being in downtown Indianapolis.

TITLE: Elegant 3BR townhouse in historic Irvington
Listing Name: Elegant 3BR townhouse in historic Irvington
name: Elegant 3BR townhouse in historic Irvington
description:
Nestled in the heart of Irvington‚Äôs historic district, Emerson Cove is a tastefully furnished home with a blend of traditional & historic design - a spacious duplex with three bedrooms and two bathrooms, and outfitted with a generously stocked kitchen, so you have the option to cook meals and brew up fresh coffee during your stay. Stroll the brick lined streets of Irvington and discover the local shops, restaurants, and coffee houses.

The space
Originally constructed in the early 1900s, Emerson Cove features beautifully restored hardwood floors, high ceilings, original wood trim and solid hardwood interior doors. Each space has been thoughtfully outfitted to make your stay comfortable, cozy, and relaxing. The house is designed to comfortably accommodate six guests.

The main floor features an amply stocked kitchen, a coffee and tea nook, a mudroom with an in unit washer and dryer that guests can use during their stay, a full bathroom, a dining room set with six seats, a Crosley record turntable and a vinyl collection, a stack of fun, interactive board and card games, and a cozy, inviting living room set up with a 65 inch television - the perfect space to relax.

Three upstairs bedrooms - including a master bedroom with a king bed and a desk, a trundle room with two twin beds, and a third room with a queen bed - are outfitted with memory foam mattresses that provide support and comfort. Each bedroom has a 55 inch TV, and we provide sound machines to promote restful sleep, helping soften the occasional trains that blow their whistles at a nearby crossing, as well as other ambient city sounds. The second bathroom is thoughtfully stocked to make your stay more comfortable.

Finally, there is a partially fenced in backyard that is shared with the other side of the duplex. The back lot includes two guest parking spaces, as well as a cozy shared fire pit area, complete with outdoor chairs and tables, lit with strings of suspended patio lights.

Enjoy the walkability of Irvington - local restaurants, coffee houses, taprooms and cocktail lounges, shops and bookstores, are all just up the street from the home. Amble along the Pennsy Trail, pick up a robust coffee from Coal Yard, savor a slice of upper crust pizza from Jockamo‚Äôs, or try a hearty skillet breakfast at Lincoln Square.

Downtown Indy is a mere 15 minute drive away - discover the fun shops and food offerings in Fountain Square, Mass Ave, the Bottleworks district, and enjoy a leisurely Canal walk. Whether you‚Äôre settling in for a weekend visit, planning to stick around to see the sights, or just passing through, the Emerson Cove house is the perfect place for you to book while you‚Äôre in Indy!


ACCESSIBILITY //
The home was built in the early 1900s and some features were not originally designed with accessibility in mind. We've updated it to make it as comfortable as possible, but here are a few things you may want to note:

1. There are 4 concrete steps leading to the entrance to the home. The last step is particularly tall.

2. The bedrooms are all located on the 2nd floor of the home. There is a flight of stairs that are relatively steep to reach the second floor.

3. There are 2 full bathrooms. One is located on the main floor, one on the upper floor.


OCCUPANCY //
The house is set up to comfortably accommodate 6 guests. If your party is larger than 6, please reach out to the hosts so we can navigate hosting a larger group.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire living space of the home and share access to the front porch and backyard with the neighboring unit. Self check-in allows guests to enter the home and come and go freely via a digital keypad. Two off-street parking spots are allotted to guests and street parking is available if you have additional vehicles.

Other things to note
GENERAL //
1. NEW ACCOUNTS - If there are no prior reviews on your account, we will ask that you provide some additional information about yourself, your group and your trip prior to accepting your reservation request. In these instances, we reserve the right to deny the request if we feel it necessary to safeguard the home and apologize in advance for any inconvenience this may cause.

2. HOUSE RULES - Before booking, please be sure to read our House Rules, Quiet Hours Policy and Pet Policy (if you plan to bring a dog). They are found in the "House rules" section of this listing.

3. SHARED WALL - This home is a duplex with two separate living units and the interior wall is shared between units. Please be respectful to the other residents and keep any extra noise and heavy footfall to a minimum.

4. DEDICATED WORKSPACE - The Dedicated Workspace is a desk and chair located in the master bedroom. The chair offers a height adjustment. Please review the photos to make sure this will meet your needs for a dedicated workspace prior to booking.

5. TRAIN NOISE - The home is in a mature residential neighborhood and is not located on a busy street. However, the home is near an active train crossing where trains blow their whistle a few times a day & night. Optional white noise machines have been supplied in each bedroom if you would like some additional noise masking.


KITCHEN //
We have outfitted the home with a variety of goods and household items to make your stay comfortable. In addition to cookware - pots, pans, baking trays, muffin tins, knives, utensils, cutting boards, etc. - you‚Äôll find a Keurig, a coffee maker, a Ninja bullet blender, an immersion blender, a hand mixer, and a 3 quart crockpot to help make mealtime easier. The kitchen is stocked with olive oil, a variety of seasonings, K-cups, sugar, sweeteners, and creamers. Filtered water is set up next to the sink, supplying drinking water during your stay.


ENTERTAINMENT //
The home is equipped with a Wi-Fi connected 65" 4K Roku Smart TV in the living room and Wi-Fi connected 55" 4K Roku Smart TVs in each of the bedrooms. Amazon Prime Video is included with your stay. The Roku-enabled TVs also allow you to log into your own streaming services.


INTERNET //
500Mbps Up/Down Fiber Optic Internet connectivity, multiple Wi-Fi 6 mesh nodes for complete coverage and fast speeds. Ethernet connection is available by plugging into the Asus mesh node located in the closet in the queen bedroom.


CHECK OUT STEPS //
We intentionally keep things easy for you, so you can get down the road:
1. Close and lock windows and exterior doors.
2. Turn off all the interior lights.
3. Lock the door behind you.


WHY YOU SHOULD BOOK THIS HOME //
1. Simple self check-in with keypad code
2. Clean, comfortable and tastefully furnished
3. Fast Wi-Fi Internet (500+ Mbps) w/mesh nodes for good coverage
4. Large, Wi-Fi connected 4K smart TVs in living room and all bedrooms
5. Comfortable beds
6. Among the top number of amenities available in the market
7. Simple check-out process with minimal steps
8. Reasonable cleaning fee
9. Longer term stays welcome. Price breaks given for stays at 7+ and 28+ nights
10. Easy cancellation policy if your plans change
11. Family owned and operated for a step above in quality - no rental company shenanigans.

description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Ideal mix of style and contemporary comfort in our centrally located home, situated in the vibrant Bates Hendricks area of Indianapolis. Enjoy complimentary coffee, Wi-Fi, and shower essentials! There is only

The space
Welcome to our charming carriage house, a unique and comfortable retreat in the heart of Indianapolis! A carriage house, traditionally, is a secondary dwelling located on the same property as a main house. Originally designed to store horse-drawn carriages, these historic structures have been beautifully repurposed for modern living. Our carriage house, built in 2024, offers all the modern comforts while retaining the historical charm and character of traditional carriage houses.

Property Features:

Parking: You'll have access to street parking

Living Area: Ascend the stairs to the second floor, where you'll find a spacious living room featuring a cozy couch.

Kitchen: The fully stocked kitchen is equipped with everything you need to prepare meals, including complimentary coffee to start your mornings right.

Bedroom: The bedroom boasts one queen beds with luxurious 12-inch thick mattresses.

Laundry Room: A full set washer and dryer, providing added convenience during your stay.

Bathroom: Off the living room, you'll find a full bathroom stocked with all the essentials and oversized bath towels for your comfort.

Our new-build carriage house, constructed in 2023, is ideally situated near the Indianapolis convention center, Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, the $300M Bottleworks District, and the vibrant Mass Ave. Enjoy the perfect blend of historic charm and modern amenities in a prime location. Book your stay today and experience the best of Indianapolis!

Other things to note
PLEASE NOTE: This is a Carriage House (The Small House behind the main house). Please do NOT ring the doorbell or attempt to enter the main house. This listing is for the carriage house, the small house behind the main house.

We enjoyed the front porch and our dogs loved the backyard. Great host. Excellent communication. Highly recommend."*

name: Spacious and Fun 4BR w/ Pool Table and more!
description:
Cherish your Indianapolis moments in our brand new 4-bedroom and 2.5-bathroom house. Escape distractions and relax in our elegant, professionally decorated home. There is plenty of space for groups, large or small! The first floor features gorgeous hardwoods, and an open line-of-sight through a spacious living room, kitchen, and dining room. The house boasts a spacious master room on the main level!

The space
Welcome to Indiana! Our lovely house features 2.5 baths plus 4 bedrooms - we can accommodate up to 12 people comfortably. Enjoy our immersive social spaces ranging from a fully loaded open kitchen and a pool table located in the garage to entertain family and friends. The home has been furnished by our high-end professional designer - you're going to love it!

This is not your typical hotel stay! Our newly-built home features hardwood floors that include an open line-of-sight through a spacious living room, open kitchen, and dining room. We have one master suite available on the first level. There is plenty of space for both privacy and group interaction!

** KEY FEATURES **
- High-speed internet
- Smart TV available
- Washer & Dryer
- Central A/C & Heating
- Hotel-style amenities: fresh linens, towels, soap & shampoos are provided
- Fully loaded kitchen with new stainless steel top of the line appliances

- Street parking
... and much more!

**BED CONFIGURATION**

Bedroom One: 1 King (sleeps 2)
Bedroom Two: 2 Queen (sleeps 4)
Bedroom Three: 2 Full (sleeps 4)
Bedroom Four: 1 Full (sleeps 2)

Pets are welcome for a $150 fee for the first 2 pets. There will be an extra $50 charge for the 3rd pet which will be paid via Airbnb resolution. Guests are required to clean up after their pets, otherwise, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

**THINGS TO DO NEARBY**

Attractions:
-Old World Gondoliers (2.6 miles)
-White River State Park (2.5 miles)
-Indianapolis Canal Walk (2.6 miles)
-Soldiers & Sailors Monument (1.9 miles)
-Indiana State Museum (2.4 miles)
-Indianapolis City Market (1.7 miles)
-Col. Eli Lilly Civil War Museum (2.3 miles)
-Newfields: A Place for Nature and The Arts (7.3 miles)
-The Children's Museum of Indianapolis (5.0 miles)-Indianapolis Motor and Speedway Museum (9.4 miles)

Shopping:
- Southern Plaza Shopping Center: 8 min. drive (5.0 miles)
- Circle Centre Mall: 8 min. drive (1.8 miles)

Sports complex:
- Lucas Oil Stadium home of the NFL Colts: 8 min. drive (1.9 miles)
- Indianapolis Motor Speedway: 16 min. drive (9.4 miles)
- Bankers Life Fieldhouse where the Pacers (NBA) & Fever (WNBA) call home: 9 min. drive (1.9 miles)
With the additions of college basketball, minor league baseball, and soccer & much more!

Breweries:
- Chilly Water Brewing, an industrial-chic brewpub offering house-made ales & lagers, sandwiches & live music: 4 min. drive (0.8 mile)
- Metazoa Brewery, want to enjoy cold brews while helping animals? 5% of Metazoa profits to animal & wildlife organizations to give back to the planet: 7 min. drive (1.1 mile)
- New Day Craft, a cidery decked with local art serves & sells artisanal meads & honey wines: 3 min. drive (2.2 mile)
- Hotel Tango, a warehouse-style tasting room of a craft spirits distillery with stone & brick walls & a fireplace: 4 min. drive (0.8 mile)

Restaurants:
- Kuma's, famous heavy metal burger bar: 4 min. drive (1.0 mile)
- Milktooth, rated by Eater as the 38th best restaurant in the country. Open for breakfast & lunch: 5 min. drive (1.0 mile)
- Bluebeard, New American kitchen serving sharing plates & craft cocktails in a renovated 1924 warehouse: 5 min. drive (0.9 mile)
- Repeal, high end bar: 5 min. drive (0.9 mile)
- Thunderbird, southern cooking with massive beer selection: 3 min. drive (1.1 miles)
- Rook, contemporary Asian-style street fare such as pork belly steamed buns & Banh mi tacos: 6 min. drive (9.6 miles)
- 3 Carrots City Market, locally sourced vegan & vegetarian takes on American & Midwestern eats at a counter in City Market: 8 min. drive (1.0 miles)
- Red Lion Grog House, sleek bar serving upscale British food & burgers with an array of craft & import beers: 3 mins (0.8 miles)

Additional Eateries + Coffeeshops:
- Amelia's, a charming bakery featuring daily-made breads & pastries with gourmet groceries: 5 min. drive (0.8 mile)
- Wildwood Market, striving to bring the freshest, most delicious local & seasonal produce, dairy & meat: 4 min. drive (0.9 mile)
- Turchetti's Deli, butcher shop & marketplace: 3 min. drive (1.0 mile)
- Rooftop Garden, a seasonal rooftop bar providing tap beers, wine, cocktails & snacks amid skyline views: 3 min. drive (1.2 mile)
- Virginia Ave Pizza, offering an all -you-can-eat pizza & salad lunch buffet: 3 min. drive (0.9 mile)
- Calvin Fletcher's Coffee, serving organic drinks & locally baked pastries: 5 min. drive (0.9 mile)
- Wine Market, chefs pair your food with delicious wine: 4 min. drive (0.9 mile)
... and plenty of other options!


** DETAILS TO NOTE **

-The house is 100% yours just like a hotel with a professional cleaning crew that comes in right before your visit. The whole check-in/check-out process is keyless so you can drive up with privacy, press a combination on the door lock and you're in :)

-IMPORTANT: Parties and events are strictly prohibited.

-For your safety and security reasons many (but not all) of our homes have motion detectors and a security system, as well as exterior cameras.

-As mandated by the City, we have installed noise detection equipment in both the backyard and the living room. These devices specifically only captures and records decibel levels.

Have any questions about our home or location? Please don't hesitate to reach out! We hope to host you soon!

Other things to note
‚Äî IMPORTANT: Please read and agree to all house rules.

‚Äî No smoking of any kind is allowed on our property. Marijuana is illegal in Indiana. If our cleaners smell smoke, you will be charged a fine starting at $300.00. We care deeply about the health and wellbeing of our guests and smoke of any kind leaves a smell for the guests after you.

‚Äî Please keep in mind the check-in and check-out times. If you need an early check-in or late check-out, feel free to reach out and confirm your request 48 hours before the date requested. That way, we can ensure that the cleaners have the time between guests to make the space spotless. There will be a $75 charge for each check-in/out adjustment.

‚Äî Please remember while having fun to keep the noise down in this quiet neighborhood.

Parties and Events - Parties and events are strictly prohibited. Quiet hours, which start at 10 pm, are strictly observed. To ensure that our guests do not exceed a certain volume level and disturb our neighbors, we use a NoiseAware decibel level monitoring device. They are located in the home's common area. Any evidence of a party or event, including camera footage, excessive garbage, or other evidence will result in a fine of $500.00, legal action, and possible eviction without reimbursement, plus the cost of any extra cleaning or damages that result from the event. We have ring cameras in the front and the back of the house for security purposes.

We kindly remind all guests that tampering with or unplugging Ring cameras is strictly prohibited. These cameras play a vital role in ensuring the security of our premises and protecting both you and our property. Please be aware that any unauthorized interference with the Ring cameras will be taken very seriously. In accordance with our policies and local regulations, guests found engaging in such actions may face fines of up to $500.

‚òÄ Modern and well-equipped kitchen with seating for 12 guests
‚òÄ 500Mbps WiFi and smart TVs throughout the entire home
‚òÄ Shuffleboard table, ping pong table, dartboard, cards, board games
‚òÄ Charming Bates-Hendricks neighborhood

‚òÜ‚òÜ BEDROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ
This gorgeous city living home accommodates 12 guests in 4 bedrooms. There are 2 master suites. First master bedroom is on the main level of the home and is fitted with a king-size bed and a private full bathroom with shower/tub combo.

The upper level accommodates another ten guests, six of which can sleep in the bunk bedroom. On this upper level sits the second master suite bedroom featuring a king-size bed and a private full bathroom with a standing shower. A pac n play and sound machine are located in this upper level master closet.
The 2nd bedroom on the upper level is fitted with a queen-size bed. The 3rd bedroom on the upper level is the bunk room. 2 full XL over queen bunks. There is a portable AC unit in this bunk room in case our Indiana weather gets too warm!

Every bedroom is equipped with a smart TV, alarm clock w/ USB port to easily charge your device, luggage rack, room darkening curtains, large full length mirror, dresser, and closet.


‚òÜ‚òÜ BATHROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ
There are three full bathrooms and one half bathroom in this home, each of them stocked with all the essentials you need for the duration of your stay.

The master bedroom on the main floor contains a full ensuite bathroom, while one half bathroom is located near the dining room and easily accessible for all guests. The full ensuite on the upper level boasts a large standing shower. The last bathroom in the home is a full bathroom on the upper level with a shower/tub combo. Worry about nothing with these thoughtfully stocked bathrooms that provide everything you need and more.


‚òÜ‚òÜ KITCHEN & LIVING ‚òÜ‚òÜ
The bright and airy kitchen is fully equipped with all the appliances, utensils and cookware you need to feel at home. This thoughtfully-designed home provides a perfect space to cook for your large group. The coffee bar is well stocked with coffee, sweetener, mugs, and has extra space to make your favorite cocktails. The dining area seats 8 guests at the gorgeous wooden table. Plus an additional seating for 4 at the bar, giving all 12 guests a place to sit in the kitchen! Bring out the highchair as needed. As soon as you're done with dinner, step over to the shuffleboard table or grab some games out of the cabinet.

The living room is situated on the main level of the home and is fitted with a Roku smart TV, allowing full access to your favorite streaming services. Enjoy the large sectional couch with all your guests watching your favorite movies!


‚òÜ‚òÜ OUTSIDE SPACE ‚òÜ‚òÜ
The exterior area of this home is all about fun and relaxation! A full privacy fence giving you the space to yourself. Lounge around the fire pit, or step over to the cornhole boards for some healthy competition with your guests. To keep the competition going, walk into the garage game room for ping pong or darts. A quaint seating area and BBQ are situated in this outdoor space for use during your stay. Guests can walk to the best ice cream shop in town, a super secret speakeasy, family friendly house bar, local dive bar, Two Chicks District Co., and a coffee shop.

TITLE: Mins to Downtown, 2 King Beds, Free Parking
Listing Name: Mins to Downtown, 2 King Beds, Free Parking
name: Mins to Downtown, 2 King Beds, Free Parking
description:
Welcome to your luxurious, newly remodeled home in Bates-Hendricks, minutes from downtown Indianapolis. This 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home features modern furnishings, a fully equipped kitchen, spacious living areas, and TVs in each room. Perfect for a comfortable, convenient stay in Indy.

The space
Just minutes from downtown Indianapolis, our home offers the perfect combination of comfort and convenience, making it an ideal destination for families, couples, or business travelers looking to explore the city.

Highlights include:
- Spacious Living Areas: Open floor plan with modern furnishings and vibrant decor, perfect for relaxation and socializing.
- Fully Furnished Kitchen: Equipped with modern appliances and ample space for cooking and dining.
- Luxurious Bedrooms: Three bedrooms featuring two king-sized beds and one queen-sized bed, all with high-quality linens and TVs.
- Prime Location: Situated in the charming Bates-Hendricks neighborhood, minutes from downtown and within walking distance of local restaurants and shops.
- Close to Attractions: Conveniently located near Lucas Oil Stadium, Fountain Square, Garfield Park Conservatory and Gardens, the Indianapolis Cultural Trail, and the Eiteljorg Museum of American Indians and Western Art.

As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a spacious, open floor plan that seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas. The living room features a large, comfortable sofa with ample seating for everyone, perfect for relaxing after a day of sightseeing or business meetings. The space is thoughtfully designed with stylish, modern furnishings and vibrant pops of color, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

The fully furnished kitchen is a chef's delight, equipped with all the modern appliances and utensils you need to prepare delicious meals. Whether you're whipping up a quick breakfast or hosting a family dinner, the open layout makes it easy to cook and socialize. The adjacent dining area offers plenty of seating for family and friends to gather and enjoy meals together.

Our home boasts three beautifully appointed bedrooms, each designed with your comfort in mind. Two of the bedrooms feature luxurious king-sized beds, while the third offers a cozy queen-sized bed. All bedrooms come with high-quality linens, ample closet space, and TVs for your entertainment. The 3.5 bathrooms are modern and well-appointed, ensuring everyone has plenty of space and privacy.

Outside, you'll find free street parking, making it easy to come and go as you please. The vibrant Bates-Hendricks neighborhood is known for its friendly community and charming streets. You'll be within walking distance of a variety of wonderful local restaurants, cafes, and shops, offering a true taste of Indianapolis living.

For those looking to explore the city, our home is perfectly located near several top attractions. Lucas Oil Stadium, just a short drive away, is a must-visit for sports fans and event-goers. Fountain Square, known for its arts, food, and entertainment scene, offers a lively atmosphere with something for everyone. Nature lovers will appreciate the Garfield Park Conservatory and Gardens, a beautiful oasis in the city. The Indianapolis Cultural Trail, a world-class urban bike and pedestrian path, is perfect for a leisurely stroll or bike ride. Finally, the Eiteljorg Museum of American Indians and Western Art provides a unique cultural experience with its impressive collection of art and exhibits.

Whether you're here for a weekend getaway, a family vacation, or a business trip, our home offers a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. Book your stay with us and make the most of your trip to Indianapolis.

Guest access
You have the entire home to yourself. It is one side of a duplex, completely separate from other unit and with your own private entrance.

TITLE: Bungalo in BR! - Walkable everywhere! Go Explore!
Listing Name: Bungalo in BR! - Walkable everywhere! Go Explore!
name: Bungalo in BR! - Walkable everywhere! Go Explore!
description:
Welcome to our Broad Ripple ANIMAL HOUSE! A uniquely beautifully decorated animal themed, light and bright bungalow in the heart of Broad Ripple. Our charming home is just 3 blocks to Broad Ripple Ave where you can enjoy all the area has to offer including shops, restaurants, pubs, galleries, art and more! Ride a bike, or take a stroll on the scenic open air Monon trail, just one block away! Our home is perfect for small families and couples coming to town to indulge, explore, or just relax!

The space
Our thoughtfully designed home includes the following rooms with sleeping accommodations with memory foam mattresses in two spaces.

Master Bedroom - Relaxing space with a queen bed and a view to the back yard, with dual entry from the den and kitchen.

2nd Bedroom - Quaint and cute bedroom with a double bed and closet just off of the living room.

Den / Office - Bright common room with sitting area for relaxing or reading with lots of natural light, with a desk and chair. The upstairs bathroom is accessible from this room.

Living Room - Lit up and inviting living space with a comfy queen fold out sofa bed.

Basement / Rec Room - Fun space with large screen TV, Darts, Board Games and a convertible full size couch bed. This area has the 2nd bathroom with a shower and the laundry room with a washer and dryer. This is the 4th room that we use for recreation. Technically it is not a bedroom as there is no egress to outside of the house.

Outdoor - Relaxing outdoor space under covered area with lights, seating, a firepit, and a BB!Q grill.

Guest access
Our guests have access to the entire house and garage with the exception of our supply closet which is locked. Bikes, helmets, and bike locks are located in the garage for guest use. Please use bikes at your own risk but we advise that you use the provided helmets and follow all traffic laws for your safety. Stay Safe!

Other things to note
Something to note: Our home is an older bungalow with original hardwood flooring that does make some noise when walking around. While most find this a charming characteristic of the home, we have had a guest mention this to us so we want to make sure everyone knows before booking!

TITLE: 3 BD, 1 BA  Home Across From Lucas Oil Stadium
Listing Name: 3 BD, 1 BA Home Across From Lucas Oil Stadium
name: 3 BD, 1 BA Home Across From Lucas Oil Stadium
description:
1800's Victorian Home with eclectic d√©cor in Downtown Indianapolis...with a front porch view of LUCAS OIL STADIUM! Walking distance to Convention Center, theatre, restaurants, drinks, shopping, entertainment and MORE! Perfect for a weekend getaway, football, basketball, baseball or soccer game, conference or convention. Great place to stay if you're in town for business. Walk or Uber anywhere!

The space
If you're looking for a non-hotel experience, this home is for you. It's full of charm...which means it's unique but OLD! The hardwood floors are original, they are safe, but not perfect. The home is intentionally decorated in a "shabby chic" like way....yes the portraits in the living room are supposed to be worn and torn. The home is professionally cleaned by Becht Pride Cleaning Service prior to each guest's arrival - the home is clean but was built in 1890....so it may seem "worn" to those who don't appreciate older homes. The linens are intentionally mismatched but again, clean and soft. There is a full kitchen but if you plan on preparing a multi-course meal, you may not have all the kitchen gadgets, etc. that you enjoy having in your own kitchen. Ask ahead of time or plan on bringing your favorite cooking utensils yourself. The furnace is new as of 2020 and the water heater as of 2018. The shower in the bathroom is in the original claw foot tub - clean but not pristine. I say all this so that expectations are clear - I hope you will stay in the home and enjoy the great city of Indianapolis! :-)

Guest access
Entire house- basement unavailable.

Other things to note
I have external blink cameras located at the front and back doors and on the south side of the house. This is for your security as well as mine. There are no cameras inside the home.

Self check in. Digital keypad. Please enter and exit the home via the back door.

Extra towels, toilet paper and bedding located in bedroom closet next to bathroom.

TITLE: Stately 3BR townhouse in historic Irvington
Listing Name: Stately 3BR townhouse in historic Irvington
name: Stately 3BR townhouse in historic Irvington
description:
Nestled in the heart of Irvington‚Äôs historic district, the Parker Lane is a tastefully furnished home with a nod to mid-century modern design - a spacious duplex with three bedrooms and two bathrooms, and outfitted with a generously stocked kitchen, so you have the option to cook meals and brew up fresh coffee during your stay. Stroll the brick lined streets of Irvington and discover the local shops, restaurants, and coffee houses.

The space
Originally constructed in the early 1900s, the Parker Lane house features beautifully restored hardwood floors, high ceilings, original wood trim and solid hardwood interior doors. Each space has been thoughtfully outfitted to make your stay comfortable, cozy, and relaxing. The house is designed to comfortably accommodate six guests.

The main floor features an amply stocked kitchen, a coffee and tea nook, a mudroom with an in unit washer and dryer that guests can use during their stay, a full bathroom, a dining room set with six seats, a Crosley record turntable and a vinyl collection, a stack of fun, interactive board and card games, and a cozy, inviting living room set up with a 65 inch television - the perfect space to relax.

Three upstairs bedrooms - including a master bedroom with a king bed and a desk, a trundle room with two twin beds, and a third room with a queen bed - are outfitted with memory foam mattresses that provide support and comfort. Each bedroom has a 55 inch TV, and we provide sound machines to promote restful sleep, helping soften the occasional trains that whistle at a nearby crossing, as well as other ambient city sounds. The second bathroom is thoughtfully stocked to make your stay more comfortable.

Finally, there is a partially fenced in backyard that is shared with the other side of the duplex. The back lot includes two guest parking spaces, as well as a cozy fire pit area, complete with outdoor chairs and tables, lit with strings of suspended patio lights.

Enjoy the walkability of Irvington - local restaurants, coffee houses, taprooms and cocktail lounges, shops and bookstores, are all just up the street from the home. Amble along the Pennsy Trail, pick up a robust coffee from Coal Yard, savor a slice of upper crust pizza from Jockamo‚Äôs, or try a hearty skillet breakfast at Lincoln Square.

Downtown Indy is a mere 15 minute drive away - discover the fun shops and food offerings in Fountain Square, Mass Ave, the Bottleworks district, and enjoy a leisurely Canal walk. Whether you‚Äôre settling in for a weekend visit, planning to stick around to see the sights, or just passing through, the Parker Lane house is the perfect place for you to book while you‚Äôre in Indy!


ACCESSIBILITY //
The home was built in the early 1900s and some features were not originally designed with accessibility in mind. We've updated it to make it as comfortable as possible, but here are a few things you may want to note:

1. There are 4 concrete steps leading to the entrance to the home. The last step is particularly tall.

2. The bedrooms are all located on the 2nd floor of the home. There is a flight of stairs that are relatively steep to reach the second floor.

3. There are 2 full bathrooms. One is located on the main floor, one on the upper floor.


OCCUPANCY //
The house is set up to comfortably accommodate 6 guests. If your party is larger than 6, please reach out to the hosts so we can navigate hosting a larger group.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire living space of the home and share access to the front porch and backyard with the neighboring unit. Self check-in allows guests to enter the home and come and go freely via a digital keypad. Two off-street parking spots are allotted to guests and street parking is available if you have additional vehicles.

Other things to note
GENERAL //
1. NEW ACCOUNTS - If there are no prior reviews on your account, we will ask that you provide some additional information about yourself, your group and your trip prior to accepting your reservation request. In these instances, we reserve the right to deny the request if we feel it necessary to safeguard the home and apologize in advance for any inconvenience this may cause.

2. HOUSE RULES - Before booking, please be sure to read our House Rules, Quiet Hours Policy and Pet Policy (if you plan to bring a dog). They are found in the "House rules" section of this listing.

3. SHARED WALL - This home is a duplex with two separate living units and the interior wall is shared between units. Please be respectful to the other residents and keep any extra noise and heavy footfall to a minimum.

4. DEDICATED WORKSPACE - The Dedicated Workspace is a desk and chair located in the master bedroom. The chair offers a height adjustment. Please review the photos to make sure this will meet your needs for a dedicated workspace prior to booking.

5. TRAIN NOISE - The home is in a mature residential neighborhood and is not located on a busy street. However, the home is near an active train crossing where trains blow their whistle a few times a day & night. Optional white noise machines have been supplied in each bedroom if you would like some additional noise masking.


KITCHEN //
We have outfitted the home with a variety of goods and household items to make your stay comfortable. In addition to cookware - pots, pans, baking trays, muffin tins, knives, utensils, cutting boards, etc. - you‚Äôll find a Keurig, a coffee maker, a Ninja bullet blender, a waffle press, a hand mixer, and a 3 quart crockpot to help make mealtime easier. The kitchen is stocked with olive oil and some staple dry goods - K-cups, coffee, cocoa, and tea, sugar, brown sugar, flour, rolled oats, and vanilla. A filtered water pitcher is in the fridge for drinking water during your stay.


ENTERTAINMENT //
The home is equipped with a Wi-Fi connected 65" 4K Roku Smart TV in the living room and Wi-Fi connected 55" 4K Roku Smart TVs in each of the bedrooms. Amazon Prime Video is included with your stay. The Roku-enabled TVs also allow you to log into your own streaming services.


INTERNET //
500Mbps Up/Down Fiber Optic Internet connectivity, multiple Wi-Fi 6 mesh nodes for complete coverage and fast speeds. Ethernet connection is available by plugging into the Asus mesh node in the cabinet over the fridge in the kitchen.


CHECK OUT STEPS //
We intentionally keep things easy for you, so you can get down the road:
1. Close and lock windows and exterior doors.
2. Turn off all the interior lights.
3. Lock the door behind you.


WHY YOU SHOULD BOOK THIS HOME //
1. Simple self check-in with keypad code
2. Clean, comfortable and tastefully furnished
3. Fast Wi-Fi Internet (500+ Mbps) w/mesh nodes for good coverage
4. Large, Wi-Fi connected 4K smart TVs in living room and all bedrooms
5. Comfortable beds
6. Among the top number of amenities available in the market
7. Simple check-out process with minimal steps
8. Reasonable cleaning fee
9. Longer term stays welcome. Price breaks given for stays at 7+ and 28+ nights
10. Easy cancellation policy if your plans change
11. Family owned and operated for a step above in quality - no rental company shenanigans.

The space
Welcome to our charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home nestled in the heart of Indianapolis, just moments away from downtown attractions like Lucas Oil Stadium, Gainbridge Fieldhouse, and the Indiana Convention Center. Conveniently located just minutes from downtown Indianapolis, our home offers easy access to a wealth of attractions, restaurants, and entertainment options. Whether you're cheering on your favorite team at a sporting event, exploring the vibrant cultural scene, or attending a conference at the convention center, you'll find everything you need just moments away.

Experience the best of Indianapolis from the comfort of our charming home. Book your stay today and start planning an unforgettable getaway!

TITLE: Elegant Design | Woodland View | Meridian Hills
Listing Name: Elegant Design | Woodland View | Meridian Hills
name: Elegant Design | Woodland View | Meridian Hills
description:
Welcome to your luxurious BnB in Broad Ripple: an arts district suburb of Indianapolis. You're less than 5 minutes from the main strip of town, yet the backyard is 99 acres of forest with trails leading to a beach of the White River. Between local music venues, indie coffee shops, and unique restaurants; you're sure to find your niche here! Check out the farmer‚Äôs market (even in winter!) every Saturday, and 50-mile Monon rail-trail for biking and running with plenty of local shops on the way!

The space
You'll enter your home into your formal living room with 65" Smart TV, custom velvet sofa, and 2 cozy chairs. Walk just a few steps to the beautiful dining room with a crystal chandelier and seating for 6! If you walk out the sliding glass door, you'll find a small patio set with seating for 4 with a nice view of the woods.

The kitchen is fully stocked with a standard fridge, electric oven/stove, and everything you need to cook to your hearts content! When you look out the windows you'll have a beautiful view of the Marott Woods!

***Up the flight of stairs*** are your three bedrooms-

The master bedroom is spacious with a pillow top King bed, giant floor mirror and cozy over-sized chair. Clothing storage: closet & stand up dresser.

The second bedroom overlooks the woods with a Queen size pillow-top bed, vintage vanity, and couch to relax on. Clothing storage: closet & multi-drawer vanity.

The third bedroom has two twin beds with a small dresser with smart TV.

All of the bedrooms have fresh white linens, and velvet room darkening curtains (not black-out) to help you sleep soundly. Included in each of your rooms are ceiling fans, lamps, white noise machines, and chargers for your devices. Your full bathroom contains a stand up shower bathtub combo. Plush bath towels, hand towels, wash cloths, make-up towels, shampoo, conditioner, and body wash are stocked with every single stay.

We have a full unfinished basement that has washer and dryer included!!

Guest access
You will have self-entry access to the home and backyard as well as access to a walking trail just a few yards from the property.

Other things to note
This is a townhouse with cinder block soundproofing between the units. There are ~no~ shared spaces with the other side of the home!

You may hear traffic or night life, mainly over the weekends-but that goes for any stay in Broad Ripple!

Here are drive times to some of your favorite destinations-

0.7 miles from Kilroy's
0.8 miles from The Vogue Theatre
3.1 miles from Butler University
4.4 miles from NewField's
4.9 miles from Children's Museum
7.4 miles from Old National Centre
8.1 miles from Banker's Life/Gainbridge Fieldhouse
8 miles from Indianapolis Zoo
8.4 miles from Lucas Oil
12 miles from Grand Park Sports Campus

This home was designed in partnership with @yearyrestorationdesign

This adorable aqua bungalow is located in the Fletcher Place Neighborhood just steps from some of the best restaurants, sporting events & concert venues in Indianapolis. This home has a lot of modern touches! Attention to detail has been given to ensure a comfortable & enjoyable stay. We want it to be your "home away from home" while you're in Indy! There's so much to do within walking distance. We allow 1 smaller sized dog for a fee. Need anything? Just ask! We're right next door.

The space
The home features 2 bedrooms with super comfy beds and linens. The kitchen is nicely appointed with all the basics for making full meals... just add groceries! There's a big, fully fenced backyard for Fido and a quaint front porch for relaxing with your favorite beverage. For the business traveler, a desk is provided along with Wifi so you can work AND play! 1 smaller sized dog allowed (for an additional fee, see "other details to note" for more information on dog rules).

Guest access

Other things to note
Dog Notes: We do love a well behaved dog! **Maximum of 1 dog only (NO exceptions)- small to medium size, are allowed. *No cats, please (although we love them, too). There is an additional $75 pet fee charged for up to 3 nights. *Longer pet stays will incur an additional $25/per night fee (which we will send a request for after your stay). Kindly add that you will be bringing a pet by selecting that option in the drop down "guest" menu when you book. Food dish & water bowl will be waiting! If you plan to bring a dog please do not leave them unattended in the home or yard. If you plan to leave for an extended period, please crate your pooch. Damage or "accidents" will result in additional fees.

Large, open rooms w/high ceilings, original built-ins and enough space to find a quiet corner no matter how many people are visiting or staying w/you.

The space
The space
**There are 7 descriptions below**

1) Parking: Street Parking is the free and easy, right in front of the house

2) Exterior: The Airbnb is located on the right side of the Duplex (if you're facing it). There is a good sized, covered front porch with plenty of room to hang out no matter what the weather is.

There is also a back porch that leads to a shared patio and newly planted backyard, with a fully enclosed privacy fence.

Feel free to use the propane grill located in the backyard as well.

3) Access: There are electronic locks on both the rear and front doors. Codes are erased after every visit and a new one will be provided upon check-in, that is customized to your liking.

4) Security: There are keypads for a "SimpliSafe" security system, that are located just inside both the rear and front doors. This code is also erased after every visit and a new one matching your "Access" code for the doors, will be provided upon check-in.

There are also Ring Video Doorbells located at the front and rear of the Airbnb. Feel free to either message me on here or simply hit the doorbell button and I can communicate with you through the Ring.

5) Hardwood Floors throughout this side.

First Floor: This is the bottom half of a ~2,500 sq ft large space with high ceilings and plenty of room for you and your guests. There are 2 separate living rooms, that can be sectioned off with beautiful wood & glass French Doors.

The living room has a large couch and two armchairs. There is also large flat screen TV with Netflix provided. It is a Smart TV, so you can sign-in and access all of your favorite TV apps.

There is also a large dining room with a table that fits 8, with a large bench seat by the dining room window.

The Kitchen has a stove, refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster, blender and wine cooler. You will find the Kitchen equipped with coffee, sugar, basic condiments, spices, baking tools, cutting boards, Chef's knives and enough counter space to do whatever your heart desires.

The powder room is located off of the kitchen as well.

6) The Second Floor: This is where the bedrooms and bath are located. Each room is equipped with Smart TVs that include Netflix, but also provide you with the opportunity to access any of your favorite TV apps with your login credentials. There is also a linen closet at the end of the hallway, there are extra linens, First Aid Kit, Ironing Board/Iron, and more.

The Largest bedroom is located at the end of the hallway with a King-sized bed. There is plenty of room for pack and plays, or just to spread out. There is also a room-length window bench to sit, read or just look out the front of the house. There is also a desk big enough for any work that needs to be accomplished while you're staying with us.

The 2nd largest bedroom has a Queen-sized bed and is located in the middle of the hallway.

The Smallest bedroom is located right next to the bathroom, and is equipped with a Queen-sized bed.

The Bathroom is bright and has a shower head with a sprayer arm.

7) The Basement has a washer and dryer that are available for your use.

Guest access
*Parking: Street Parking is the free and easy, right in front of the house

*Access: There are electronic locks on both the rear and front doors. Codes are erased after every visit and a new one will be provided upon check-in, that is customized to your liking.

*Security: There are keypads for a "SimpliSafe" security system, that are located just inside both the rear and front doors. This code is also erased after every visit and a new one matching your "Access" code for the doors, will be provided upon check-in.
