description:
Centrally located, 3 BD, 2 full BR, pet-friendly, single-family home offers amazing proximity to local downtown life. There is sleeping for 6 and a spacious, fenced-in back yard! Walk to West Fork or Provider for coffee or across the street to Festiva for some tasteful food. It's near Mass Ave, multiple local parks, and the new Bottleworks District. Even better, it is only 2 blocks away from the Monon Trail! There's a 2 car garage and free street parking!

The space
This 1 story home offers a convenient floor plan and living space. Three bedrooms, both bathrooms, and the laundry room are located toward the back of the home. The open kitchen, dining, and living space are all located at the front of the home and great for entertaining and / or relaxing.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home!

Other things to note
Wifi is 500 mbps.

The home is pet-friendly with host approval. With that in mind, the cleaners do their best to clean up after prior guests' furry family members.

Any guest traveling with pets agree to the following Pet Agreement:
1) Guests agrees not to allow pets on beds or furniture.
2) Guests agree that they are solely responsible for their pet and agree to keep their pet under control at all times.
3) Guests agree to keep their pet restrained, but not tethered, when it is outside.
4) Guests agree not to leave their pet unattended for unreasonable periods.
5) Guests agree to clean up after their pet and to dispose of their pet's waste properly and quickly.
6) Guests agree not to leave food or water for their pet or any other animal outside where it may attract other animals.
7) Guests agree to keep their pet from being unnecessarily noisy or aggressive and causing any annoyance or discomfort to others.
8) Guests agree to notify the host and be willing to pay for any damage, loss, or expense caused by their pet.
9) Guests agree to pay for pest infestation services if needed resulting from pets allowed in the property.

description:
Escape to a unique and tranquil waterfront studio in the heart of the city. This private, elevated getaway features a massive deck with stunning river views, perfect for watching wildlife. Comfortably accommodates guests with two twin beds and a futon. Enjoy the perfect blend of nature and urban convenience in this one-of-a-kind retreat.

The space
Welcome to your bright and airy waterfront retreat! This elevated, open-concept studio apartment is the entire top floor of a charming duplex, offering a perfect blend of comfort and style.

* **Layout:** Open-concept studio with warm, wood-laminate flooring and a cozy fireplace.

* **Living Area:** Relax on the large sectional couch or enjoy a meal at the dining table.

* **Sleeping Arrangements:** The space comfortably accommodates guests with two twin beds and a futon.

* **Kitchenette:** A full kitchenette with everything you need, including a stove, microwave, mini-fridge, and coffee maker.

* **Bathroom:** A modern full bathroom featuring a walk-in shower.

* **Private Outdoor Space:** Step outside onto the massive, private wrap-around porch to enjoy breathtaking river views. The deck is equipped with lounge furniture, a gas fire pit, and a BBQ grill for your enjoyment.

Guest access
Guests will have exclusive and private access to the entire second-level studio apartment and its expansive wrap-around deck.

In addition, you will have shared access to the property's fantastic outdoor amenities, including:
* A large, grassy yard perfect for pets to play.
* A private dock for relaxing on the river.
* A boat ramp for water access.
* Kayaks to explore the river.
* A basketball court.

Other things to note
* **Check-In:** 3:00 PM

* **Check-Out:** 10:00 AM

TITLE: Alumni owned Bungalow 1 block from Butler
Listing Name: Alumni owned Bungalow 1 block from Butler
name: Alumni owned Bungalow 1 block from Butler
description:
Feel at home in this charming 2 bed/1 bath bungalow in a quiet, historic neighborhood! The property features refinished hardwood floors, comfortable furnishings, thoughtful decor and updated fixtures in the bathroom. A modern kitchen offers new appliances, the essentials for cooking, a charging station, and a coffee bar with snacks. Retreat to the spacious fenced in yard and lounge on the patio.

History is important to us so we updated the space while staying true the original character & feel.

The space
Our home is professionally cleaned by the same person between each stay.

Dogs are subject to host approval and require a $75 pet fee to cover additional cleaning costs. We have a 2 dog maximum based on the size of our property. You are responsible to clean up pet waste in the yard. We are unable to host other pets at this time.

We are proud to be earth conscious! 100% of the energy consumed in this dwelling is offset by green power. We also recycle.

A single-serve Keurig coffee maker, French press, tea kettle, sugar, honey, creamer, and light snacks are available in the welcome nook. We're pleased to serve a variety of coffee brands, including our local favorite Hubbard & Cravens.

The home is equipped with a SMART TV. Kick back and relax with YouTubeTV, Hulu, Netflix, & Disney+.

Forget something? We got you! Shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and makeup wipes are available for your convenience in the bathroom. Extra toiletries are stored in the linen cupboard. Please take only what you need.

Got kids? We do too! We're happy to accommodate with child-friendly items (toys, coloring books, pack and play, table booster seat, etc.) as requested. Note that the property is kid friendly but not necessarily child-proof.

Our family loves to play board games! We keep a rotating assortment in the welcome area.

For safety reasons we ask that you do not use the fireplace during your stay. There is absolutely no smoking in the home. Please & thank you!

Guest access
We will direct message you a personal code within one week of your stay for entry via the keypad on the front door.

The basement is unfinished and used for laundry & storage.

TITLE: Back Home Again

name: Back Home Again
description:
New to airbnb, enjoy this modern 4-bedroom single family home with private garage, balcony and fenced-in yard. Each of the 4 bedrooms has a private attached bath. Home has a large common living space for dining and socializing. Centrally located near downtown - walking distance to Bates-Hendricks and Fountain Square. A short scooter or Uber to downtown. Easy access to the airport, downtown, universities, Lucas Oil or hospitals. Baby gear available upon request!

The space
Located in the historic Bates-Hendricks neighborhood, this house was built in 2020, and is equipped with modern appliances and amenities. It‚Äôs a 3-story single-family house. We're really proud of our home and excited to share it with you!

LIVING SPACE
First-floor open concept with kitchen/dining/living room. The living room has a 43" smart TV. Dining table for 5 and bar countertop that seats 5.

KITCHEN
Full kitchen includes dishes, silverware, knives, glasses, wine glasses, cooking utensils, pots & pans, baking sheets, mixing bowls, child's dishes and utensils, blender, slow cooker, toaster, juicer, kettle, drip coffee maker, Keurig, refrigerator & freezer, microwave, oven range, gas stove and dishwasher/disposal. There's a reverse osmosis system built in for fresh, cold drinking water!

BEDROOMS/BATHROOMS
The first floor has one bedroom (queen) and a full bathroom with a walk-in shower.

The second floor has two bedrooms, one (king) with a walk-in closet and private balcony, and (queen). Both have full en-suite bathrooms, one with a tub.

The third floor has another large bedroom with a queen bed, as well as a twin daybed with trundle, a walk-in closet, and a bathroom. If you want to use the trundle bed to make three beds in the room, please let us know in advance so we can set it up for you.

OTHER
There's a laundry room on the second floor, and a loft area with a working space. High-speed wi-fi (of course!).

BACKYARD
The backyard has a covered patio with a small electric grill, patio table, and access to the detached garage.

PARKING
The detached garage (accessible via the alley) can fit two small cars or one larger SUV comfortably, but there's also street parking available right in front of the house.

STAIRS
The entry to the front door of the house has stairs, but the main level kitchen, living spaces, and first floor bedroom/bathroom are accessible via the garage and back door entrance with no stairs needed. The second and third-floor bedrooms, laundry, and loft spaces do require stairs.

Other things to note
We are happy to offer a no-chores checkout! No need to run the dishwasher, take out the trash or pick up towels - we will handle that for you! Our only ask is to lock up when you go and remove any personal accounts from the TV if you logged in while you were here!

Newly renovated in 2024, this beautiful 3 bedroom modern home in the historic Butler neighborhood combines sleek design with spacious comfort, making it perfect for families, groups attending events/conventions downtown, & visitors to the Circle City!

Explore the Monon Trail, take the kids to the Children's Museum, catch a game at Gainsbridge Fieldhouse & Lucas Oil Stadium, or enjoy amazing food/bars on Mass Ave and the Garage Food Hall.

We provide a $10 Starbucks gift card to our guests!

The space
The home has 3 bedrooms with brand new Zinus green tea memory foam mattresses so you can have a great night's sleep! There is a king, queen, and two twin single beds that will comfortably sleep 6 guests!

The home has a brand new combination washer/dryer as well as a Nest Smart Thermostat.

Unwind after a long day in the living room while watching all your favorite streaming services on the 65" TCL 4K UHD Roku-enabled TV.

The home also comes with high-speed ATT fiber internet and a dedicated work space for working professionals to take advantage of.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home with the exception of the outdoor shed.

Other things to note
We can accommodate furry friends (dogs only!) for $75 per dog. Dogs must be house trained to stay off furniture. If pet fur is found on furniture, there will be an additional $150 charge.

Early check-in or late check-out are $25/ea based on our cleaner's schedule.

description:
Experience the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this delightful 3BR, 2 BA ranch-style home. Designed with style in mind, the outdoor experience helps melt the stress away with the perfect backyard, private firepit, and warm glowing lights. This family-friendly residence is a seamless fusion of functionality and style.

The kitchen was crafted for chefs and busy families cooking on the go. Traveling with kids? This is the perfect fun spot with plenty of games. Level 2 -EV charger.

The space
Welcome to Indy South with high speed cable fiber internet 500+ speeds‚Äîa serene abode where every detail is curated for your comfort and entertainment. Step into the foyer, greeted by a vivid Maui green wall adorned with neon lights, creating the perfect backdrop for your arrival selfies.

Venture right to discover a sun-drenched living space framed by expansive windows. This area boasts a chic workspace and opens to a covered porch for seamless indoor-outdoor living. Relax in luxury with high-end furnishings, including plush chairs and a stylish ottoman, set around a fireplace and a 65‚Äù 4K TV. The state-of-the-art entertainment system, complete with a sound bar, bass, and Xbox One S, is ideal for family fun on rainy days.

The inviting sofa doubles as a sleeper, ideal for children, complementing the exquisite sleep experience offered by the premium beds throughout‚Äîespecially the primary bedroom's Sleep Number bed with dual zones for customized comfort.

The dining room welcomes six guests around a table paired with sumptuous leather chairs, overlooking a modern kitchen. Fully equipped with a range of gadgets, it's a culinary enthusiast's dream. Step out from the kitchen to the magical back porch, where LED lights and ceiling fans create an enchanting atmosphere for enjoying wine or coffee on the wicker couch set.

A seamless firepit experience awaits just off the patio, with smokeless technology and comfortable seating. Inside, the primary bedroom is a sanctuary featuring a 65‚Äù TV and thoughtful touches like USB outlet lamps. Its en-suite bathroom dazzles with a dual-function shower, a 60‚Äù LED vanity mirror, and ample space, leading into a walk-in closet.

Down the corridor, the New York-themed room reflects a storied romance, equipped with a cozy queen bed and modern amenities. The kids' domain offers twin beds, a 55‚Äù TV, PS4, and VR set, sure to delight with its selection of games and a snug bean bag.

Each bedroom is perfected with lighted ceiling fans, ensuring your ideal environment. The innovative laundry room at the hall's end introduces a detergent-free washing system, epitomizing our commitment to convenience and eco-conscious living.

Indy South isn't just a stay‚Äîit's an experience. We're thrilled to host you in this slice of Indianapolis charm, where every moment is an invitation to relax, play, and create memories.

* Exterior security cameras onsite.

Guest access
Entire home. We do have a locker system in the garage that is reserved for cleaners and owners.

Other things to note
Indy South has two recent upgrades:

We have added a pool table in one bay of the garage. It will be right but you can fit a small car in the other bay if needed.

IndySouth is excited to share we have added a Level 2 EV charger.

We had had this unit installed by a electrician. The unit details are below.

*** Important note*** by using the service you accept all risk associated your charging your EV vehicles.

We purposefully selected a 32 AMP charge experience. Plenty to recharge on a road trip but easier on the battery.

AIMILER Level 2 Electric Vehicle Charger

ETL, FCC and CE Certified EV Charger - Meets the Safety Criteria Defined by: SAE J1772, UL2231-1/-2, UL 991, UL 2231, UL 2251, UL1998 and UL 2594
Faster Level 2 EV Charger with ETL, FCC and CE Certified: The Aimiler ZA05 level 2 EV 240V 7.6kw home charging station is ETL Listed, Meets the Safety Criteria Defined by: SAE J1772, UL2231-1/-2, UL 991, UL 2231, UL 2251, UL1998 and UL 2594.

Fits for all EV cars: Equipped with NEMA 14-50 Plug, SAE J1772 TYPE 1 standard connector, so it is compatible with compatible with all America standard AC charging interfaces or plug-in hybrid vehicles, including Tesla (Adaptor Needed), Ford, GM, Volkswagen, Nissan, Audi, Honda, BMW and more.

25FT Long Bold Cable & Portable Storage Handbag & Wall-mount Included: Equipped with 25 feet military grade, TPE polymer encased pure copper charging cable, the drop-resistant plug endures over 10,000 charges, up to 2 tons of pressure, and offers a 20-year lifespan.

NEMA TYPE 4 & IP66 Waterproof, Safety Charging with 10 safety protections: The Aimiler EV charger can operate under the environment of -30‚ÑÉ to 50‚ÑÉ (-22 to 122¬∞F). Approved by NEMA TYPE 4 & IP66 waterproof, the Aimiler ev charger can be used indoor or outdoor in any type of weather including snow, rain, hail, etc. Fire resistant, over-current, over-voltage, and over-temperature protection, etc.

Smart LED Touch Screen Control & 2.4G WIFI APP Control: You can control the ev charger by LED touch buttons or smart life APP control. Smart LED screen clearly display show the Amperage, charging speed, input voltage, delay time, help you charge safely. The cell phone remote control, real-time monitoring of your car's charging situation, allows your vehicles to be charged during off-peak period by setting the charging start time, save money on the electricity bills. Check charging cost, history, fully-charged notification, track the charging status or adjust the current.

*Baby monitor available upon request. Please provide 72+ hour notice of possible.
